atk-vin02a4:7: Saṅgahaṃ yo samāruḷho, tassa pubbāgataṃ nayaṃ;
atk-vin02a4:9_0: 1. Tattha yaṃ tena bhagavatā…pe… paññattanti ādinayappavattāya tāva pucchāya ayaṃ
atk-vin02a4:9_1: saṅkhepattho – yo so bhagavā sāsanassa ciraṭṭhitikatthaṃ dhammasenāpatinā saddhammagāravabahumānavegasamussitaṃ
atk-vin02a4:9_2: añjaliṃ sirasmiṃ patiṭṭhāpetvā yācito dasa atthavase paṭicca vinayapaññattiṃ paññapesi,
atk-vin02a4:9_3: tena bhagavatā tassa tassa sikkhāpadassa paññattikālaṃ jānatā, tassā tassā sikkhāpadapaññattiyā
atk-vin02a4:9_4: dasa atthavase passatā; apica pubbenivāsādīhi jānatā, dibbena cakkhunā passatā, tīhi
atk-vin02a4:9_5: vijjāhi chahi vā pana abhiññāhi jānatā, sabbattha appaṭihatena samantacakkhunā passatā,
atk-vin02a4:9_6: sabbadhammajānanasamatthāya paññāya jānatā, sabbasattānaṃ cakkhuvisayātītāni tirokuṭṭādigatāni
atk-vin02a4:9_7: cāpi rūpāni ativisuddhena maṃsacakkhunā ca passatā, attahitasādhikāya samādhipadaṭṭhānāya
atk-vin02a4:9_8: paṭivedhapaññāya jānatā, parahitasādhikāya karuṇāpadaṭṭhānāya desanāpaññāya passatā,
atk-vin02a4:9_9: arahatā sammāsambuddhena “yaṃ paṭhamaṃ pārājikaṃ paññattaṃ, taṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
atk-vin02a4:9_10: kaṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ, kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ, atthi tattha paññatti…pe… kenābhata”nti.
atk-vin02a4:10_0: 2. Pucchāvissajjane pana “yaṃ tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena
atk-vin02a4:10_1: paṭhamaṃ pārājika”nti idaṃ kevalaṃ pucchāya āgatassa ādipadassa paccuddharaṇamattameva,
atk-vin02a4:10_2: “kattha paññattanti vesāliyā paññattaṃ; kaṃ ārabbhāti sudinnaṃ kalandaputtaṃ ārabbhā”ti
atk-vin02a4:10_3: evamādinā pana nayena punapi ettha ekekaṃ padaṃ pucchitvāva vissajjitaṃ. Ekā paññattīti
atk-vin02a4:10_4: “yo pana bhikkhu methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭiseveyya pārājiko hoti asaṃvāso”ti ayaṃ ekā
atk-vin02a4:10_5: paññatti. Dve anupaññattiyoti “antamaso tiracchānagatāyapī”ti ca, “sikkhaṃ apaccakkhāyā”ti
atk-vin02a4:10_6: ca makkaṭivajjiputtakavatthūnaṃ vasena vuttā – imā dve anupaññattiyo. Ettāvatā “atthi
atk-vin02a4:10_7: tattha paññatti anupaññatti anuppannapaññattī”ti imissā pucchāya dve koṭṭhāsā vissajjitā
atk-vin02a4:10_8: honti. Tatiyaṃ vissajjetuṃ pana “anuppannapaññatti tasmiṃ natthī”ti vuttaṃ. Ayañhi
atk-vin02a4:10_9: anuppannapaññatti nāma anuppanne dose paññattā; sā aṭṭhagarudhammavasena bhikkhunīnaṃyeva
atk-vin02a4:10_10: āgatā, aññatra natthi. Tasmā vuttaṃ “anuppannapaññatti tasmiṃ natthī”ti. Sabbatthapaññattīti
atk-vin02a4:10_11: majjhimadese ceva paccantimajanapadesu ca sabbatthapaññatti. Vinayadharapañcamena
atk-vin02a4:10_12: gaṇena “upasampadā, guṇaṅguṇūpāhanā, dhuvanahānaṃ, cammattharaṇa”nti imāni hi cattāri
atk-vin02a4:10_13: sikkhāpadāni majjhimadeseyeva paññatti. Ettheva etehi āpatti hoti, na paccantimajanapadesu.
atk-vin02a4:11_1: hi suddhabhikkhunīnaṃ vā paññattaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ asādhāraṇapaññatti nāma hoti. Idaṃ
atk-vin02a4:11_2: pana bhikkhuṃ ārabbha uppanne vatthusmiṃ “yā pana bhikkhunī chandaso methunaṃ dhammaṃ
atk-vin02a4:11_3: paṭiseveyya, antamaso tiracchānagatenapi pārājikā hoti asaṃvāsā”ti bhikkhunīnampi
atk-vin02a4:11_4: paññattaṃ, vinītakathāmattameva hi tāsaṃ natthi, sikkhāpadaṃ pana atthi, tena vuttaṃ
atk-vin02a4:11_5: “sādhāraṇapaññattī”ti. Ubhatopaññattiyampi eseva nayo. Byañjanamattameva hi ettha
atk-vin02a4:11_6: nānaṃ, bhikkhūnaṃ bhikkhunīnampi sādhāraṇattā sādhāraṇapaññatti, ubhinnampi paññattattā
atk-vin02a4:12_0: Nidānogadhanti “yassa siyā āpatti so āvikareyyā”ti ettha sabbāpattīnaṃ anupaviṭṭhattā
atk-vin02a4:12_1: nidānogadhaṃ; nidāne anupaviṭṭhanti attho. Dutiyena uddesenāti nidānogadhaṃ nidānapariyāpannampi
atk-vin02a4:12_2: samānaṃ “tatrime cattāro pārājikā dhammā”tiādinā dutiyeneva uddesena uddesaṃ āgacchati.
atk-vin02a4:12_3: Catunnaṃ vipattīnanti sīlavipattiādīnaṃ. Paṭhamā hi dve āpattikkhandhā sīlavipatti
atk-vin02a4:12_4: nāma, avasesā pañca ācāravipatti nāma. Micchādiṭṭhi ca antaggāhikadiṭṭhi ca diṭṭhivipatti
atk-vin02a4:12_5: nāma, ājīvahetu paññattāni cha sikkhāpadāni ājīvavipatti nāma. Iti imāsaṃ catunnaṃ
atk-vin02a4:12_6: vipattīnaṃ idaṃ pārājikaṃ sīlavipatti nāma hoti.
atk-vin02a4:13_0: Ekena samuṭṭhānenāti dvaṅgikena ekena samuṭṭhānena. Ettha hi cittaṃ aṅgaṃ hoti, kāyena
atk-vin02a4:13_1: pana āpattiṃ āpajjati. Tena vuttaṃ “kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhātī”ti. Dvīhi samathehi
atk-vin02a4:13_2: sammatīti “āpannosī”ti sammukhā pucchiyamāno “āma āpannomhī”ti paṭijānāti, tāvadeva
atk-vin02a4:13_3: bhaṇḍanakalahaviggahā vūpasantā honti, sakkā ca hoti taṃ puggalaṃ apanetvā uposatho
atk-vin02a4:13_4: vā pavāraṇā vā kātuṃ. Iti sammukhāvinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena cāti dvīhi samathehi
atk-vin02a4:13_5: sammati, na ca tappaccayā koci upaddavo hoti. Yaṃ pana upari paññattivagge “na katamena
atk-vin02a4:13_6: samathena sammatī”ti vuttaṃ, taṃ samathaṃ otāretvā anāpatti kātuṃ na sakkāti imamatthaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:14_0: Paññatti vinayoti “yo pana bhikkhū”tiādinā nayena vuttamātikā paññatti vinayoti attho.
atk-vin02a4:14_1: Vibhattīti padabhājanaṃ vuccati; vibhattīti hi vibhaṅgassevetaṃ nāmaṃ. Asaṃvaroti
atk-vin02a4:14_2: vītikkamo. Saṃvaroti avītikkamo. Yesaṃ vattatīti yesaṃ vinayapiṭakañca aṭṭhakathā
atk-vin02a4:14_3: ca sabbā paguṇāti attho. Te dhārentīti te etaṃ paṭhamapārājikaṃ pāḷito ca atthato
atk-vin02a4:14_4: ca dhārenti; na hi sakkā sabbaṃ vinayapiṭakaṃ ajānantena etassa attho jānitunti.
atk-vin02a4:14_5: Kenābhatanti idaṃ paṭhamapārājikaṃ pāḷivasena ca atthavasena ca yāva ajjatanakālaṃ
atk-vin02a4:15_0: 3. Idāni yāya paramparāya ānītaṃ, taṃ dassetuṃ “upāli dāsako cevā”tiādinā nayena
atk-vin02a4:15_1: porāṇakehi mahātherehi gāthāyo ṭhapitā. Tattha yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ nidānavaṇṇanāyameva
atk-vin02a4:15_2: vuttaṃ. Iminā nayena dutiyapārājikādipucchāvissajjanesupi vinicchayo veditabboti.
atk-vin02a4:18_0: 157. Ito paraṃ “methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevanto kati āpattiyo āpajjatī”ti ādippabhedo
atk-vin02a4:18_1: katāpattivāro, “methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevantassa āpattiyo catunnaṃ vipattīnaṃ kati
atk-vin02a4:18_2: vipattiyo bhajantī”ti ādippabhedo vipattivāro, “methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevantassa āpattiyo
atk-vin02a4:18_3: sattannaṃ āpattikkhandhānaṃ katihi āpattikkhandhehi saṅgahitā”ti ādippabhedo saṅgahavāro,
atk-vin02a4:18_4: “methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevantassa āpattiyo channaṃ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṃ katihi samuṭṭhānehi
atk-vin02a4:18_5: samuṭṭhahantī”ti ādippabhedo samuṭṭhānavāro, “methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevantassa āpattiyo
atk-vin02a4:18_6: catunnaṃ adhikaraṇānaṃ katamaṃ adhikaraṇa”nti ādippabhedo adhikaraṇavāro, “methunaṃ
atk-vin02a4:18_7: dhammaṃ paṭisevantassa āpattiyo sattannaṃ samathānaṃ katihi samathehi sammantī”ti
atk-vin02a4:18_8: ādippabhedo samathavāro, tadanantaro samuccayavāro cāti ime satta vārā uttānatthā eva.
atk-vin02a4:19_0: 188. Tato paraṃ “methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevanapaccayā pārājikaṃ kattha paññatta”ntiādinā
atk-vin02a4:19_1: nayena puna paccayavasena eko paññattivāro, tassa vasena purimasadisā eva katāpattivārādayo
atk-vin02a4:19_2: satta vārāti evaṃ aparepi aṭṭha vārā vuttā, tepi uttānatthā eva. Iti ime aṭṭha, purimā
atk-vin02a4:19_3: aṭṭhāti mahāvibhaṅge soḷasa vārā dassitā. Tato paraṃ teneva nayena bhikkhunivibhaṅgepi
atk-vin02a4:19_4: soḷasa vārā āgatāti evamime ubhatovibhaṅge dvattiṃsa vārā pāḷinayeneva veditabbā.
atk-vin02a4:19_5: Na hettha kiñci pubbe avinicchitaṃ nāma atthi.
atk-vin02a4:23_0: 257. Tadanantarāya pana samuṭṭhānakathāya anattā iti nicchayāti anattā iti nicchitā.
atk-vin02a4:23_1: Sabhāgadhammānanti aniccākārādīhi sabhāgānaṃ saṅkhatadhammānaṃ. Nāmamattaṃ na nāyatīti
atk-vin02a4:23_2: nāmamattampi na paññāyati. Dukkhahāninti dukkhaghātanaṃ. Khandhakā yā ca mātikāti
atk-vin02a4:23_3: khandhakā yā ca mātikāti attho. Ayameva vā pāṭho. Samuṭṭhānaṃ niyato katanti samuṭṭhānaṃ
atk-vin02a4:23_5: saṅgaho paccetabbo. Etāneva hi tīṇi sikkhāpadāni niyatasamuṭṭhānāni, aññehi saddhiṃ
atk-vin02a4:24_0: Sambhedaṃ nidānañcaññanti aññampi sambhedañca nidānañca. Tattha sambhedavacanena
atk-vin02a4:24_1: samuṭṭhānasambhedassa gahaṇaṃ paccetabbaṃ, tāni hi tīṇi sikkhāpadāni ṭhapetvā sesāni
atk-vin02a4:24_3: paccetabbaṃ. Sutte dissanti uparīti sikkhāpadānaṃ samuṭṭhānaniyamo sambhedo nidānanti
atk-vin02a4:24_4: imāni tīṇi suttamhi eva dissanti; paññāyantīti attho. Tattha “ekena samuṭṭhānena
atk-vin02a4:24_5: samuṭṭhāti, kāyato ca cittato cā”tiādimhi tāva purimanaye samuṭṭhānaniyamo ca sambhedo
atk-vin02a4:24_6: ca dissanti. Itaraṃ pana nidānaṃ nāma –
atk-vin02a4:26: Kosambiyā ca sakkesu, bhaggesu ceva paññattā”ti.
atk-vin02a4:27: Evaṃ upari dissati, parato āgate sutte dissatīti veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:28_0: “Vibhaṅge dvīsū”ti gāthāya ayamattho – yaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ dvīsu vibhaṅgesu paññattaṃ
atk-vin02a4:28_1: uposathadivase bhikkhū ca bhikkhuniyo ca uddisanti, tassa yathāñāyaṃ samuṭṭhānaṃ
atk-vin02a4:29_0: Sañcarittānubhāsanañcāti sañcarittañca samanubhāsanañca. Atirekañca cīvaranti atirekacīvaraṃ;
atk-vin02a4:29_1: kathinanti attho. Lomāni padasodhammoti eḷakalomāni ca padasodhammo ca. Bhūtaṃ saṃvidhānena
atk-vin02a4:29_2: cāti bhūtārocanañca saṃvidahitvā addhānappaṭipajjanañca. Theyyadesanā coriṃ cāti
atk-vin02a4:29_3: theyyasattho ca chattapāṇissa agilānassa dhammadesanā ca corivuṭṭhāpanañca. Ananuññātāya
atk-vin02a4:29_4: terasāti mātāpitusāmikehi ananuññātāya saddhiṃ imāni terasa samuṭṭhānāni honti. Sadisā
atk-vin02a4:29_5: idha dissareti idha ubhatovibhaṅge etesu terasasu samuṭṭhānasīsesu ekekasmiṃ aññānipi
atk-vin02a4:31_0: 258. Idāni tāni dassetuṃ “methunaṃ sukkasaṃsaggo”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha methunanti
atk-vin02a4:31_1: idaṃ tāva paṭhamapārājikaṃ nāma ekaṃ samuṭṭhānasīsaṃ, sesāni tena sadisāni. Tattha
atk-vin02a4:31_2: sukkasaṃsaggoti sukkavissaṭṭhi ceva kāyasaṃsaggo ca. Aniyatā paṭhamikāti paṭhamaṃ
atk-vin02a4:32_0: Sabhojane raho dve cāti sabhojane kule anupakhajjanisajjasikkhāpadañca dve rahonisajjasikkhāpadāni
atk-vin02a4:32_1: ca. Aṅguli udake hasanti aṅgulipatodakañca udake hasadhammasikkhāpadañca. Pahāre
atk-vin02a4:32_3: ca sekhiyāti parimaṇḍalanivāsanādīni khuddakavaṇṇanāvasāne vuttāni tepaññāsa sekhiyasikkhāpadāni ca.
atk-vin02a4:33_2: talaghātakaṃ jatumaṭṭhaṃ udakasuddhikādiyanañca. Vassaṃvuṭṭhā ca ovādanti vassaṃvuṭṭhā
atk-vin02a4:33_3: chappañcayojanāni sikkhāpadañca ovādāya agamanasikkhāpadañca. Nānubandhe pavattininti
atk-vin02a4:33_4: yā pana bhikkhunī vuṭṭhāpitaṃ pavattiniṃ dve vassāni nānubandheyyāti vuttasikkhāpadaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:34: Ime sikkhāti imā sikkhāyo; liṅgavipariyāyo kato. Kāyamānasikā katāti kāyacittasamuṭṭhānā katā.
atk-vin02a4:36_0: 259. Adinnanti idaṃ tāva adinnādānanti vā dutiyapārājikanti vā ekaṃ samuṭṭhānasīsaṃ,
atk-vin02a4:36_3: dve duṭṭhadosasikkhāpadāni. Aniyatā dutiyikāti dutiyaṃ aniyatasikkhāpadaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:37_0: Acchinde pariṇāmaneti sāmaṃ cīvaraṃ datvā acchindanañca saṅghikalābhassa attano pariṇāmanañca.
atk-vin02a4:37_1: Musā omasapesuṇāti musāvādo ca omasavādo ca bhikkhupesuññañca. Duṭṭhullā pathavīkhaṇeti
atk-vin02a4:38_0: Nikkaḍḍhanaṃ siñcanañcāti vihārato nikkaḍḍhanañca udakena tiṇādisiñcanañca. Āmisahetu
atk-vin02a4:38_1: bhuttāvīti “āmisahetu bhikkhuniyo ovadantī”ti sikkhāpadañca, bhuttāviṃ anatirittena
atk-vin02a4:38_2: khādanīyādinā pavāraṇāsikkhāpadañca. Ehi anādari bhiṃsāti “ehāvuso gāmaṃ vā”ti sikkhāpadañca,
atk-vin02a4:38_3: anādariyañca bhikkhubhiṃsāpanakañca. Apanidhe ca jīvitanti pattādīnaṃ apanidhānasikkhāpadañca,
atk-vin02a4:39_0: Jānaṃ sappāṇakaṃ kammanti jānaṃ sappāṇakaudakasikkhāpadañca punakammāya ukkoṭanañca.
atk-vin02a4:39_3: vilekhāya saṃvattantīti āgatasikkhāpadañca. Moho amūlakena cāti mohanake pācittiyasikkhāpadañca,
atk-vin02a4:40_0: Kukkuccaṃ dhammikaṃ cīvaraṃ datvāti kukkuccaupadahanañca, dhammikānaṃ kammānaṃ chandaṃ
atk-vin02a4:40_1: datvā khīyanañca, cīvaraṃ datvā khīyanañca. Pariṇāmeyya puggaleti saṅghikaṃ lābhaṃ
atk-vin02a4:40_2: puggalassa pariṇāmanasikkhāpadaṃ. Kiṃ te akālaṃ acchindeti “kiṃ te ayye eso purisapuggalo
atk-vin02a4:40_4: bhikkhuniyā saddhiṃ cīvaraṃ parivattetvā acchindanasikkhāpadañca. Duggahī nirayena
atk-vin02a4:40_5: cāti duggahitena duppadhāritena paraṃ ujjhāpanasikkhāpadañca, nirayena vā brahmacariyena
atk-vin02a4:41_0: Gaṇaṃ vibhaṅga dubbalanti “gaṇassa cīvaralābhaṃ antarāyaṃ kareyyā”ti ca “dhammikaṃ
atk-vin02a4:41_2: ca vuttasikkhāpadāni. Kathinā phāsu passayanti “dhammikaṃ kathinuddhāraṃ paṭibāheyya,
atk-vin02a4:41_3: bhikkhuniyā sañcicca aphāsuṃ kareyya, bhikkhuniyā upassayaṃ datvā kupitā anattamanā
atk-vin02a4:41_4: nikkaḍḍheyya vā”ti vuttasikkhāpadāni. Akkosacaṇḍī maccharīti “bhikkhuṃ akkoseyya
atk-vin02a4:41_5: vā paribhāseyya vā, caṇḍikatā gaṇaṃ paribhāseyya, kule maccharinī assā”ti vuttasikkhāpadāni.
atk-vin02a4:41_6: Gabbhiniñca pāyantiyāti “gabbhiniṃ vuṭṭhāpeyya, pāyantiṃ vuṭṭhāpeyyā”ti vuttasikkhāpadāni.
atk-vin02a4:42_0: Dvevassaṃ sikkhā saṅghenāti “dve vassāni chasu dhammesu asikkhitasikkhaṃ sikkhamānaṃ
atk-vin02a4:42_1: vuṭṭhāpeyya, sikkhitasikkhaṃ sikkhamānaṃ saṅghena asammataṃ vuṭṭhāpeyyā”ti vuttasikkhāpadāni.
atk-vin02a4:42_2: Tayo ceva gihīgatāti ūnadvādasavassaṃ gihigataṃ, paripuṇṇadvādasavassaṃ gihigataṃ
atk-vin02a4:42_3: “dve vassāni chasu dhammesu asikkhitasikkhaṃ dve vassāni sikkhitasikkhaṃ saṅghena
atk-vin02a4:42_5: nayena vuttā tisso. Ūnadvādasasammatāti “ūnadvādasavassā vuṭṭhāpeyya, paripuṇṇadvādasavassā
atk-vin02a4:43_0: Alaṃ tāva sokāvāsanti “alaṃ tāva te ayye vuṭṭhāpitenā”ti ca, “caṇḍiṃ sokāvāsaṃ sikkhamānaṃ
atk-vin02a4:43_1: vuṭṭhāpeyyā”ti ca vuttasikkhāpadadvayaṃ. Chandā anuvassā ca dveti “pārivāsikachandadānena
atk-vin02a4:43_2: sikkhamānaṃ vuṭṭhāpeyya, anuvassaṃ vuṭṭhāpeyya, ekaṃ vassaṃ dve vuṭṭhāpeyyā”ti vuttasikkhāpadattayaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:45_0: 260. Sañcarī kuṭi vihāroti sañcarittaṃ saññācikāya kuṭikaraṇaṃ mahallakavihārakaraṇañca.
atk-vin02a4:45_1: Dhovanañca paṭiggahoti aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā purāṇacīvaradhovāpanañca cīvarapaṭiggahaṇañca.
atk-vin02a4:45_2: Viññattuttari abhihaṭṭhunti aññātakaṃ gahapatiṃ cīvaraviññāpanaṃ tatuttarisādiyanasikkhāpadañca.
atk-vin02a4:45_3: Ubhinnaṃ dūtakena cāti “cīvaracetāpannaṃ upakkhaṭaṃ hotī”ti āgatasikkhāpadadvayañca
atk-vin02a4:46_1: pañca sikkhāpadāni. Riñcanti rūpikā cevāti vibhaṅge “riñcanti uddesa”nti āgataṃ eḷakalomadhovāpanaṃ
atk-vin02a4:47_1: Suttaṃ vikappanena cāti suttaṃ viññāpetvā cīvaravāyāpanañca tantavāye upasaṅkamitvā
atk-vin02a4:47_2: cīvare vikappāpajjanañca. Dvāradānasibbāni cāti yāva dvārakosā aggaḷaṭṭhapanāya,
atk-vin02a4:47_3: “aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā cīvaraṃ dadeyya, cīvaraṃ sibbeyyā”ti vuttasikkhāpadattayaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:47_4: Pūvapaccayajoti cāti pūvehi vā manthehi vā abhihaṭṭhuṃ pavāraṇāsikkhāpadaṃ cātumāsapaccayappavāraṇājotisamādahanasikkhāpadāni ca.
atk-vin02a4:48_0: Ratanaṃ sūci mañco ca, tūlaṃ nisīdanakaṇḍu ca, vassikā ca sugatenāti ratanasikkhāpadañceva
atk-vin02a4:48_1: sūcigharasikkhāpadādīni ca satta sikkhāpadāni. Viññatti aññaṃ cetāpanā, dve saṅghikā
atk-vin02a4:48_2: mahājanikā, dve puggalalahukā garūti “yā pana bhikkhunī aññaṃ viññāpetvā aññaṃ viññāpeyyā”tiādīni
atk-vin02a4:48_3: nava sikkhāpadāni. Dve vighāsā sāṭikā cāti “uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā saṅkāraṃ vā vighāsaṃ
atk-vin02a4:48_4: vā tirokuṭṭe vā tiropākāre vā chaḍḍeyya vā chaḍḍāpeyya vā, harite chaḍḍeyya vā chaḍḍāpeyya
atk-vin02a4:48_5: vā”ti evaṃ vuttāni dve vighāsasikkhāpadāni ca udakasāṭikāsikkhāpadañca. Samaṇacīvarena
atk-vin02a4:50_1: Chandaṃ ujjagghikā dve cāti chandaṃ adatvā gamanasikkhāpadaṃ ujjagghikāya antaraghare
atk-vin02a4:50_2: gamananisīdanasikkhāpadadvayañca. Dve ca saddāti “appasaddo antaraghare gamissāmi,
atk-vin02a4:50_3: nisīdissāmī”ti sikkhāpadadvayañca. Na byāhareti “na sakabaḷena mukhena byāharissāmī”ti sikkhāpadaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:51_0: Chamā nīcāsane ṭhānaṃ, pacchato uppathena cāti chamāyaṃ nisīditvā, nīce āsane nisīditvā;
atk-vin02a4:51_1: ṭhitena nisinnassa, pacchato gacchantena purato gacchantassa, uppathena gacchantena
atk-vin02a4:51_3: ukkhittānuvattaka, hatthaggahaṇādisaṅkhātāni tīṇi pārājikāni. Osāre paccācikkhanāti
atk-vin02a4:51_4: “anapaloketvā kārakasaṅghaṃ anaññāya gaṇassa chandaṃ osāreyyā”ti ca “buddhaṃ paccakkhāmī”ti
atk-vin02a4:52_0: Kismiṃ saṃsaṭṭhā dve vadhīti “kismiñcideva adhikaraṇe paccākatā”ti ca “bhikkhuniyo
atk-vin02a4:52_1: paneva saṃsaṭṭhā viharantī”ti ca “yā pana bhikkhunī evaṃ vadeyya saṃsaṭṭhāva ayye
atk-vin02a4:52_2: tumhe viharathā”ti ca “attānaṃ vadhitvā vadhitvā rodeyyā”ti ca vuttasikkhāpadāni.
atk-vin02a4:52_3: Visibbe dukkhitāya cāti “bhikkhuniyā cīvaraṃ visibbetvā vā visibbāpetvā vā”ti ca
atk-vin02a4:52_4: “dukkhitaṃ sahajīvini”nti ca vuttasikkhāpadadvayaṃ. Puna saṃsaṭṭhā na vūpasameti
atk-vin02a4:52_5: “saṃsaṭṭhā vihareyya gahapatinā vā gahapatiputtena vā”ti evaṃ puna vuttasaṃsaṭṭhasikkhāpadañca
atk-vin02a4:52_6: “ehayye, imaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasamehī”ti vuccamānā, “sādhū”ti paṭissuṇitvā “sā pacchā
atk-vin02a4:52_7: anantarāyikinī neva vūpasammeyyā”ti vuttasikkhāpadañca. Ārāmañca pavāraṇāti “jānaṃ
atk-vin02a4:52_8: sabhikkhukaṃ ārāmaṃ anāpucchā paviseyyā”ti ca “ubhatosaṅghe tīhi ṭhānehi na pavāreyyā”ti
atk-vin02a4:53_0: Anvaddhaṃ sahajīviniṃ dveti “anvaddhamāsaṃ bhikkhuniyā bhikkhusaṅghato dve dhammā
atk-vin02a4:53_1: paccāsīsitabbā”ti vuttasikkhāpadañca, “sahajīviniṃ vuṭṭhāpetvā dve vassāni neva anuggaṇheyya,
atk-vin02a4:53_2: sahajīviniṃ vuṭṭhāpetvā neva vūpakāseyyā”ti vuttasikkhāpadadvayañca. Cīvaraṃ anubandhanāti
atk-vin02a4:53_3: “sace me tvaṃ, ayye, cīvaraṃ dassasi, evāhaṃ taṃ vuṭṭhāpessāmī”ti ca “sace maṃ tvaṃ,
atk-vin02a4:53_4: ayye, dve vassāni anubandhissasi, evāhaṃ taṃ vuṭṭhāpessāmī”ti ca vuttasikkhāpadadvayaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:55_0: 262. Ubbhataṃ kathinaṃ tīṇīti “niṭṭhitacīvarasmiṃ bhikkhunā ubbhatasmiṃ kathine”ti
atk-vin02a4:55_1: vuttāni āditova tīṇi sikkhāpadāni. Paṭhamaṃ pattabhesajjanti “dasāhaparamaṃ atirekapatto”ti
atk-vin02a4:55_4: Pakkamantena vā duveti “taṃ pakkamanto neva uddhareyyā”ti bhūtagāmavagge vuttasikkhāpadadvayaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:56_0: Upassayaṃ paramparāti “bhikkhunupassayaṃ gantvā bhikkhuniyo ovadeyyā”ti ca “paramparabhojane
atk-vin02a4:56_1: pācittiya”nti ca vuttasikkhāpadadvayaṃ. Anatirittaṃ nimantanāti “anatirittaṃ khādanīyaṃ
atk-vin02a4:56_2: vā bhojanīyaṃ vā”ti ca “nimantito sabhatto samāno”ti ca vuttasikkhāpadadvayaṃ. Vikappaṃ
atk-vin02a4:56_3: rañño vikāleti “sāmaṃ cīvaraṃ vikappetvā”ti ca “rañño khattiyassā”ti ca “vikāle gāmaṃ
atk-vin02a4:56_4: paviseyyā”ti ca vuttasikkhāpadattayaṃ. Vosāsāraññakena cāti “vosāsamānarūpā ṭhitā”ti
atk-vin02a4:56_5: ca “tathārūpesu āraññakesu senāsanesu pubbe appaṭisaṃvidita”nti ca vuttasikkhāpadadvayaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:57_0: Ussayā sannicayañcāti “ussayavādikā”ti ca “pattasannicayaṃ kareyyā”ti ca vuttasikkhāpadadvayaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:57_1: Pure pacchā vikāle cāti “yā pana bhikkhunī purebhattaṃ kulāni upasaṅkamitvā”ti ca,
atk-vin02a4:57_2: “pacchābhattaṃ kulāni upasaṅkamitvā”ti ca, “vikāle kulāni upasaṅkamitvā”ti ca vuttasikkhāpadattayaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:57_4: dhāreyyā”ti ca vuttasikkhāpadadvayaṃ. Dvepi āvasathena cāti “āvasathacīvaraṃ anissajjitvā
atk-vin02a4:57_5: paribhuñjeyya, āvasathaṃ anissajjitvā cārikaṃ pakkameyyā”ti ca evaṃ āvasathena saddhiṃ
atk-vin02a4:58: Pasākhe āsane cevāti “pasākhe jātaṃ gaṇḍaṃ vā”ti ca “bhikkhussa purato anāpucchā āsane nisīdeyyā”ti ca vuttasikkhāpadadvayaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:60_0: 263. Eḷakalomā dve seyyāti eḷakalomasikkhāpadañceva dve ca sahaseyyasikkhāpadāni.
atk-vin02a4:60_3: celakāti dantaponasikkhāpadañca acelakasikkhāpadañca. Uyyuttaṃ senaṃ uyyodhīti “uyyuttaṃ
atk-vin02a4:60_4: senaṃ dassanāya gaccheyya, senāya vaseyya, uyyodhikaṃ vā…pe… anīkadassanaṃ vā gaccheyyā”ti
atk-vin02a4:60_5: vuttasikkhāpadattayaṃ. Surā orena nhāyanāti surāpānasikkhāpadañca orenaddhamāsanahānasikkhāpadañca.
atk-vin02a4:60_6: Dubbaṇṇe dve desanikāti “tiṇṇaṃ dubbaṇṇakaraṇāna”nti vuttasikkhāpadañca vuttāvasesapāṭidesanīyadvayañca.
atk-vin02a4:60_7: Lasuṇupatiṭṭhe naccanāti lasuṇasikkhāpadaṃ, “bhikkhussa bhuñjantassa pānīyena vā
atk-vin02a4:60_8: vidhūpanena vā upatiṭṭheyyā”ti vuttasikkhāpadaṃ, “naccaṃ vā gītaṃ vā vāditaṃ vā dassanāya
atk-vin02a4:60_9: gaccheyyā”ti vuttasikkhāpadañca. Ito paraṃ pāḷiṃ virajjhitvā likhanti. Yathā pana
atk-vin02a4:61_0: Nhānamattharaṇaṃ seyyāti “naggā nahāyeyya, ekattharaṇapāvuraṇā tuvaṭṭeyyuṃ, ekamañce
atk-vin02a4:61_1: tuvaṭṭeyyu”nti vuttasikkhāpadattayaṃ. Antoraṭṭhe tathā bahīti “antoraṭṭhe sāsaṅkasammate,
atk-vin02a4:61_3: cārikaṃ pakkameyya, rājāgāraṃ vā cittāgāraṃ vā…pe… pokkharaṇiṃ vā dassanāya gaccheyyā”ti
atk-vin02a4:61_4: ca vuttasikkhāpadadvayaṃ. Āsandiṃ suttakantanāti “āsandiṃ vā pallaṅkaṃ vā paribhuñjeyya,
atk-vin02a4:62_0: Veyyāvaccaṃ sahatthā cāti “gihiveyyāvaccaṃ kareyya, agārikassa vā paribbājakassa
atk-vin02a4:62_1: vā paribbājikāya vā sahatthā khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā dadeyyā”ti vuttasikkhāpadadvayaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:62_2: Abhikkhukāvāsena cāti “abhikkhuke āvāse vassaṃ vaseyyā”ti idametaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:62_3: Chattaṃ yānañca saṅghāṇinti “chattupāhanaṃ dhāreyya, yānena yāyeyya, saṅghāṇiṃ dhāreyyā”ti
atk-vin02a4:62_5: nahāyeyya, vāsitakena piññākena nahāyeyyā”ti vuttasikkhāpadattayaṃ. Bhikkhunītiādinā
atk-vin02a4:62_6: “bhikkhuniyā ummaddāpeyyā”tiādīni cattāri sikkhāpadāni vuttāni. Asaṅkaccikā āpattīti
atk-vin02a4:62_7: “asaṅkaccikā gāmaṃ paviseyya pācittiya”nti evaṃ vuttaāpatti ca. Cattārīsā catuttarīti
atk-vin02a4:63_0: Kāyena na vācācittena, kāyacittena na vācatoti kāyena ceva kāyacittena ca samuṭṭhahanti;
atk-vin02a4:63_1: na vācācittena na vācatoti attho. Dvisamuṭṭhānikā sabbe, samā eḷakalomikāti idaṃ uttānatthameva.
atk-vin02a4:65_0: 264. Padaññatra asammatāti “padaso dhammaṃ, mātugāmassa uttarichappañcavācāhi dhammaṃ
atk-vin02a4:65_1: deseyya, aññatra viññunā purisaviggahena, asammato bhikkhuniyo ovadeyyā”ti vuttasikkhāpadattayaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:65_2: Tathā atthaṅgatena cāti “atthaṅgate sūriye ovadeyyā”ti idametaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:65_3: Tiracchānavijjā dveti “tiracchānavijjaṃ pariyāpuṇeyya, vāceyyā”ti evaṃ vuttasikkhāpadadvayaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:65_4: Anokāso ca pucchanāti “anokāsakataṃ bhikkhuṃ pañhaṃ puccheyyā”ti idametaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:67_0: 265. Addhānanāvaṃ paṇītanti “bhikkhuniyā saddhiṃ saṃvidhāya ekaddhānamaggaṃ paṭipajjeyya,
atk-vin02a4:67_1: ekaṃ nāvaṃ abhiruheyya, paṇītabhojanāni agilāno attano atthāya viññāpetvā bhuñjeyyā”ti
atk-vin02a4:67_2: vuttasikkhāpadattayaṃ. Mātugāmena saṃhareti mātugāmena saddhiṃ saṃvidhāya gamanañca
atk-vin02a4:67_3: “sambādhe lomaṃ saṃharāpeyyā”ti vuttasikkhāpadañca. Dhaññaṃ nimantitā cevāti “dhaññaṃ
atk-vin02a4:67_4: viññāpetvā vā”ti ca “nimantitā vā pavāritā vā khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā khādeyya
atk-vin02a4:67_5: vā bhuñjeyya vā”ti vuttasikkhāpadañca. Aṭṭha cāti bhikkhunīnaṃ vuttā aṭṭha pāṭidesanīyā vā.
atk-vin02a4:69_0: 266. Theyyasatthaṃ upassutīti theyyasatthena saddhiṃ saṃvidhāya ekaddhānamaggagamanañca
atk-vin02a4:69_1: upassutitiṭṭhanañca. Sūpaviññāpanena cāti idaṃ sūpodanaviññattiṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:69_2: Rattichannañca okāsanti “rattandhakāre appadīpe, paṭicchanne okāse, ajjhokāse purisena
atk-vin02a4:69_3: saddhi”nti evaṃ vuttasikkhāpadattayaṃ. Byūhena sattamāti idaṃ tadanantarameva “rathikāya
atk-vin02a4:69_4: vā byūhe vā siṅghāṭake vā purisena saddhi”nti āgatasikkhāpadaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:71_0: 267. Dhammadesanāsamuṭṭhānāni ekādasa uttānāneva. Evaṃ tāva sambhinnasamuṭṭhānaṃ
atk-vin02a4:71_1: veditabbaṃ. Niyatasamuṭṭhānaṃ pana tividhaṃ, taṃ ekekasseva sikkhāpadassa hoti, taṃ
atk-vin02a4:71_2: visuṃyeva dassetuṃ “bhūtaṃ kāyena jāyatī”tiādi vuttaṃ, taṃ uttānameva. Nettidhammānulomikanti
atk-vin02a4:75: 271. Idāni āpattiādikoṭṭhāsesu kosallajananatthaṃ “kati āpattiyo”tiādinā nayena mātikaṃ ṭhapetvā niddesappaṭiniddesavasena vibhaṅgo vutto.
atk-vin02a4:76_0: Tattha kati āpattiyoti mātikāya ca vibhaṅge ca āgatāpattipucchā. Esa nayo dutiyapadepi.
atk-vin02a4:76_1: Kevalañhettha āpattiyo eva rāsivasena khandhāti vuttā. Vinītavatthūnīti tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ
atk-vin02a4:76_2: vinayapucchā; “vinītaṃ vinayo vūpasamo”ti idañhi atthato ekaṃ, vinītāniyeva vinītavatthūnīti
atk-vin02a4:76_3: ayamettha padattho. Idāni yesu sati āpattiyo honti, asati na honti, te dassetuṃ “kati
atk-vin02a4:76_4: agāravā”ti pucchādvayaṃ. Vinītavatthūnīti ayaṃ pana tesaṃ agāravānaṃ vinayapucchā.
atk-vin02a4:76_5: Yasmā pana tā āpattiyo vipattiṃ āpattā nāma natthi, tasmā “kati vipattiyo”ti ayaṃ
atk-vin02a4:76_6: āpattīnaṃ vipattibhāvapucchā. Kati āpattisamuṭṭhānānīti tāsaṃyeva āpattīnaṃ samuṭṭhānapucchā.
atk-vin02a4:76_8: vivādānuvādānaṃ mūlapucchā. Sāraṇīyā dhammāti vivādānuvādamūlānaṃ abhāvakaradhammapucchā.
atk-vin02a4:76_10: Adhikaraṇānīti bhedakaravatthūsu sati uppajjanadhammapucchā. Samathāti tesaṃyeva
atk-vin02a4:76_11: vūpasamanadhammapucchā. Pañca āpattiyoti mātikāya āgatavasena vuttā. Sattāti vibhaṅge āgatavasena.
atk-vin02a4:77_0: Ārakā etehi ramatīti ārati; bhusā vā rati ārati. Vinā etehi ramatīti virati. Paccekaṃ
atk-vin02a4:77_1: paccekaṃ viramatīti paṭivirati. Veraṃ maṇati vināsetīti veramaṇī. Na etāya ete āpattikkhandhā
atk-vin02a4:77_2: karīyantīti akiriyā. Yaṃ etāya asati āpattikkhandhakaraṇaṃ uppajjeyya, tassa paṭipakkhato
atk-vin02a4:77_3: akaraṇaṃ. Āpattikkhandhaajjhāpattiyā paṭipakkhato anajjhāpatti. Velanato velā; calayanato
atk-vin02a4:77_4: vināsanatoti attho. Niyyānaṃ sinoti bandhati nivāretīti setu. Āpattikkhandhānametaṃ
atk-vin02a4:77_5: adhivacanaṃ. So setu etāya paññattiyā haññatīti setughāto. Sesavinītavatthuniddesesupi eseva nayo.
atk-vin02a4:78_0: Buddhe agāravādīsu yo buddhe dharamāne upaṭṭhānaṃ na gacchati, parinibbute cetiyaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-vin02a4:78_1: bodhiṭṭhānaṃ na gacchati, cetiyaṃ vā bodhiṃ vā na vandati, cetiyaṅgaṇe sachatto saupāhano
atk-vin02a4:78_2: carati, natthetassa buddhe gāravoti veditabbo. Yo pana sakkontoyeva dhammassavanaṃ
atk-vin02a4:78_3: na gacchati, sarabhaññaṃ na bhaṇati, dhammakathaṃ na katheti, dhammassavanaggaṃ bhinditvā
atk-vin02a4:78_4: gacchati, vikkhitto vā anādaro vā nisīdati, natthetassa dhamme gāravo. Yo theranavamajjhimesu
atk-vin02a4:78_5: cittīkāraṃ na paccupaṭṭhāpeti, uposathāgāravitakkamāḷakādīsu kāyappāgabbhiyaṃ dasseti,
atk-vin02a4:78_6: yathāvuḍḍhaṃ na vandati, natthetassa saṅghe gāravo. Tisso sikkhā samādāya asikkhamānoyeva
atk-vin02a4:78_7: pana sikkhāya agāravoti veditabbo. Pamāde ca sativippavāse tiṭṭhamānoyeva appamādalakkhaṇaṃ
atk-vin02a4:78_8: abrūhayamāno appamāde agāravoti veditabbo. Tathā āmisappaṭisanthāraṃ dhammappaṭisanthāranti
atk-vin02a4:78_9: imaṃ duvidhaṃ paṭisanthāraṃ akarontoyeva paṭisanthāre agāravoti veditabbo. Gāravaniddese
atk-vin02a4:79_1: attho veditabbo. Appatissoti anīcavutti; na satthāraṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ katvā viharati. Ajjhattaṃ
atk-vin02a4:79_2: vāti attano santāne vā attano pakkhe vā; sakāya parisāyāti attho. Bahiddhā vāti parasantāne
atk-vin02a4:79_3: vā parapakkhe vā. Tatra tumheti tasmiṃ ajjhattabahiddhābhede saparasantāne vā saparaparisāya
atk-vin02a4:79_4: vā. Pahānāya vāyameyyāthāti mettābhāvanādīhi nayehi pahānatthaṃ vāyameyyātha; mettābhāvanādinayena
atk-vin02a4:79_5: hi taṃ ajjhattampi bahiddhāpi pahīyati. Anavassavāyāti appavattibhāvāya.
atk-vin02a4:80: Sandiṭṭhiparāmāsīti sakameva diṭṭhiṃ parāmasati; yaṃ attanā diṭṭhigataṃ gahitaṃ, idameva saccanti gaṇhāti. Ādhānaggāhīti daḷhaggāhī.
atk-vin02a4:81_0: 273. Anuvādamūlaniddeso kiñcāpi vivādamūlaniddeseneva samāno, atha kho aṭṭhārasa
atk-vin02a4:81_1: bhedakaravatthūni nissāya vivadantānaṃ kodhūpanāhādayo vivādamūlāni. Tathā vivadantā
atk-vin02a4:81_2: pana sīlavipattiādīsu aññataravipattiṃ āpajjitvā “asuko bhikkhu asukaṃ nāma vipattiṃ
atk-vin02a4:81_3: āpanno”ti vā, “pārājikaṃ āpannosi, saṅghādisesaṃ āpannosī”ti vā anuvadanti. Evaṃ
atk-vin02a4:82_0: 274. Sāraṇīyadhammaniddese mettacittena kataṃ kāyakammaṃ mettaṃ kāyakammaṃ nāma.
atk-vin02a4:82_1: Āvi ceva raho cāti sammukhā ca parammukhā ca. Tattha navakānaṃ cīvarakammādīsu sahāyabhāvagamanaṃ
atk-vin02a4:82_2: sammukhā mettaṃ kāyakammaṃ nāma. Therānaṃ pana pādadhovanabījanavātadānādibhedampi
atk-vin02a4:82_3: sabbaṃ sāmīcikammaṃ sammukhā mettaṃ kāyakammaṃ nāma. Ubhayehipi dunnikkhittānaṃ dārubhaṇḍādīnaṃ
atk-vin02a4:82_4: tesu avamaññaṃ akatvā attanā dunnikkhittānaṃ viya paṭisāmanaṃ parammukhā mettaṃ kāyakammaṃ
atk-vin02a4:82_5: nāma. Ayampi dhammo sāraṇīyoti ayaṃ mettākāyakammasaṅkhāto dhammo saritabbo satijanako;
atk-vin02a4:82_6: yo naṃ karoti, taṃ puggalaṃ; yesaṃ kato hoti, te pasannacittā “aho sappuriso”ti anussarantīti
atk-vin02a4:82_7: adhippāyo. Piyakaraṇoti taṃ puggalaṃ sabrahmacārīnaṃ piyaṃ karoti. Garukaraṇoti taṃ
atk-vin02a4:82_8: puggalaṃ sabrahmacārīnaṃ garuṃ karoti. Saṅgahāyātiādīsu sabrahmacārīhi saṅgahetabbabhāvāya.
atk-vin02a4:82_9: Tehi saddhiṃ avivādāya samaggabhāvāya ekībhāvāya ca saṃvattati.
atk-vin02a4:83_0: Mettaṃ vacīkammantiādīsu devatthero tissattheroti evaṃ paggayha vacanaṃ sammukhā
atk-vin02a4:83_1: mettaṃ vacīkammaṃ nāma. Vihāre asante pana taṃ paṭipucchantassa “kuhiṃ amhākaṃ devatthero,
atk-vin02a4:83_2: kuhiṃ amhākaṃ tissatthero, kadā nu kho āgamissatī”ti evaṃ mamāyanavacanaṃ parammukhā
atk-vin02a4:83_3: mettaṃ vacīkammaṃ nāma. Mettāsinehasiniddhāni pana nayanāni ummīletvā pasannena mukhena
atk-vin02a4:83_4: olokanaṃ sammukhā mettaṃ manokammaṃ nāma. “Devatthero tissatthero arogo hotu, appābādho”ti
atk-vin02a4:84_0: Appaṭivibhattabhogīti neva āmisaṃ paṭivibhajitvā bhuñjati, na puggalaṃ. Yo hi “ettakaṃ
atk-vin02a4:84_1: paresaṃ dassāmi, ettakaṃ attanā bhuñjissāmi, ettakaṃ vā asukassa ca asukassa ca dassāmi,
atk-vin02a4:84_2: ettakaṃ attanā bhuñjissāmī”ti vibhajitvā bhuñjati, ayaṃ paṭivibhattabhogī nāma. Ayaṃ
atk-vin02a4:84_3: pana evaṃ akatvā ābhataṃ piṇḍapātaṃ therāsanato paṭṭhāya datvā gahitāvasesaṃ bhuñjati.
atk-vin02a4:84_4: “Sīlavantehī”ti vacanato dussīlassa adātumpi vaṭṭati, sāraṇīyadhammapūrakena pana
atk-vin02a4:84_6: viceyya dātumpi vaṭṭati. Na hi ete vicinitvā dentena puggalavibhāgo kato hoti, īdisānañhi
atk-vin02a4:85_0: Akhaṇḍānītiādīsu yassa sattasu āpattikkhandhesu ādimhi vā ante vā sikkhāpadaṃ bhinnaṃ
atk-vin02a4:85_1: hoti, tassa sīlaṃ pariyante chinnasāṭako viya khaṇḍaṃ nāma. Yassa pana vemajjhe bhinnaṃ,
atk-vin02a4:85_2: tassa majjhe chiddasāṭako viya chiddaṃ nāma hoti. Yassa paṭipāṭiyā dve tīṇi bhinnāni,
atk-vin02a4:85_3: tassa piṭṭhiyaṃ vā kucchiyaṃ vā uṭṭhitena visabhāgavaṇṇena kāḷarattādīnaṃ aññatarasarīravaṇṇā
atk-vin02a4:85_4: gāvī viya sabalaṃ nāma hoti. Yassa antarantarā bhinnāni, tassa antarantarā visabhāgavaṇṇabinduvicitrā
atk-vin02a4:85_5: gāvī viya kammāsaṃ nāma hoti. Yassa pana sabbena sabbaṃ abhinnāni sīlāni, tassa tāni
atk-vin02a4:85_6: sīlāni akhaṇḍāni acchiddāni asabalāni akammāsāni nāma honti. Tāni panetāni bhujissabhāvakaraṇato
atk-vin02a4:85_7: bhujissāni. Viññūhi pasatthattā viññuppasatthāni. Taṇhādiṭṭhīhi aparāmaṭṭhattā aparāmaṭṭhāni.
atk-vin02a4:85_8: Upacārasamādhiṃ appanāsamādhiṃ vā saṃvattayantīti samādhisaṃvattanikānīti vuccanti.
atk-vin02a4:85_9: Sīlasāmaññagato viharatīti tesu tesu disābhāgesu viharantehi kalyāṇasīlehi bhikkhūhi
atk-vin02a4:86_0: Yāyaṃ diṭṭhīti maggasampayuttā sammādiṭṭhi. Ariyāti niddosā. Niyyātīti niyyānikā.
atk-vin02a4:86_1: Takkarassāti yo tathākārī hoti, tassa. Dukkhakkhayāyāti sabbadukkhassa khayatthaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:90_0: 320. Upasampadaṃ pucchissanti upasampadakkhandhakaṃ pucchissaṃ. Sanidānaṃ saniddesanti
atk-vin02a4:90_1: nidānena ca niddesena ca saddhiṃ pucchissāmi. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṃ kati āpattiyoti
atk-vin02a4:90_2: yāni tattha samukkaṭṭhāni uttamāni padāni vuttāni, tesaṃ samukkaṭṭhapadānaṃ uttamapadānaṃ
atk-vin02a4:90_3: saṅkhepato kati āpattiyo hontīti. Yena yena hi padena yā yā āpatti paññattā, sā sā
atk-vin02a4:90_4: tassa tassa padassa āpattīti vuccati. Tena vuttaṃ “samukkaṭṭhapadānaṃ kati āpattiyo”ti.
atk-vin02a4:90_5: Dve āpattiyoti ūnavīsativassaṃ upasampādentassa pācittiyaṃ, sesesu sabbapadesu dukkaṭaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:91_0: Tissoti “nassantete vinassantete, ko tehi attho”ti bhedapurekkhārānaṃ uposathakaraṇe
atk-vin02a4:91_1: thullaccayaṃ, ukkhittakena saddhiṃ uposathakaraṇe pācittiyaṃ, sesesu dukkaṭanti evaṃ
atk-vin02a4:91_2: uposathakkhandhake tisso āpattiyo. Ekāti vassūpanāyikakkhandhake ekā dukkaṭāpattiyeva.
atk-vin02a4:92: Tissoti bhedapurekkhārassa pavārayato thullaccayaṃ, ukkhittakena saddhiṃ pācittiyaṃ, sesesu dukkaṭanti evaṃ pavāraṇākkhandhakepi tisso āpattiyo.
atk-vin02a4:93_0: Tissoti vacchatariṃ uggahetvā mārentānaṃ pācittiyaṃ, rattena cittena aṅgajātachupane
atk-vin02a4:93_1: thullaccayaṃ, sesesu dukkaṭanti evaṃ cammasaṃyuttepi tisso āpattiyo. Bhesajjakkhandhakepi
atk-vin02a4:93_2: samantā dvaṅgule thullaccayaṃ, bhojjayāguyā pācittiyaṃ, sesesu dukkaṭanti evaṃ tisso āpattiyo.
atk-vin02a4:94: Kathinaṃ kevalaṃ paññattimeva, natthi tattha āpatti. Cīvarasaṃyutte kusacīravākacīresu thullaccayaṃ, atirekacīvare nissaggiyaṃ, sesesu dukkaṭanti imā tisso āpattiyo.
atk-vin02a4:96_0: Samathakkhandhake chandadāyako khiyyati, khiyyanakaṃ pācittiyaṃ, sesesu dukkaṭanti
atk-vin02a4:96_1: imā dve āpattiyo. Khuddakavatthuke attano aṅgajātaṃ chindati, thullaccayaṃ, romaṭṭhe
atk-vin02a4:96_2: pācittiyaṃ, sesesu dukkaṭanti imā tisso āpattiyo. Senāsanakkhandhake garubhaṇḍavissajjane
atk-vin02a4:96_3: thullaccayaṃ, saṅghikā vihārā nikkaḍḍhane pācittiyaṃ, sesesu dukkaṭanti imā tisso āpattiyo.
atk-vin02a4:97_0: Saṅghabhedebhedakānuvattakānaṃ thullaccayaṃ, gaṇabhojane pācittiyanti imā dve āpattiyo.
atk-vin02a4:97_1: Samācāraṃ pucchissanti vutte vattakkhandhake ekā dukkaṭāpattiyeva. Sā sabbavattesu
atk-vin02a4:97_2: anādariyena hoti. Tathā pātimokkhaṭṭhapane. Bhikkhunikkhandhake appavāraṇāya pācittiyaṃ,
atk-vin02a4:97_3: sesesu dukkaṭanti dve āpattiyo. Pañcasatikasattasatikesu kevalaṃ dhammo saṅgahaṃ
atk-vin02a4:101_0: 321. Āpattikarā dhammā jānitabbātiādimhi ekuttarikanaye āpattikarā dhammā nāma cha
atk-vin02a4:101_1: āpattisamuṭṭhānāni. Etesañhi vasena puggalo āpattiṃ āpajjati, tasmā “āpattikarā”ti
atk-vin02a4:101_2: vuttā. Anāpattikarā nāma satta samathā. Āpatti jānitabbāti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ sikkhāpade
atk-vin02a4:101_3: ca vibhaṅge ca vuttā āpatti jānitabbā. Anāpattīti “anāpatti bhikkhu asādiyantassā”tiādinā
atk-vin02a4:101_4: nayena anāpatti jānitabbā. Lahukāti lahukena vinayakammena visujjhanato pañcavidhā
atk-vin02a4:101_5: āpatti. Garukāti garukena vinayakammena visujjhanato saṅghādisesā āpatti. Kenaci
atk-vin02a4:101_6: ākārena anāpattibhāvaṃ upanetuṃ asakkuṇeyyato pārājikāpatti ca. Sāvasesāti ṭhapetvā
atk-vin02a4:101_7: pārājikaṃ sesā. Anavasesāti pārājikāpatti. Dve āpattikkhandhā duṭṭhullā; avasesā
atk-vin02a4:102_0: Antarāyikāti sattapi āpattiyo sañcicca vītikkantā saggantarāyañceva mokkhantarāyañca
atk-vin02a4:102_1: karontīti antarāyikā. Ajānantena vītikkantā pana paṇṇattivajjāpatti neva saggantarāyaṃ
atk-vin02a4:102_2: na mokkhantarāyaṃ karotīti anantarāyikā. Antarāyikaṃ āpannassāpi desanāgāminiṃ desetvā
atk-vin02a4:102_3: vuṭṭhānagāminito vuṭṭhāya suddhipattassa sāmaṇerabhūmiyaṃ ṭhitassa ca avārito saggamokkhamaggoti.
atk-vin02a4:102_4: Sāvajjapaññattīti lokavajjā. Anavajjapaññattīti paṇṇattivajjā. Kiriyato samuṭṭhitā
atk-vin02a4:102_5: nāma yaṃ karonto āpajjati pārājikāpatti viya. Akiriyatoti yaṃ akaronto āpajjati,
atk-vin02a4:102_6: cīvaraanadhiṭṭhānāpatti viya. Kiriyākiriyatoti yaṃ karonto ca akaronto ca āpajjati, kuṭikārāpatti viya.
atk-vin02a4:103_0: Pubbāpattīti paṭhamaṃ āpannāpatti. Aparāpattīti pārivāsikādīhi pacchā āpannāpatti.
atk-vin02a4:103_1: Pubbāpattīnaṃ antarāpatti nāma mūlavisuddhiyā antarāpatti. Aparāpattīnaṃ antarāpatti
atk-vin02a4:103_2: nāma agghavisuddhiyā antarāpatti. Kurundiyaṃ pana “pubbāpatti nāma paṭhamaṃ āpannā.
atk-vin02a4:103_3: Aparāpatti nāma mānattārahakāle āpannā. Pubbāpattīnaṃ antarāpatti nāma parivāse āpannā.
atk-vin02a4:103_4: Aparāpattīnaṃ antarāpatti nāma mānattacāre āpannā”ti vuttaṃ. Idampi ekena pariyāyena yujjati.
atk-vin02a4:104_0: Desitā gaṇanūpagā nāma yā dhuranikkhepaṃ katvā puna na āpajjissāmīti desitā hoti.
atk-vin02a4:104_1: Agaṇanūpagā nāma yā dhuranikkhepaṃ akatvā saussāheneva cittena aparisuddhena desitā
atk-vin02a4:104_2: hoti. Ayañhi desitāpi desitagaṇanaṃ na upeti. Aṭṭhame vatthusmiṃ bhikkhuniyā pārājikameva
atk-vin02a4:104_3: hoti. Paññatti jānitabbātiādīsu navasu padesu paṭhamapārājikapucchāya vuttanayeneva
atk-vin02a4:105_0: Thullavajjāti thulladose paññattā garukāpatti. Athullavajjāti lahukāpatti. Gihipaṭisaṃyuttāti
atk-vin02a4:105_1: sudhammattherassa āpatti, yā ca dhammikassa paṭissavassa asaccāpane āpatti, avasesā
atk-vin02a4:105_2: na gihipaṭisaṃyuttā. Pañcānantariyakammāpatti niyatā, sesā aniyatā. Ādikaroti sudinnattherādi
atk-vin02a4:105_3: ādikammiko. Anādikaroti makkaṭisamaṇādi anupaññattikārako. Adhiccāpattiko nāma yo
atk-vin02a4:105_4: kadāci karahaci āpattiṃ āpajjati. Abhiṇhāpattiko nāma yo niccaṃ āpajjati.
atk-vin02a4:106_0: Codako nāma yo vatthunā vā āpattiyā vā paraṃ codeti. Yo pana evaṃ codito ayaṃ cuditako
atk-vin02a4:106_1: nāma. Pañcadasasu dhammesu appatiṭṭhahitvā abhūtena vatthunā codento adhammacodako
atk-vin02a4:106_2: nāma, tena tathā codito adhammacuditako nāma. Vipariyāyena dhammacodakacuditakā veditabbā.
atk-vin02a4:106_3: Micchattaniyatehi vā sammattaniyatehi vā dhammehi samannāgato niyato, viparīto aniyato.
atk-vin02a4:107_0: Sāvakā bhabbāpattikā nāma, buddhā ca paccekabuddhā ca abhabbāpattikā nāma. Ukkhepanīyakammakato
atk-vin02a4:107_1: ukkhittako nāma, avasesacatubbidhatajjanīyādikammakato anukkhittako nāma. Ayañhi
atk-vin02a4:107_2: uposathaṃ vā pavāraṇaṃ vā dhammaparibhogaṃ vā āmisaparibhogaṃ vā na kopeti. “Mettiyaṃ
atk-vin02a4:107_3: bhikkhuniṃ nāsetha, dūsako nāsetabbo, kaṇṭako samaṇuddeso nāsetabbo”ti evaṃ liṅgadaṇḍakamma-saṃvāsanāsanāhi
atk-vin02a4:107_4: nāsitabbo nāsitako nāma. Sesā sabbe anāsitakā. Yena saddhiṃ uposathādiko saṃvāso
atk-vin02a4:107_5: atthi, ayaṃ samānasaṃvāsako, itaro nānāsaṃvāsako. So kammanānāsaṃvāsako laddhinānāsaṃvāsakoti
atk-vin02a4:107_6: duvidho hoti. Ṭhapanaṃ jānitabbanti “ekaṃ bhikkhave adhammikaṃ pātimokkhaṭṭhapana”ntiādinā
atk-vin02a4:110_0: 322. Dukesu sacittakā āpatti saññāvimokkhā, acittakā nosaññāvimokkhā. Laddhasamāpattikassa
atk-vin02a4:110_1: āpatti nāma bhūtārocanāpatti, aladdhasamāpattikassa āpatti nāma abhūtārocanāpatti.
atk-vin02a4:110_2: Saddhammapaṭisaññuttā nāma padasodhammādikā, asaddhammapaṭisaññuttā nāma duṭṭhullavācāpatti.
atk-vin02a4:110_3: Saparikkhārapaṭisaññuttā nāma nissaggiyavatthuno anissajjitvā paribhoge, pattacīvarānaṃ
atk-vin02a4:110_4: nidahane, kiliṭṭhacīvarānaṃ adhovane, malaggahitapattassa apacaneti evaṃ ayuttaparibhoge
atk-vin02a4:110_5: āpatti. Paraparikkhārapaṭisaññuttā nāma saṅghikamañcapīṭhādīnaṃ ajjhokāse santharaṇaanāpucchāgamanādīsu
atk-vin02a4:110_6: āpajjitabbā āpatti. Sapuggalapaṭisaññuttā nāma “mudupiṭṭhikassa lambissa ūrunā aṅgajātaṃ
atk-vin02a4:110_7: pīḷentassā”tiādinā nayena vuttāpatti. Parapuggalapaṭisaññuttā nāma methunadhammakāyasaṃsaggapahāradānādīsu
atk-vin02a4:110_9: pācittiya”nti musā bhaṇanto lahukaṃ. Abhūtārocane musā bhaṇanto garukaṃ. Bhūtārocane
atk-vin02a4:111_0: “Saṅghakammaṃ vaggaṃ karissāmī”ti antosīmāya ekamante nisīdanto bhūmigato āpajjati
atk-vin02a4:111_1: nāma. Sace pana aṅgulimattampi ākāse tiṭṭheyya, na āpajjeyya, tena vuttaṃ “no vehāsagato”ti.
atk-vin02a4:111_2: Vehāsakuṭiyā āhaccapādakaṃ mañcaṃ vā pīṭhaṃ vā abhinisīdanto vehāsagato āpajjati
atk-vin02a4:111_3: nāma. Sace pana taṃ bhūmiyaṃ paññāpetvā nipajjeyya na āpajjeyya, tena vuttaṃ – “no
atk-vin02a4:111_4: bhūmigato”ti. Gamiyo gamiyavattaṃ apūretvā gacchanto nikkhamanto āpajjati nāma, no
atk-vin02a4:111_5: pavisanto. Āgantuko āgantukavattaṃ apūretvā sachattupāhano pavisanto pavisanto āpajjati
atk-vin02a4:112_0: Ādiyanto āpajjati nāma bhikkhunī atigambhīraṃ udakasuddhikaṃ ādiyamānā; dubbaṇṇakaraṇaṃ
atk-vin02a4:112_1: anādiyitvā cīvaraṃ paribhuñjanto pana anādiyanto āpajjati nāma. Mūgabbatādīni titthiyavattāni
atk-vin02a4:112_2: samādiyanto samādiyanto āpajjati nāma. Pārivāsikādayo pana tajjanīyādikammakatā vā
atk-vin02a4:112_3: attano vattaṃ asamādiyantā āpajjanti, te sandhāya vuttaṃ “atthāpatti na samādiyanto
atk-vin02a4:112_4: āpajjatī”ti. Aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā cīvaraṃ sibbanto vejjakammabhaṇḍāgārikakammacittakammādīni
atk-vin02a4:112_5: vā karonto karonto āpajjati nāma. Upajjhāyavattādīni akaronto akaronto āpajjati nāma.
atk-vin02a4:112_6: Aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā cīvaraṃ dadamāno dento āpajjati nāma. Saddhivihārikaantevāsikānaṃ
atk-vin02a4:112_7: cīvarādīni adento adento āpajjati nāma. Aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā cīvaraṃ gaṇhanto paṭiggaṇhanto
atk-vin02a4:112_8: āpajjati nāma. “Na bhikkhave ovādo na gahetabbo”ti vacanato ovādaṃ agaṇhanto na paṭiggaṇhanto āpajjati nāma.
atk-vin02a4:113_0: Nissaggiyavatthuṃ anissajjitvā paribhuñjanto paribhogena āpajjati nāma. Pañcāhikaṃ
atk-vin02a4:113_1: saṅghāṭicāraṃ atikkāmayamānā aparibhogena āpajjati nāma. Sahagāraseyyaṃ rattiṃ āpajjati
atk-vin02a4:113_2: nāma, no divā, dvāraṃ asaṃvaritvā paṭisallīyanto divā āpajjati, no rattiṃ. Ekarattachārattasattāhadasāhamāsātikkamesu
atk-vin02a4:113_3: vuttaāpattiṃ āpajjanto aruṇugge āpajjati nāma, pavāretvā bhuñjanto na aruṇugge āpajjati nāma.
atk-vin02a4:114_0: Bhūtagāmañceva aṅgajātañca chindanto chindanto āpajjati nāma, kese vā nakhe vā na
atk-vin02a4:114_1: chindanto na chindanto āpajjati nāma. Āpattiṃ chādento chādento āpajjati nāma, “tiṇena
atk-vin02a4:114_2: vā paṇṇena vā paṭicchādetvā āgantabbaṃ, natveva naggena āgantabbaṃ, yo āgaccheyya
atk-vin02a4:114_3: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti imaṃ pana āpattiṃ na chādento āpajjati nāma. Kusacīrādīni dhārento
atk-vin02a4:114_4: dhārento āpajjati nāma, “ayaṃ te bhikkhu patto yāva bhedanāya dhāretabbo”ti imaṃ
atk-vin02a4:115_0: “Attanā vā attānaṃ nānāsaṃvāsakaṃ karotī”ti ekasīmāyaṃ dvīsu saṅghesu nisinnesu ekasmiṃ
atk-vin02a4:115_1: pakkhe nisīditvā parapakkhassa laddhiṃ gaṇhanto yasmiṃ pakkhe nisinno tesaṃ attanāva
atk-vin02a4:115_2: attānaṃ nānāsaṃvāsakaṃ karoti nāma. Yesaṃ santike nisinno tesaṃ gaṇapūrako hutvā
atk-vin02a4:115_3: kammaṃ kopeti, itaresaṃ hatthapāsaṃ anāgatattā. Samānasaṃvāsakepi eseva nayo. Yesañhi
atk-vin02a4:115_4: so laddhiṃ roceti, tesaṃ samānasaṃvāsako hoti, itaresaṃ nānāsaṃvāsako. Satta āpattiyo
atk-vin02a4:115_5: satta āpattikkhandhāti āpajjitabbato āpattiyo, rāsaṭṭhena khandhāti evaṃ dveyeva
atk-vin02a4:115_6: nāmāni hontīti nāmavasena dukaṃ dassitaṃ. Kammena vā salākaggāhena vāti ettha uddeso
atk-vin02a4:115_7: ceva kammañca ekaṃ, vohāro ceva anussāvanā ca salākaggāho ca ekaṃ, vohārānussāvanasalākaggāhā
atk-vin02a4:116_0: Addhānahīno nāma ūnavīsativasso. Aṅgahīno nāma hatthacchinnādibhedo. Vatthuvipanno
atk-vin02a4:116_1: nāma paṇḍako tiracchānagato ubhatobyañjanako ca. Avasesā theyyasaṃvāsakādayo aṭṭha
atk-vin02a4:116_2: abhabbapuggalā karaṇadukkaṭakā nāma. Dukkaṭakiriyā dukkaṭakammā, imasmiṃyeva attabhāve
atk-vin02a4:116_3: katena attano kammena abhabbaṭṭhānaṃ pattāti attho. Aparipūro nāma aparipuṇṇapattacīvaro.
atk-vin02a4:116_4: No ca yācati nāma upasampadaṃ na yācati. Alajjissa ca bālassa cāti alajjī sacepi
atk-vin02a4:116_5: tepiṭako hoti, bālo ca sacepi saṭṭhivasso hoti, ubhopi nissāya na vatthabbaṃ. Bālassa
atk-vin02a4:116_6: ca lajjissa cāti ettha bālassa “tvaṃ nissayaṃ gaṇhā”ti āṇāyapi nissayo dātabbo, lajjissa
atk-vin02a4:116_7: pana yācantasseva. Sātisāranti sadosaṃ; yaṃ ajjhācaranto āpattiṃ āpajjati.
atk-vin02a4:117_0: Kāyena paṭikkosanā nāma hatthavikārādīhi paṭikkosanā. Kāyena paṭijānātīti hatthavikārādīhi
atk-vin02a4:117_1: paṭijānāti. Upaghātikā nāma upaghātā. Sikkhūpaghātikā nāma sikkhūpaghāto. Bhogūpaghātikā
atk-vin02a4:117_2: nāma paribhogūpaghāto, tattha tisso sikkhā asikkhato sikkhūpaghātikāti veditabbā.
atk-vin02a4:117_3: Saṅghikaṃ vā puggalikaṃ vā dupparibhogaṃ bhuñjato bhogūpaghātikāti veditabbā. Dve
atk-vin02a4:117_4: venayikāti dve atthā vinayasiddhā. Paññattaṃ nāma sakale vinayapiṭake kappiyākappiyavasena
atk-vin02a4:117_5: paññattaṃ. Paññattānulomaṃ nāma catūsu mahāpadesesu daṭṭhabbaṃ. Setughātoti paccayaghāto;
atk-vin02a4:117_6: yena cittena akappiyaṃ kareyya, tassa cittassāpi anuppādananti attho. Mattakāritāti
atk-vin02a4:117_7: mattāya pamāṇena karaṇaṃ; pamāṇe ṭhānanti attho. Kāyena āpajjatīti kāyadvārikaṃ kāyena
atk-vin02a4:117_8: āpajjati; vacīdvārikaṃ vācāya. Kāyena vuṭṭhātīti tiṇavatthārakasamathe vināpi desanāya
atk-vin02a4:117_9: kāyeneva vuṭṭhāti; desetvā vuṭṭhahanto pana vācāya vuṭṭhāti. Abbhantaraparibhogo
atk-vin02a4:118_0: Anāgataṃ bhāraṃ vahatīti atherova samāno therehi vahitabbaṃ bījanagāhadhammajjhesanādibhāraṃ
atk-vin02a4:118_1: vahati; taṃ nittharituṃ vīriyaṃ ārabhati. Āgataṃ bhāraṃ na vahatīti thero therakiccaṃ
atk-vin02a4:118_2: na karoti, “anujānāmi bhikkhave therena bhikkhunā sāmaṃ vā dhammaṃ bhāsituṃ, paraṃ
atk-vin02a4:118_3: vā ajjhesituṃ, anujānāmi bhikkhave therādheyyaṃ pātimokkha”nti evamādi sabbaṃ parihāpetīti
atk-vin02a4:118_4: attho. Na kukkuccāyitabbaṃ kukkuccāyatīti na kukkuccāyitabbaṃ kukkuccāyitvā karoti.
atk-vin02a4:118_5: Kukkuccāyitabbaṃ na kukkuccāyatīti kukkuccāyitabbaṃ na kukkuccāyitvā karoti. Etesaṃ
atk-vin02a4:118_6: dvinnaṃ divā ca ratto ca āsavā vaḍḍhantīti attho. Anantaradukepi vuttapaṭipakkhavasena
atk-vin02a4:118_7: attho veditabbo. Sesaṃ tattha tattha vuttanayattā uttānamevāti.
atk-vin02a4:121_0: 323. Tikesu atthāpatti tiṭṭhante bhagavati āpajjatīti atthi āpatti, yaṃ tiṭṭhante
atk-vin02a4:121_1: bhagavati āpajjatīti attho. Eseva nayo sabbattha. Tattha lohituppādāpattiṃ tiṭṭhante
atk-vin02a4:121_2: āpajjati. “Etarahi kho panānanda, bhikkhū aññamaññaṃ āvusovādena samudācaranti, na
atk-vin02a4:121_3: vo mamaccayena evaṃ samudācaritabbaṃ, navakena, ānanda, bhikkhunā thero bhikkhū ‘bhante’ti
atk-vin02a4:121_4: vā ‘āyasmā’ti vā samudācaritabbo”ti vacanato theraṃ āvusovādena samudācaraṇapaccayā
atk-vin02a4:121_5: āpattiṃ parinibbute bhagavati āpajjati, no tiṭṭhante. Imā dve āpattiyo ṭhapetvā avasesā
atk-vin02a4:122_0: Pavāretvā anatirittaṃ bhuñjanto āpattiṃ kāle āpajjati no vikāle. Vikālabhojanāpattiṃ
atk-vin02a4:122_1: pana vikāle āpajjati no kāle. Avasesā kāle ceva āpajjati vikāle ca. Sahagāraseyyaṃ
atk-vin02a4:122_2: rattiṃ āpajjati, dvāraṃ asaṃvaritvā paṭisallīyanaṃ divā. Sesā rattiñceva divā ca.
atk-vin02a4:122_3: “Dasavassomhi atirekadasavassomhī”ti bālo abyatto parisaṃ upaṭṭhāpento dasavasso
atk-vin02a4:122_4: āpajjati no ūnadasavasso. “Ahaṃ paṇḍito byatto”ti navo vā majjhimo vā parisaṃ upaṭṭhāpento
atk-vin02a4:122_5: ūnadasavasso āpajjati no dasavasso. Sesā dasavasso ceva āpajjati ūnadasavasso ca.
atk-vin02a4:122_6: “Pañcavassomhī”ti bālo abyatto anissāya vasanto pañcavasso āpajjati. “Ahaṃ paṇḍito
atk-vin02a4:122_7: byatto”ti navako anissāya vasanto ūnapañcavasso āpajjati. Sesaṃ pañcavasso ceva āpajjati
atk-vin02a4:122_8: ūnapañcavasso ca. Anupasampannaṃ padasodhammaṃ vācento, mātugāmassa dhammaṃ desento
atk-vin02a4:122_10: akusalacitto āpajjati, asañcicca sahagāraseyyādiṃ abyākatacitto āpajjati, yaṃ arahāva
atk-vin02a4:122_11: āpajjati, sabbaṃ abyākatacittova āpajjati, methunadhammādibhedamāpattiṃ sukhavedanāsamaṅgī
atk-vin02a4:122_12: āpajjati, duṭṭhadosādibhedaṃ dukkhavedanāsamaṅgī, yaṃ sukhavedanāsamaṅgī āpajjati,
atk-vin02a4:122_13: taṃyeva majjhatto hutvā āpajjanto adukkhamasukhavedanāsamaṅgī āpajjati.
atk-vin02a4:123_0: Tayo paṭikkhepāti buddhassa bhagavato tayo paṭikkhepā. Catūsu paccayesu mahicchatā
atk-vin02a4:123_1: asantuṭṭhitā kilesasallekhanapaṭipattiyā agopāyanā, ime hi tayo dhammā buddhena bhagavatā
atk-vin02a4:123_2: paṭikkhittā. Appicchatādayo pana tayo buddhena bhagavatā anuññātā, tena vuttaṃ “tayo anuññātā”ti.
atk-vin02a4:124_0: “Dasavassomhī”ti parisaṃ upaṭṭhāpento “pañcavassomhī”ti nissayaṃ agaṇhanto bālo āpajjati
atk-vin02a4:124_1: no paṇḍito, ūnadasavasso “byattomhī”ti bahussutattā parisaṃ upaṭṭhāpento ūnapañcavasso
atk-vin02a4:124_2: ca nissayaṃ agaṇhanto paṇḍito āpajjati no bālo; avasesaṃ paṇḍito ceva āpajjati bālo
atk-vin02a4:124_3: ca. Vassaṃ anupagacchanto kāḷe āpajjati no juṇhe; mahāpavāraṇāya appavārento juṇhe
atk-vin02a4:124_4: āpajjati no kāḷe; avasesaṃ kāḷe ceva āpajjati juṇhe ca. Vassūpagamanaṃ kāḷe kappati
atk-vin02a4:124_5: no juṇhe; mahāpavāraṇāya pavāraṇā juṇhe kappati no kāḷe; sesaṃ anuññātakaṃ kāḷe ceva kappati juṇhe ca.
atk-vin02a4:125_0: Kattikapuṇṇamāsiyā pacchime pāṭipadadivase vikappetvā ṭhapitaṃ vassikasāṭikaṃ nivāsento
atk-vin02a4:125_1: hemante āpajjati. Kurundiyaṃ pana “kattikapuṇṇamadivase apaccuddharitvā hemante āpajjatī”ti
atk-vin02a4:125_2: vuttaṃ, tampi suvuttaṃ. “Cātumāsaṃ adhiṭṭhātuṃ tato paraṃ vikappetu”nti hi vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:125_3: Atirekamāse sese gimhāne pariyesanto atirekaḍḍhamāse sese katvā nivāsento ca gimhe
atk-vin02a4:125_4: āpajjati nāma. Satiyā vassikasāṭikāya naggo kāyaṃ ovassāpento vasse āpajjati nāma.
atk-vin02a4:125_5: Pārisuddhiuposathaṃ vā adhiṭṭhānuposathaṃ vā karonto saṅgho āpajjati. Suttuddesañca
atk-vin02a4:125_6: adhiṭṭhānuposathañca karonto gaṇo āpajjati. Ekako suttuddesaṃ pārisuddhiuposathañca
atk-vin02a4:125_7: karonto puggalo āpajjati. Pavāraṇāyapi eseva nayo.
atk-vin02a4:126_0: Saṅghuposatho ca saṅghapavāraṇā ca saṅghasseva kappati. Gaṇuposatho ca gaṇapavāraṇā
atk-vin02a4:126_1: ca gaṇasseva kappati. Adhiṭṭhānuposatho ca adhiṭṭhānapavāraṇā ca puggalasseva kappati.
atk-vin02a4:126_2: “Pārājikaṃ āpannomhī”tiādīni bhaṇanto vatthuṃ chādeti na āpattiṃ, “methunaṃ dhammaṃ
atk-vin02a4:126_3: paṭisevi”ntiādīni bhaṇanto āpattiṃ chādeti no vatthuṃ, yo neva vatthuṃ na āpattiṃ
atk-vin02a4:127_0: Paṭicchādetīti paṭicchādi. Jantāgharameva paṭicchādi jantāgharapaṭicchādi. Itarāsupi
atk-vin02a4:127_1: eseva nayo. Dvāraṃ pidahitvā antojantāghare ṭhitena parikammaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati. Udake
atk-vin02a4:127_2: otiṇṇenāpi etadeva vaṭṭati. Ubhayattha khādituṃ bhuñjituṃ vā na vaṭṭati. Vatthapaṭicchādi
atk-vin02a4:127_3: sabbakappiyatāya paṭicchannena sabbaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati. Vahantīti yanti niyyanti; nindaṃ
atk-vin02a4:127_4: vā paṭikkosaṃ vā na labhanti. Candamaṇḍalaṃ abbhāmahikādhūmarajarāhuvimuttaṃ vivaṭaṃyeva
atk-vin02a4:127_5: virocati, na tesu aññatarena paṭicchannaṃ. Tathā sūriyamaṇḍalaṃ, dhammavinayopi vivaritvā
atk-vin02a4:128: Aññena bhesajjena karaṇīyena aññaṃ viññāpento gilāno āpajjati, na bhesajjena karaṇīyena bhesajjaṃ viññāpento agilāno āpajjati, avasesaṃ āpattiṃ gilāno ceva āpajjati agilāno ca.
atk-vin02a4:129_0: Anto āpajjati no bahīti anupakhajja seyyaṃ kappento anto āpajjati no bahi, bahi āpajjati
atk-vin02a4:129_1: no antoti saṅghikaṃ mañcādiṃ ajjhokāse santharitvā pakkamanto bahi āpajjati no anto,
atk-vin02a4:129_2: avasesaṃ pana anto ceva āpajjati bahi ca. Antosīmāyāti āgantuko āgantukavattaṃ adassetvā
atk-vin02a4:129_3: sachattupāhano vihāraṃ pavisanto upacārasīmaṃ okkantamattova āpajjati. Bahisīmāyāti
atk-vin02a4:129_4: gamiko dārubhaṇḍapaṭisāmanādigamikavattaṃ apūretvā pakkamanto upacārasīmaṃ atikkantamattova
atk-vin02a4:129_5: āpajjati. Avasesaṃ antosīmāya ceva āpajjati bahisīmāya ca. Sati vuḍḍhatare anajjhiṭṭho
atk-vin02a4:129_6: dhammaṃ bhāsanto saṅghamajjhe āpajjati nāma. Gaṇamajjhepi puggalasantikepi eseva
atk-vin02a4:129_7: nayo. Kāyena vuṭṭhātīti tiṇavatthārakasamathena vuṭṭhāti. Kāyaṃ acāletvā vācāya desentassa
atk-vin02a4:129_8: vācāya vuṭṭhāti. Vacīsampayuttaṃ kāyakiriyaṃ katvā desentassa kāyena vācāya vuṭṭhāti
atk-vin02a4:129_9: nāma. Saṅghamajjhe desanāgāminīpi vuṭṭhānagāminīpi vuṭṭhāti. Gaṇapuggalamajjhe pana
atk-vin02a4:130_0: Āgāḷhāya ceteyyāti āgāḷhāya daḷhabhāvāya ceteyya; tajjanīyakammādikatassa vattaṃ
atk-vin02a4:130_1: na pūrayato icchamāno saṅgho ukkhepanīyakammaṃ kareyyāti attho. Alajjī ca hoti bālo
atk-vin02a4:130_2: ca apakatatto cāti ettha bālo “ayaṃ dhammādhammaṃ na jānāti” apakatatto vā “āpattānāpattiṃ
atk-vin02a4:130_3: na jānātī”ti na ettāvatā kammaṃ kātabbaṃ; bālabhāvamūlakaṃ pana apakatattabhāvamūlakañca
atk-vin02a4:130_4: āpattiṃ āpannassa kammaṃ kātabbanti attho. Adhisīle sīlavipanno nāma dve āpattikkhandhe
atk-vin02a4:130_5: āpanno; ācāravipanno nāma pañca āpattikkhandhe āpanno; diṭṭhivipanno nāma antaggāhikāya
atk-vin02a4:130_6: diṭṭhiyā samannāgato. Tesaṃ āpattiṃ apassantānaṃ appaṭikarontānaṃ diṭṭhiñca anissajjantānaṃyeva kammaṃ kātabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:131_0: Kāyiko davo nāma pāsakādīhi jūtakīḷanādibhedo anācāro; vācasiko davo nāma mukhālambarakaraṇādibhedo
atk-vin02a4:131_1: anācāro; kāyikavācasiko nāma naccanagāyanādibhedo dvīhipi dvārehi anācāro. Kāyiko
atk-vin02a4:131_2: anācāro nāma kāyadvāre paññattasikkhāpadavītikkamo; vācasiko anācāro nāma vacīdvāre
atk-vin02a4:131_4: Kāyikena upaghātikenāti kāyadvāre paññattassa sikkhāpadassa asikkhanena, yo hi taṃ
atk-vin02a4:131_5: na sikkhati, so naṃ upaghāteti, tasmā tassa taṃ asikkhanaṃ “kāyikaṃ upaghātika”nti
atk-vin02a4:131_6: vuccati. Sesapadadvayepi eseva nayo. Kāyikena micchājīvenāti jaṅghapesanikādinā vā
atk-vin02a4:131_7: gaṇḍaphālanādinā vā vejjakammena; vācasikenāti sāsanauggahaṇaārocanādinā; tatiyapadaṃ
atk-vin02a4:132_0: Alaṃ bhikkhu mā bhaṇḍananti alaṃ bhikkhu mā bhaṇḍanaṃ kari, mā kalahaṃ, mā vivādaṃ
atk-vin02a4:132_1: karīti attho. Na voharitabbanti na kiñci vattabbaṃ; vadatopi hi tādisassa vacanaṃ
atk-vin02a4:132_2: na sotabbaṃ maññanti. Na kismiñci paccekaṭṭhāneti kismiñci bījanaggāhādike ekasmimpi
atk-vin02a4:132_3: jeṭṭhakaṭṭhāne na ṭhapetabboti attho. Okāsakammaṃ kārentassāti “karotu āyasmā okāsaṃ,
atk-vin02a4:132_4: ahaṃ taṃ vattukāmo”ti evaṃ okāsaṃ kārentassa. Nālaṃ okāsakammaṃ kātunti “kiṃ tvaṃ
atk-vin02a4:132_5: karissasī”ti okāso na kātabbo. Savacanīyaṃ nādātabbanti vacanaṃ na ādātabbaṃ, vacanampi
atk-vin02a4:132_6: na sotabbaṃ; yattha gahetvā gantukāmo hoti, na tattha gantabbanti attho.
atk-vin02a4:133_0: Tīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno vinayoti yaṃ so jānāti, so tassa vinayo nāma hoti;
atk-vin02a4:133_1: so na pucchitabboti attho. Anuyogo na dātabboti “idaṃ kappatī”ti pucchantassa pucchāya
atk-vin02a4:133_2: okāso na dātabbo, “aññaṃ pucchā”ti vattabbo. Iti so neva pucchitabbo nāssa pucchā
atk-vin02a4:133_3: sotabbāti attho. Vinayo na sākacchātabboti vinayapañho na sākacchitabbo, kappiyākappiyakathā na saṃsandetabbā.
atk-vin02a4:134_0: Idamappahāyāti etaṃ brahmacāripaṭiññātādikaṃ laddhiṃ avijahitvā. Suddhaṃ brahmacārinti
atk-vin02a4:134_1: khīṇāsavaṃ bhikkhuṃ. “Pātabyataṃ āpajjatī”ti pātabyabhāvaṃ paṭisevanaṃ āpajjati.
atk-vin02a4:134_2: “Idamappahāyā”ti vacanato pana taṃ brahmacāripaṭiññātaṃ pahāya khīṇāsavaṃ “musā mayā
atk-vin02a4:134_3: bhaṇitaṃ, khamatha me”ti khamāpetvā “natthi kāmesu doso”ti laddhiṃ vijahitvā gativisodhanaṃ
atk-vin02a4:134_4: kareyya. Akusalamūlānīti akusalāni ceva mūlāni ca, akusalānaṃ vā mūlāni akusalamūlāni.
atk-vin02a4:134_5: Kusalamūlesupi eseva nayo. Duṭṭhu caritāni virūpāni vā caritāni duccaritāni. Suṭṭhu
atk-vin02a4:134_6: caritāni sundarāni vā caritāni sucaritāni. Kāyena karaṇabhūtena kataṃ duccaritaṃ
atk-vin02a4:134_7: kāyaduccaritaṃ. Esa nayo sabbattha. Sesaṃ tattha tattha vuttanayattā uttānamevāti.
atk-vin02a4:137_0: 324. Catukkesu sakavācāya āpajjati paravācāya vuṭṭhātīti vacīdvārikaṃ padasodhammādibhedaṃ
atk-vin02a4:137_1: āpattiṃ āpajjitvā tiṇavatthārakasamathaṭṭhānaṃ gato parassa kammavācāya vuṭṭhāti.
atk-vin02a4:137_2: Paravācāya āpajjati sakavācāya vuṭṭhātīti pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge parassa
atk-vin02a4:137_3: kammavācāya āpajjati, puggalassa santike desento sakavācāya vuṭṭhāti. Sakavācāya
atk-vin02a4:137_4: āpajjati sakavācāya vuṭṭhātīti vacīdvārikaṃ padasodhammādibhedaṃ āpattiṃ sakavācāya
atk-vin02a4:137_5: āpajjati, desetvā vuṭṭhahantopi sakavācāya vuṭṭhāti. Paravācāya āpajjati paravācāya
atk-vin02a4:137_6: vuṭṭhātīti yāvatatiyakaṃ saṅghādisesaṃ parassa kammavācāya āpajjati, vuṭṭhahantopi
atk-vin02a4:137_7: parassa parivāsakammavācādīhi vuṭṭhāti. Tato paresu kāyadvārikaṃ kāyena āpajjati,
atk-vin02a4:137_8: desento vācāya vuṭṭhāti. Vacīdvārikaṃ vācāya āpajjati, tiṇavatthārake kāyena vuṭṭhāti.
atk-vin02a4:137_9: Kāyadvārikaṃ kāyenaāpajjati, tameva tiṇavatthārake kāyena vuṭṭhāti. Vacīdvārikaṃ
atk-vin02a4:137_10: vācāya āpajjati, tameva desento vācāya vuṭṭhāti. Saṅghikamañcassa attano paccattharaṇena
atk-vin02a4:137_11: anattharato kāyasamphusane lomagaṇanāya āpajjitabbāpattiṃ sahagāraseyyāpattiñca pasutto
atk-vin02a4:137_12: āpajjati, pabujjhitvā pana āpannabhāvaṃ ñatvā desento paṭibuddho vuṭṭhāti. Jagganto
atk-vin02a4:137_13: āpajjitvā pana tiṇavatthārakasamathaṭṭhāne sayanto paṭibuddho āpajjati pasutto vuṭṭhāti
atk-vin02a4:138_0: Acittakāpattiṃ acittako āpajjati nāma. Pacchā desento sacittako vuṭṭhāti. Sacittakāpattiṃ
atk-vin02a4:138_1: sacittako āpajjati nāma. Tiṇavatthārakaṭṭhāne sayanto acittako vuṭṭhāti. Sesapadadvayampi
atk-vin02a4:138_2: vuttānusāreneva veditabbaṃ. Yo sabhāgaṃ āpattiṃ deseti, ayaṃ desanāpaccayā dukkaṭaṃ
atk-vin02a4:138_3: āpajjanto pācittiyādīsu aññataraṃ deseti, tañca desento dukkaṭaṃ āpajjati. Taṃ pana
atk-vin02a4:138_4: dukkaṭaṃ āpajjanto pācittiyādito vuṭṭhāti. Pācittiyādito ca vuṭṭhahanto taṃ āpajjati.
atk-vin02a4:138_5: Iti ekassa puggalassa ekameva payogaṃ sandhāya “āpattiṃ āpajjanto desetī”ti idaṃ
atk-vin02a4:139_0: Kammacatukke pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissaggāpattiṃ kammena āpajjati, desento akammena
atk-vin02a4:139_1: vuṭṭhāti. Vissaṭṭhiādikaṃ akammena āpajjati, parivāsādinā kammena vuṭṭhāti. Samanubhāsanaṃ
atk-vin02a4:139_2: kammeneva āpajjati, kammena vuṭṭhāti. Sesaṃ akammena āpajjati, akammena vuṭṭhāti.
atk-vin02a4:140_0: Parikkhāracatukke paṭhamo sakaparikkhāro, dutiyo saṅghikova tatiyo cetiyasantako,
atk-vin02a4:140_1: catuttho gihiparikkhāro. Sace pana so pattacīvaranavakammabhesajjānaṃ atthāya āhaṭo
atk-vin02a4:140_2: hoti, avāpuraṇaṃ dātuṃ anto ṭhapāpetuñca vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a4:141_0: Sammukhācatukke pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissaggāpattiṃ saṅghassa sammukhā āpajjati,
atk-vin02a4:141_1: vuṭṭhānakāle pana saṅghena kiccaṃ natthīti parammukhā vuṭṭhāti. Vissaṭṭhiādikaṃ parammukhā
atk-vin02a4:141_2: āpajjati, saṅghassa sammukhā vuṭṭhāti. Samanubhāsanaṃ saṅghassa sammukhā eva āpajjati,
atk-vin02a4:141_3: sammukhā vuṭṭhāti. Sesaṃ sampajānamusāvādādibhedaṃ parammukhāva āpajjati, parammukhāva
atk-vin02a4:142_0: Liṅgapātubhāvenāti sayitasseva bhikkhussa vā bhikkhuniyā vā liṅgaparivatte jāte sahagāraseyyāpatti
atk-vin02a4:142_1: hoti idameva taṃ paṭicca vuttaṃ. Ubhinnampi pana asādhāraṇāpatti liṅgapātubhāvena
atk-vin02a4:142_2: vuṭṭhāti. Sahapaṭilābhacatukke yassa bhikkhuno liṅgaṃ parivattati, so saha liṅgapaṭilābhena
atk-vin02a4:142_3: paṭhamaṃ uppannavasena seṭṭhabhāvena ca purimaṃ purisaliṅgaṃ jahati, pacchime itthiliṅge
atk-vin02a4:142_5: bhikkhūti vā purisoti vā evaṃ pavattā paṇṇattiyo nirujjhanti, yāni bhikkhunīhi asādhāraṇāni
atk-vin02a4:142_6: chacattālīsa sikkhāpadāni tehi anāpattiyeva hoti. Dutiyacatukke pana yassā bhikkhuniyā
atk-vin02a4:142_7: liṅgaṃ parivattati, sā pacchāsamuppattiyā vā hīnabhāvena vā pacchimanti saṅkhyaṃ
atk-vin02a4:142_8: gataṃ itthiliṅgaṃ jahati, vuttappakārena purimanti saṅkhyaṃ gate purisaliṅge patiṭṭhāti.
atk-vin02a4:142_9: Vuttaviparītā viññattiyo paṭippassambhanti, bhikkhunīti vā itthīti vā evaṃ pavattā
atk-vin02a4:142_10: paṇṇattiyopi nirujjhanti, yāni bhikkhūhi asādhāraṇāni sataṃ tiṃsañca sikkhāpadāni,
atk-vin02a4:143_0: Cattāro sāmukkaṃsāti cattāro mahāpadesā, te hi bhagavatā anuppanne vatthumhi sayaṃ
atk-vin02a4:143_1: ukkaṃsitvā ukkhipitvā ṭhapitattā “sāmukkaṃsā”ti vuccanti. Paribhogāti ajjhoharaṇīyaparibhogā,
atk-vin02a4:143_2: udakaṃ pana akālikattā appaṭiggahitakaṃ vaṭṭati. Yāvakālikādīni appaṭiggahitakāni
atk-vin02a4:143_3: ajjhoharituṃ na vaṭṭanti. Cattāri mahāvikaṭāni kālodissattā yathāvutte kāle vaṭṭanti.
atk-vin02a4:143_4: Upāsako sīlavāti pañca vā dasa vā sīlāni gopayamāno.
atk-vin02a4:144_0: Āgantukādicatukke sachattupāhano sasīsaṃ pāruto vihāraṃ pavisanto tattha vicaranto
atk-vin02a4:144_1: ca āgantukova āpajjati, no āvāsiko. Āvāsikavattaṃ akaronto pana āvāsiko āpajjati,
atk-vin02a4:144_2: no āgantuko. Sesaṃ kāyavacīdvārikaṃ āpattiṃ ubhopi āpajjanti, asādhāraṇaṃ āpattiṃ
atk-vin02a4:144_3: neva āgantuko āpajjati, no āvāsiko. Gamiyacatukkepi gamiyavattaṃ apūretvā gacchanto
atk-vin02a4:144_4: gamiko āpajjati, no āvāsiko. Āvāsikavattaṃ akaronto pana āvāsiko āpajjati, no gamiko.
atk-vin02a4:144_5: Sesaṃ ubhopi āpajjanti, asādhāraṇaṃ ubhopi nāpajjanti. Vatthunānattatādicatukke catunnaṃ
atk-vin02a4:144_6: pārājikānaṃ aññamaññaṃ vatthunānattatāva hoti,naāpattinānattatā. Sabbāpi hi sā pārājikāpattiyeva.
atk-vin02a4:144_7: Saṅghādisesādīsupi eseva nayo. Bhikkhussa ca bhikkhuniyā ca aññamaññaṃ kāyasaṃsagge
atk-vin02a4:144_8: bhikkhussa saṅghādiseso bhikkhuniyā pārājikanti evaṃ āpattinānattatāva hoti, na vatthunānattatā,
atk-vin02a4:144_9: ubhinnampi hi kāyasaṃsaggova vatthu. Tathā “lasuṇakkhādane bhikkhuniyā pācittiyaṃ,
atk-vin02a4:144_10: bhikkhussa dukkaṭa”nti evamādināpettha nayena yojanā veditabbā. Catunnaṃ pārājikānaṃ
atk-vin02a4:144_11: terasahi saṅghādisesehi saddhiṃ vatthunānattatā ceva āpattinānattatā ca. Evaṃ saṅghādisesādīnaṃ
atk-vin02a4:144_12: aniyatādīhi. Ādito paṭṭhāya cattāri pārājikāni ekato āpajjantānaṃ bhikkhubhikkhunīnaṃ
atk-vin02a4:144_13: neva vatthunānattatā no āpattinānattatā. Visuṃ āpajjantesupi sesā sādhāraṇāpattiyo
atk-vin02a4:145_0: Vatthusabhāgādicatukke bhikkhussa ca bhikkhuniyā ca kāyasaṃsagge vatthusabhāgatā,
atk-vin02a4:145_1: no āpattisabhāgatā, catūsu pārājikesu āpattisabhāgatā, no vatthusabhāgatā. Esa nayo
atk-vin02a4:145_2: saṅghādisesādīsu. Bhikkhussa ca bhikkhuniyā ca catūsu pārājikesu vatthusabhāgatā
atk-vin02a4:145_3: ceva āpattisabhāgatā ca. Esa nayo sabbāsu sādhāraṇāpattīsu. Asādhāraṇāpattiyaṃ neva
atk-vin02a4:145_4: vatthusabhāgatā no āpattisabhāgatā. Yo hi purimacatukke paṭhamo pañho, so idha dutiyo;
atk-vin02a4:145_5: yo ca tattha dutiyo, so idha paṭhamo. Tatiyacatutthesu nānākaraṇaṃ natthi.
atk-vin02a4:146_0: Upajjhāyacatukke saddhivihārikassa upajjhāyena kattabbavattassa akaraṇe āpattiṃ upajjhāyo
atk-vin02a4:146_1: āpajjati, no saddhivihāriko upajjhāyassa kattabbavattaṃ akaronto saddhivihāriko āpajjati,
atk-vin02a4:146_2: no upajjhāyo; sesaṃ ubhopi āpajjanti, asādhāraṇaṃ ubhopi nāpajjanti. Ācariyacatukkepi eseva nayo.
atk-vin02a4:147: Ādiyantacatukke pādaṃ vā atirekapādaṃ vā sahatthā ādiyanto garukaṃ āpajjati, ūnakapādaṃ gaṇhāhīti āṇattiyā aññaṃ payojento lahukaṃ āpajjati. Etena nayena sesapadattayaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:148_0: Abhivādanārahacatukke bhikkhunīnaṃ tāva bhattagge navamabhikkhunito paṭṭhāya upajjhāyāpi
atk-vin02a4:148_1: abhivādanārahā no paccuṭṭhānārahā. Avisesena ca vippakatabhojanassa bhikkhussa yo
atk-vin02a4:148_2: koci vuḍḍhataro. Saṭṭhivassassāpi pārivāsikassa samīpagato tadahupasampannopi paccuṭṭhānāraho
atk-vin02a4:148_3: no abhivādanāraho. Appaṭikkhittesu ṭhānesu vuḍḍho navakassa abhivādanāraho ceva paccuṭṭhānāraho
atk-vin02a4:148_4: ca. Navako pana vuḍḍhassa neva abhivādanāraho na paccuṭṭhānāraho. Āsanārahacatukkassa
atk-vin02a4:148_5: paṭhamapadaṃ purimacatukke dutiyapadena, dutiyapadañca paṭhamapadena atthato sadisaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:149_0: Kālacatukke pavāretvā bhuñjanto kāle āpajjati no vikāle, vikālabhojanāpattiṃ vikāle
atk-vin02a4:149_1: āpajjati no kāle, sesaṃ kāle ceva āpajjati vikāle ca, asādhāraṇaṃ neva kāle no vikāle.
atk-vin02a4:149_2: Paṭiggahitacatukke purebhattaṃ paṭiggahitāmisaṃ kāle kappati no vikāle. Pānakaṃ vikāle
atk-vin02a4:149_3: kappati, punadivasamhi no kāle. Sattāhakālikaṃ yāvajīvikaṃ kāle ceva kappati vikāle
atk-vin02a4:149_4: ca. Attano attano kālātītaṃ yāvakālikādittayaṃ akappiyamaṃsaṃ uggahitakamappaṭiggahitakañca
atk-vin02a4:150_0: Paccantimacatukke samudde sīmaṃ bandhanto paccantimesu janapadesu āpajjati, no majjhimesu;
atk-vin02a4:150_1: pañcavaggena gaṇena upasampādento guṇaṅguṇūpāhanaṃ dhuvanahānaṃ cammattharaṇāni ca
atk-vin02a4:150_2: majjhimesu janapadesu āpajjati no paccantimesu. Imāni cattāri “idha na kappantī”ti
atk-vin02a4:150_3: vadantopi paccantimesu āpajjati, “idha kappantī”ti vadanto pana majjhimesu āpajjati.
atk-vin02a4:150_4: Sesāpattiṃ ubhayattha āpajjati, asādhāraṇaṃ na katthaci āpajjati. Dutiyacatukke pañcavaggena
atk-vin02a4:150_5: gaṇena upasampadādi catubbidhampi vatthu paccantimesu janapadesu kappati. “Idaṃ kappatī”ti
atk-vin02a4:150_6: dīpetumpi tattheva kappati no majjhimesu. “Idaṃ na kappatī”ti dīpetuṃ pana majjhimesu
atk-vin02a4:150_7: janapadesu kappati no paccantimesu. Sesaṃ “anujānāmi bhikkhave pañca loṇānī”tiādi
atk-vin02a4:150_8: anuññātakaṃ ubhayattha kappati. Yaṃ pana akappiyanti paṭikkhittaṃ, taṃ ubhayatthāpi na kappati.
atk-vin02a4:151_0: Antoādicatukke anupakhajja seyyādiṃ anto āpajjati no bahi, ajjhokāse saṅghikamañcādīni
atk-vin02a4:151_1: nikkhipitvā pakkamanto bahi āpajjati no anto, sesaṃ anto ceva bahi ca, asādhāraṇaṃ
atk-vin02a4:151_2: neva anto na bahi. Antosīmādicatukke āgantuko vattaṃ apūrento antosīmāya āpajjati,
atk-vin02a4:151_3: gamiyo bahisīmāya musāvādādiṃ antosīmāya ca bahisīmāya ca āpajjati,asādhāraṇaṃ na
atk-vin02a4:151_4: katthaci. Gāmacatukke antaragharapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ sekhiyapaññattiṃ gāme āpajjati no
atk-vin02a4:151_5: araññe. Bhikkhunī aruṇaṃ uṭṭhāpayamānā araññe āpajjati no gāme. Musāvādādiṃ gāme
atk-vin02a4:151_6: ceva āpajjati araññe ca, asādhāraṇaṃ na katthaci.
atk-vin02a4:152_0: Cattāro pubbakiccāti “sammajjanī padīpo ca udakaṃ āsanena cā”ti idaṃ catubbidhaṃ
atk-vin02a4:152_1: pubbakaraṇanti vuccatīti vuttaṃ. “Chandapārisuddhiutukkhānaṃ bhikkhugaṇanā ca ovādo”ti
atk-vin02a4:152_2: ime pana “cattāro pubbakiccā”ti veditabbā. Cattāro pattakallāti uposatho yāvatikā
atk-vin02a4:152_3: ca bhikkhū kammappattā te āgatā honti, sabhāgāpattiyo na vijjanti, vajjanīyā ca puggalā
atk-vin02a4:152_4: tasmiṃ na honti, pattakallanti vuccatīti. Cattāri anaññapācittiyānīti “etadeva paccayaṃ
atk-vin02a4:152_5: karitvā anaññaṃ pācittiya”nti evaṃ vuttāni anupakhajjaseyyākappanasikkhāpadaṃ “ehāvuso
atk-vin02a4:152_6: gāmaṃ vā nigamaṃ vā”ti sikkhāpadaṃ, sañcicca kukkuccaupadahanaṃ, upassutitiṭṭhananti
atk-vin02a4:152_7: imāni cattāri. Catasso bhikkhusammutiyoti “ekarattampi ce bhikkhu ticīvarena vippavaseyya
atk-vin02a4:152_8: aññatra bhikkhusammutiyā, aññaṃ navaṃ santhataṃ kārāpeyya aññatra bhikkhusammutiyā,
atk-vin02a4:152_9: tato ce uttari vippavaseyya aññatra bhikkhusammutiyā, duṭṭhullaṃ āpattiṃ anupasampannassa
atk-vin02a4:152_10: āroceyya aññatra bhikkhusammutiyā”ti evaṃ āgatā terasahi sammutīhi muttā sammutiyo.
atk-vin02a4:152_11: Gilānacatukke aññabhesajjena karaṇīyena lolatāya aññaṃ viññāpento gilāno āpajjati,
atk-vin02a4:152_12: abhesajjakaraṇīyena bhesajjaṃ viññāpento agilāno āpajjati, musāvādādiṃ ubhopi āpajjanti,
atk-vin02a4:152_13: asādhāraṇaṃ ubhopi nāpajjanti. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānamevāti.
atk-vin02a4:155_0: 325. Pañcakesu pañca puggalā niyatāti ānantariyānamevetaṃ gahaṇaṃ. Pañca chedanakā
atk-vin02a4:155_1: āpattiyo nāma pamāṇātikkante mañcapīṭhe nisīdanakaṇḍuppaṭicchādivassikasāṭikāsu sugatacīvare
atk-vin02a4:155_2: ca veditabbā. Pañcahākārehīti alajjitā, aññāṇatā, kukkuccappakatatā, akappiye kappiyasaññitā,
atk-vin02a4:155_3: kappiye akappiyasaññitāti imehi pañcahi. Pañca āpattiyo musāvādapaccayāti pārājikathullaccayadukkaṭasaṅghādisesapācittiyā.
atk-vin02a4:155_4: Anāmantacāroti “santaṃ bhikkhuṃ anāpucchā purebhattaṃ pacchābhattaṃ kulesu cārittaṃ
atk-vin02a4:155_5: āpajjeyyā”ti imassa āpucchitvā cārassa abhāvo. Anadhiṭṭhānanti “gaṇabhojane aññatra
atk-vin02a4:155_6: samayā”ti vuttaṃ samayaṃ adhiṭṭhahitvā bhojanaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ nāma; tathā akaraṇaṃ
atk-vin02a4:155_7: anadhiṭṭhānaṃ. Avikappanā nāma yā paramparabhojane vikappanā vuttā, tassā akaraṇaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:155_8: Imāni hi pañca piṇḍapātikassa dhutaṅgeneva paṭikkhittāni. Ussaṅkitaparisaṅkitoti
atk-vin02a4:155_9: ye passanti, ye suṇanti, tehi ussaṅkito ceva parisaṅkito ca. Api akuppadhammo khīṇāsavopi
atk-vin02a4:155_10: samāno, tasmā agocarā pariharitabbā. Na hi etesu sandissamāno ayasato vā garahato
atk-vin02a4:155_11: vā muccati. Sosānikanti susāne patitakaṃ. Pāpaṇikanti āpaṇadvāre patitakaṃ. Thūpacīvaranti
atk-vin02a4:155_12: vammikaṃ parikkhipitvā balikammakataṃ. Ābhisekikanti nahānaṭṭhāne vā rañño abhisekaṭṭhāne
atk-vin02a4:155_13: vā chaḍḍitacīvaraṃ. Bhatapaṭiyābhatanti susānaṃ netvā puna ānītakaṃ. Pañca mahācorā
atk-vin02a4:156_0: Pañcāpattiyo kāyato samuṭṭhantīti paṭhamena āpattisamuṭṭhānena pañca āpattiyo āpajjati,
atk-vin02a4:156_1: “bhikkhu kappiyasaññī saññācikāya kuṭiṃ karotī”ti evaṃ antarapeyyāle vuttāpattiyo.
atk-vin02a4:156_2: Pañca āpattiyo kāyato ca vācato cāti tatiyena āpattisamuṭṭhānena pañca āpattiyo āpajjati,
atk-vin02a4:156_3: “bhikkhu kappiyasaññī saṃvidahitvā kuṭiṃ karotī”ti evaṃ tattheva vuttā āpattiyo.
atk-vin02a4:157_1: tividhampi ekanti pañca. Yāvatatiyake pañcāti ukkhittānuvattikāya bhikkhuniyā yāvatatiyaṃ
atk-vin02a4:157_2: samanubhāsanāya appaṭinissajjantiyā pārājikaṃ thullaccayaṃ dukkaṭanti tisso, bhedakānuvattakādisamanubhāsanāsu
atk-vin02a4:157_3: saṅghādiseso, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge pācittiyaṃ. Adinnanti aññena adinnaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:157_4: Aviditanti paṭiggaṇhāmīti cetanāya abhāvena aviditaṃ. Akappiyanti pañcahi samaṇakappehi
atk-vin02a4:157_5: akappiyakataṃ; yaṃ vā panaññampi akappiyamaṃsaṃ akappiyabhojanaṃ. Akatātirittanti
atk-vin02a4:157_6: pavāretvā atirittaṃ akataṃ. Samajjadānanti naṭasamajjādidānaṃ. Usabhadānanti gogaṇassa
atk-vin02a4:157_7: antare usabhavissajjanaṃ. Cittakammadānanti āvāsaṃ kāretvā tattha cittakammaṃ kāretuṃ
atk-vin02a4:157_8: vaṭṭati. Idaṃ pana paṭibhānacittakammadānaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Imāni hi pañca kiñcāpi
atk-vin02a4:157_9: lokassa puññasammatāni, atha kho apuññāni akusalāniyeva. Uppannaṃ paṭibhānanti ettha
atk-vin02a4:157_10: paṭibhānanti kathetukamyatā vuccati. Ime pañca duppaṭivinodayāti na supaṭivinodayā;
atk-vin02a4:157_11: upāyena pana kāraṇena anurūpāhi paccavekkhanāanusāsanādīhi sakkā paṭivinodetunti attho.
atk-vin02a4:158_0: Sakacittaṃ pasīdatīti ettha imāni vatthūni – kaṭaandhakāravāsī phussadevatthero kira
atk-vin02a4:158_1: cetiyaṅgaṇaṃ sammajjitvā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā sinduvārakusumasanthatamiva
atk-vin02a4:158_2: samavippakiṇṇavālikaṃ cetiyaṅgaṇaṃ olokento buddhārammaṇaṃ pītipāmojjaṃ uppādetvā
atk-vin02a4:158_3: aṭṭhāsi. Tasmiṃ khaṇe māro pabbatapāde nibbattakāḷamakkaṭo viya hutvā cetiyaṅgaṇe
atk-vin02a4:158_4: gomayaṃ vippakiranto gato. Thero nāsakkhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇituṃ, sammajjitvā agamāsi.
atk-vin02a4:158_5: Dutiyadivasepi jaraggavo hutvā tādisameva vippakāraṃ akāsi. Tatiyadivase vaṅkapādaṃ
atk-vin02a4:158_6: manussattabhāvaṃ nimminitvā pādena parikasanto agamāsi. Thero “evarūpo bībhacchapuriso
atk-vin02a4:158_7: samantā yojanappamāṇesu gocaragāmesu natthi, siyā nu kho māro”ti cintetvā “mārosi
atk-vin02a4:158_8: tva”nti āha. “Āma, bhante, māromhi, na dāni te vañcetuṃ asakkhi”nti. “Diṭṭhapubbo
atk-vin02a4:158_9: tayā tathāgato”ti? “Āma, diṭṭhapubbo”ti. “Māro nāma mahānubhāvo hoti, iṅgha tāva
atk-vin02a4:158_10: buddhassa bhagavato attabhāvasadisaṃ attabhāvaṃ nimmināhī”ti? “Na sakkā, bhante,
atk-vin02a4:158_11: tādisaṃ rūpaṃ nimminituṃ; apica kho pana taṃsarikkhakaṃ patirūpakaṃ nimminissāmī”ti
atk-vin02a4:158_12: sakabhāvaṃ vijahitvā buddharūpasadisena attabhāvena aṭṭhāsi. Thero māraṃ oloketvā
atk-vin02a4:158_13: “ayaṃ tāva sarāgadosamoho evaṃ sobhati, kathaṃ nu kho bhagavā na sobhati sabbaso
atk-vin02a4:158_14: vītarāgadosamoho”ti buddhārammaṇaṃ pītiṃ paṭilabhitvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ
atk-vin02a4:158_15: pāpuṇi. Māro “vañcitomhi tayā, bhante”ti āha. Theropi “kiṃ atthi jaramāra, tādisaṃ
atk-vin02a4:158_16: vañcetu”nti āha. Lokantaravihārepi datto nāma daharabhikkhu cetiyaṅgaṇaṃ sammajjitvā
atk-vin02a4:158_17: olokento odātakasiṇaṃ paṭilabhi. Aṭṭha samāpattiyo nibbattesi. Tato vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā
atk-vin02a4:159_0: Paracittaṃ pasīdatīti ettha imāni vatthūni – tisso nāma daharabhikkhu jambukolacetiyaṅgaṇaṃ
atk-vin02a4:159_1: sammajjitvā saṅkārachaḍḍaniṃ hatthena gahetvāva aṭṭhāsi. Tasmiṃ khaṇe tissadattatthero
atk-vin02a4:159_2: nāma nāvāto oruyha cetiyaṅgaṇaṃ olokento bhāvitacittena sammaṭṭhaṭṭhānanti ñatvā
atk-vin02a4:159_3: pañhāsahassaṃ pucchi, itaro sabbaṃ vissajjesi. Aññatarasmimpi vihāre thero cetiyaṅgaṇaṃ
atk-vin02a4:159_4: sammajjitvā vattaṃ paricchindi. Yonakavisayato cetiyavandakā cattāro therā āgantvā
atk-vin02a4:159_5: cetiyaṅgaṇaṃ disvā anto appavisitvā dvāreyeva ṭhatvā eko thero aṭṭha kappe anussari,
atk-vin02a4:159_6: eko soḷasa, eko vīsati, eko tiṃsa kappe anussari.
atk-vin02a4:160_0: Devatā attamanā hontīti ettha idaṃ vatthu – ekasmiṃ kira vihāre eko bhikkhu cetiyaṅgaṇañca
atk-vin02a4:160_1: bodhiyaṅgaṇañca sammajjitvā nahāyituṃ gato. Devatā “imassa vihārassa katakālato paṭṭhāya
atk-vin02a4:160_2: evaṃ vattaṃ pūretvā sammaṭṭhapubbo bhikkhu natthī”ti pasannacittā pupphahatthā aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-vin02a4:160_3: Thero āgantvā “kataragāmavāsikātthā”ti āha. “Bhante, idheva vasāma, imassa vihārassa
atk-vin02a4:160_4: katakālato paṭṭhāya evaṃ vattaṃ pūretvā sammaṭṭhapubbo bhikkhu natthīti tumhākaṃ,
atk-vin02a4:160_5: bhante, vatte pasīditvā pupphahatthā ṭhitāmhā”ti devatā āhaṃsu.
atk-vin02a4:161_0: Pāsādikasaṃvattanikanti ettha idaṃ vatthu – ekaṃ kira amaccaputtaṃ abhayattherañca
atk-vin02a4:161_1: ārabbha ayaṃ kathā udapādi “kiṃ nu kho amaccaputto pāsādiko, abhayattheroti ubhopi
atk-vin02a4:161_2: ne ekasmiṃ ṭhāne olokessāmā”ti. Ñātakā amaccaputtaṃ alaṅkaritvā mahācetiyaṃ vandāpessāmāti
atk-vin02a4:161_3: agamaṃsu. Theramātāpi pāsādikaṃ cīvaraṃ kāretvā puttassa pahiṇi, “putto me kese chindāpetvā
atk-vin02a4:161_4: imaṃ cīvaraṃ pārupitvā bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto mahācetiyaṃ vandatū”ti. Amaccaputto
atk-vin02a4:161_5: ñātiparivuto pācīnadvārena cetiyaṅgaṇaṃ āruḷho, abhayatthero bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto
atk-vin02a4:161_6: dakkhiṇadvārena cetiyaṅgaṇaṃ āruhitvā cetiyaṅgaṇe tena saddhiṃ samāgantvā āha – “kiṃ
atk-vin02a4:161_7: tvaṃ, āvuso, mahallakattherassa sammaṭṭhaṭṭhāne kacavaraṃ chaḍḍetvā mayā saddhiṃ
atk-vin02a4:161_8: yugaggāhaṃ gaṇhāsī”ti. Atītattabhāve kira abhayatthero mahallakatthero nāma hutvā
atk-vin02a4:161_9: gocaragāme cetiyaṅgaṇaṃ sammajji, amaccaputto mahāupāsako hutvā sammaṭṭhaṭṭhāne kacavaraṃ gahetvā chaḍḍesi.
atk-vin02a4:162_0: Satthusāsanaṃ kataṃ hotīti idaṃ sammajjanavattaṃ nāma buddhehi vaṇṇitaṃ, tasmā taṃ
atk-vin02a4:162_1: karontena satthusāsanaṃ kataṃ hoti. Tatridaṃ vatthu – āyasmā kira sāriputto himavantaṃ
atk-vin02a4:162_2: gantvā ekasmiṃ pabbhāre asammajjitvāva nirodhaṃ samāpajjitvā nisīdi. Bhagavā āvajjanto
atk-vin02a4:162_3: therassa asammajjitvā nisinnabhāvaṃ ñatvā ākāsena gantvā therassa purato asammaṭṭhaṭṭhāne
atk-vin02a4:162_4: pādāni dassetvā paccāgañchi. Thero samāpattito vuṭṭhito bhagavato pādāni disvā balavahirottappaṃ
atk-vin02a4:162_5: paccupaṭṭhāpetvā jaṇṇukehi patiṭṭhāya “asammajjitvā nisinnabhāvaṃ vata me satthā
atk-vin02a4:162_6: aññāsi, saṅghamajjhe dāni codanaṃ kāressāmī”ti dasabalassa santikaṃ gantvā vanditvā
atk-vin02a4:162_7: nisīdi. Bhagavā “kuhiṃ gatosi, sāriputtā”ti vatvā “na patirūpaṃ dāni te mayhaṃ anantare
atk-vin02a4:162_8: ṭhāne ṭhatvā vicarantassa asammajjitvā nisīditu”nti āha. Tato paṭṭhāya thero gaṇṭhikapaṭimuñcanaṭṭhānepi
atk-vin02a4:163_0: Attano bhāsapariyantaṃ na uggaṇhātīti “imasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ ettakaṃ suttaṃ upalabbhati,
atk-vin02a4:163_1: ettako vinicchayo, ettakaṃ suttañca vinicchayañca vakkhāmī”ti evaṃ attano bhāsapariyantaṃ
atk-vin02a4:163_2: na uggaṇhāti. “Ayaṃ codakassa purimakathā, ayaṃ pacchimakathā, ayaṃ cuditakassa purimakathā,
atk-vin02a4:163_3: ayaṃ pacchimakathā, ettakaṃ gayhūpagaṃ, ettakaṃ na gayhūpaga”nti evaṃ anuggaṇhanto
atk-vin02a4:163_4: pana parassa bhāsapariyantaṃ na uggaṇhāti nāma. Āpattiṃ na jānātīti pārājikaṃ vā
atk-vin02a4:163_5: saṅghādisesaṃ vāti sattannaṃ āpattikkhandhānaṃ nānākaraṇaṃ na jānāti. Mūlanti dve
atk-vin02a4:163_6: āpattiyā mūlāni kāyo ca vācā ca, tāni na jānāti. Samudayanti cha āpattisamuṭṭhānāni
atk-vin02a4:163_7: āpattisamudayo nāma, tāni na jānāti. Pārājikādīnaṃ vatthuṃ na jānātītipi vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-vin02a4:163_8: Nirodhanti ayaṃ āpatti desanāya nirujjhati, vūpasammati, ayaṃ vuṭṭhānenāti evaṃ āpattinirodhaṃ
atk-vin02a4:163_9: na jānāti. Satta samathe ajānanto pana āpattinirodhagāminipaṭipadaṃ na jānāti.
atk-vin02a4:164_0: Adhikaraṇapañcake adhikaraṇaṃ nāma cattāri adhikaraṇāni. Adhikaraṇassa mūlaṃ nāma
atk-vin02a4:164_1: tettiṃsa mūlāni – vivādādhikaraṇassa dvādasa mūlāni, anuvādādhikaraṇassa cuddasa,
atk-vin02a4:164_2: āpattādhikaraṇassa cha, kiccādhikaraṇassa ekaṃ; tāni parato āvi bhavissanti. Adhikaraṇasamudayo
atk-vin02a4:164_3: nāma adhikaraṇasamuṭṭhānaṃ. Vivādādhikaraṇaṃ aṭṭhārasa bhedakaravatthūni nissāya
atk-vin02a4:164_4: uppajjati; anuvādādhikaraṇaṃ catasso vipattiyo; āpattādhikaraṇaṃ sattāpattikkhandhe;
atk-vin02a4:164_5: kiccādhikaraṇaṃ cattāri saṅghakiccānīti imaṃ vibhāgaṃ na jānātīti attho. Adhikaraṇanirodhaṃ
atk-vin02a4:164_6: na jānātīti dhammena vinayena satthusāsanena mūlāmūlaṃ gantvā vinicchayasamathaṃ
atk-vin02a4:164_7: pāpetuṃ na sakkoti; “idaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ dvīhi, idaṃ catūhi, idaṃ tīhi idaṃ ekena samathena
atk-vin02a4:164_8: sammatī”ti evaṃ satta samathe ajānanto pana adhikaraṇanirodhagāminipaṭipadaṃ na jānāti
atk-vin02a4:164_9: nāma. Vatthuṃ na jānātīti “idaṃ pārājikassa vatthu, idaṃ saṅghādisesassā”ti evaṃ
atk-vin02a4:164_10: sattannaṃ āpattikkhandhānaṃ vatthuṃ na jānāti. Nidānanti “sattannaṃ nidānānaṃ idaṃ
atk-vin02a4:164_11: sikkhāpadaṃ ettha paññattaṃ, idaṃ etthā”ti na jānāti. Paññattiṃ na jānātīti tasmiṃ
atk-vin02a4:164_12: tasmiṃ sikkhāpade paṭhamapaññattiṃ na jānāti. Anupaññattinti punappunaṃ paññattiṃ
atk-vin02a4:164_14: na jānāti. Ñattiṃ na jānātīti sabbena sabbaṃ ñattiṃ na jānāti. Ñattiyā karaṇaṃ na
atk-vin02a4:164_15: jānātīti ñattikiccaṃ na jānāti, osāraṇādīsu navasu ṭhānesu ñattikammaṃ nāma hoti,
atk-vin02a4:164_16: ñattidutiyañatticatutthakammesu ñattiyā kammappatto hutvā tiṭṭhatīti na jānāti. Na
atk-vin02a4:164_17: pubbakusalo hoti na aparakusaloti pubbe kathetabbañca pacchā kathetabbañca na jānāti,
atk-vin02a4:164_18: ñatti nāma pubbe ṭhapetabbā, pacchā na ṭhapetabbātipi na jānāti. Akālaññū ca hotīti
atk-vin02a4:164_19: kālaṃ na jānāti, anajjhiṭṭho ayācito bhāsati, ñattikālampi ñattikhettampi ñattiokāsampi na jānāti.
atk-vin02a4:165_0: Mandattā momūhattāti kevalaṃ aññāṇena momūhabhāvena dhutaṅge ānisaṃsaṃ ajānitvā.
atk-vin02a4:165_1: Pāpicchoti tena araññavāsena paccayalābhaṃ patthayamāno. Pavivekanti kāyacittaupadhivivekaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:165_2: Idamatthitanti imāya kalyāṇāya paṭipattiyā attho etassāti idamatthi, idamatthino
atk-vin02a4:165_3: bhāvo idamatthitā; taṃ idamatthitaṃyeva nissāya na aññaṃ kiñci lokāmisanti attho.
atk-vin02a4:166_0: Uposathaṃ na jānātīti navavidhaṃ uposathaṃ na jānāti. Uposathakammanti adhammenavaggādibhedaṃ
atk-vin02a4:166_1: catubbidhaṃ uposathakammaṃ na jānāti. Pātimokkhanti dve mātikā na jānāti. Pātimokkhuddesanti
atk-vin02a4:166_2: sabbampi navavidhaṃ pātimokkhuddesaṃ na jānāti. Pavāraṇanti navavidhaṃ pavāraṇaṃ
atk-vin02a4:167_0: Apāsādikapañcake – apāsādikanti kāyaduccaritādi akusalakammaṃ vuccati. Pāsādikanti
atk-vin02a4:167_1: kāyasucaritādi kusalakammaṃ vuccati. Ativelanti velaṃ atikkamma bahutaraṃ kālaṃ kulesu
atk-vin02a4:167_2: appaṃ vihāreti attho. Otāroti kilesānaṃ anto otaraṇaṃ. Saṃkiliṭṭhanti duṭṭhullāpattikāyasaṃsaggādibhedaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:167_3: Visuddhipañcakepavāraṇāggahaṇena navavidhāpi pavāraṇā veditabbā. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānamevāti.
atk-vin02a4:170_0: 326. Chakkesu – cha sāmīciyoti “so ca bhikkhu anabbhito, te ca bhikkhū gārayhā, ayaṃ
atk-vin02a4:170_1: tattha sāmīci”, “yuñjantāyasmanto sakaṃ, mā vo sakaṃ vinassāti ayaṃ tattha sāmīci”,
atk-vin02a4:170_2: “ayaṃ te bhikkhu patto yāva bhedanāya dhāretabboti ayaṃ tattha sāmīci”, “tato nīharitvā
atk-vin02a4:170_3: bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ saṃvibhajitabbaṃ, ayaṃ tattha sāmīci”, “aññātabbaṃ paripucchitabbaṃ
atk-vin02a4:170_4: paripañhitabbaṃ, ayaṃ tattha sāmīci”, “yassa bhavissati so harissatīti ayaṃ tattha
atk-vin02a4:170_5: sāmīcī”ti imā bhikkhupātimokkheyeva cha sāmīciyo. Cha chedanakāti pañcake vuttā pañca
atk-vin02a4:170_6: bhikkhunīnaṃ udakasāṭikāya saddhiṃ cha. Chahākārehīti alajjitā aññāṇatā kukkuccapakatatā
atk-vin02a4:170_7: akappiye kappiyasaññitā kappiye akappiyasaññitā satisammosāti. Tattha ekarattachārattasattāhātikkamādīsu
atk-vin02a4:170_8: āpattiṃ satisammosena āpajjati. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva. Cha ānisaṃsā vinayadhareti pañcake
atk-vin02a4:170_9: vuttā pañca tassādheyyo uposathoti iminā saddhiṃ cha.
atk-vin02a4:171_0: Cha paramānīti “dasāhaparamaṃ atirekacīvaraṃ dhāretabbaṃ, māsaparamaṃ tena bhikkhunā
atk-vin02a4:171_1: taṃ cīvaraṃ nikkhipitabbaṃ, santaruttaraparamaṃ tena bhikkhunā tato cīvaraṃ sāditabbaṃ,
atk-vin02a4:171_2: chakkhattuparamaṃ tuṇhībhūtena uddissa ṭhātabbaṃ, navaṃ pana bhikkhunā santhataṃ
atk-vin02a4:171_3: kārāpetvā chabbassāni dhāretabbaṃ chabbassaparamatā dhāretabbaṃ, tiyojanaparamaṃ
atk-vin02a4:171_4: sahatthā dhāretabbāni, dasāhaparamaṃ atirekapatto dhāretabbo, sattāhaparamaṃ sannidhikārakaṃ
atk-vin02a4:171_5: paribhuñjitabbāni, chārattaparamaṃ tena bhikkhunā tena cīvarena vippavasitabbaṃ,
atk-vin02a4:171_7: mañcapaṭipādakaṃ, aṭṭhaṅgulaparamaṃ dantakaṭṭha”nti imāni cuddasa paramāni. Tattha
atk-vin02a4:171_8: paṭhamāni cha ekaṃ chakkaṃ, tato ekaṃ apanetvā sesesu ekekaṃ pakkhipitvātiādinā nayena
