atk-vin02a4:172_0: Cha āpattiyoti tīṇi chakkāni antarapeyyāle vuttāni. Cha kammānīti tajjanīya-niyassa-pabbājanīya-paṭisāraṇīyāni
atk-vin02a4:172_1: cattāri, āpattiyā adassane ca appaṭikamme ca vuttadvayampi ekaṃ, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā
atk-vin02a4:172_2: appaṭinissagge ekanti cha. Nahāneti orenaḍḍhamāsaṃ nahāne; vippakatacīvarādichakkadvayaṃ
atk-vin02a4:175_0: 327. Sattakesu – satta sāmīciyoti pubbe vuttesu chasu “sā ca bhikkhunī anabbhitā,
atk-vin02a4:175_1: tā ca bhikkhuniyo gārayhā, ayaṃ tattha sāmīcī”ti imaṃ pakkhipitvā satta veditabbā.
atk-vin02a4:175_2: Satta adhammikā paṭiññātakaraṇāti “bhikkhu pārājikaṃ ajjhāpanno hoti, pārājikena
atk-vin02a4:175_3: codiyamāno ‘saṅghādisesaṃ ajjhāpannomhī’ti paṭijānāti, taṃ saṅgho saṅghādisesena
atk-vin02a4:175_4: kāreti, adhammikaṃ paṭiññātakaraṇa”nti evaṃ samathakkhandhake niddiṭṭhā. Dhammikāpi
atk-vin02a4:175_5: tattheva niddiṭṭhā. Sattannaṃ anāpatti sattāhakaraṇīyena gantunti vassūpanāyikakkhandhake
atk-vin02a4:175_6: vuttaṃ. Sattānisaṃsā vinayadhareti “tassādheyyo uposatho pavāraṇā”ti imehi saddhiṃ
atk-vin02a4:175_7: pañcake vuttā pañca satta honti. Satta paramānīti chakke vuttāniyeva sattakavasena
atk-vin02a4:175_8: yojetabbāni. Katacīvarantiādīni dve sattakāni kathinakkhandhake niddiṭṭhāni.
atk-vin02a4:176_0: Bhikkhussa na hoti āpatti daṭṭhabbā, bhikkhussa hoti āpatti daṭṭhabbā, bhikkhussa
atk-vin02a4:176_1: hoti āpatti paṭikātabbāti imāni tīṇi sattakāni, dve adhammikāni, ekaṃ dhammikaṃ;
atk-vin02a4:176_2: tāni tīṇipi campeyyake niddiṭṭhāni. Asaddhammāti asataṃ dhammā, asanto vā dhammā;
atk-vin02a4:176_3: asobhanā hīnā lāmakāti attho. Saddhammāti sataṃ buddhādīnaṃ dhammā; santo vā dhammā
atk-vin02a4:176_4: sundarā uttamāti attho. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānamevāti.
atk-vin02a4:179_0: 328. Aṭṭhakesu – aṭṭhānisaṃseti “na mayaṃ iminā bhikkhunā saddhiṃ uposathaṃ karissāma,
atk-vin02a4:179_1: vinā iminā bhikkhunā uposathaṃ karissāma, na mayaṃ iminā bhikkhunā saddhiṃ pavāressāma,
atk-vin02a4:179_2: saṅghakammaṃ karissāma, āsane nisīdissāma, yāgupāne nisīdissāma, bhattagge nisīdissāma,
atk-vin02a4:179_3: ekacchanne vasissāma, yathāvuḍḍhaṃ abhivādanaṃ paccuṭṭhānaṃ añjalikammaṃ sāmīcikammaṃ
atk-vin02a4:179_4: karissāma, vinā iminā bhikkhunā karissāmā”ti evaṃ kosambakakkhandhake vutte ānisaṃse.
atk-vin02a4:179_5: Dutiyaaṭṭhakepi eseva nayo, tampi hi evameva kosambakakkhandhake vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:180_0: Aṭṭha yāvatatiyakāti bhikkhūnaṃ terasake cattāro, bhikkhunīnaṃ sattarasake bhikkhūhi
atk-vin02a4:180_1: asādhāraṇā cattāroti aṭṭha. Aṭṭhahākārehi kulāni dūsetīti kulāni dūseti pupphena
atk-vin02a4:180_2: vā phalena vā cuṇṇena vā mattikāya vā dantakaṭṭhena vā veḷuyā vā vejjikāya vā jaṅghapesanikena
atk-vin02a4:180_3: vāti imehi aṭṭhahi. Aṭṭha mātikā cīvarakkhandhake, aparā aṭṭha kathinakkhandhake
atk-vin02a4:180_4: vuttā. Aṭṭhahi asaddhammehīti lābhena alābhena yasena ayasena sakkārena asakkārena
atk-vin02a4:180_5: pāpicchatāya pāpamittatāya. Aṭṭha lokadhammā nāma lābhe sārāgo, alābhe paṭivirodho;
atk-vin02a4:180_6: evaṃ yase ayase, pasaṃsāya nindāya, sukhe sārāgo, dukkhe paṭivirodhoti. Aṭṭhaṅgiko
atk-vin02a4:180_7: musāvādoti “vinidhāya sañña”nti iminā saddhiṃ pāḷiyaṃ āgatehi sattahīti aṭṭhahi aṅgehi aṭṭhaṅgiko.
atk-vin02a4:183: Musā na bhāse na ca majjapo siyā;
atk-vin02a4:190_0: Evaṃ vuttāni aṭṭha. Aṭṭha dūteyyaṅgānīti “idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sotā ca hoti sāvetā
atk-vin02a4:190_1: cā”tiādinā nayena saṅghabhedake vuttāni. Titthiyavattāni mahākhandhake niddiṭṭhāni.
atk-vin02a4:190_2: Anatirittā ca atirittā ca pavāraṇāsikkhāpade niddiṭṭhā. Aṭṭhannaṃ paccuṭṭhātabbanti
atk-vin02a4:190_3: bhattagge vuḍḍhabhikkhunīnaṃ, āsanampi tāsaṃyeva dātabbaṃ. Upāsikāti visākhā. Aṭṭhānisaṃsā
atk-vin02a4:190_4: vinayadhareti pañcake vuttesu pañcasu “tassādheyyo uposatho, pavāraṇā, saṅghakamma”nti
atk-vin02a4:190_5: ime tayo pakkhipitvā aṭṭha veditabbā. Aṭṭha paramānīti pubbe vuttaparamāneva aṭṭhakavasena
atk-vin02a4:190_6: yojetvā veditabbāni. Aṭṭhasu dhammesu sammā vattitabbanti “na pakatattassa bhikkhuno
atk-vin02a4:190_7: uposatho ṭhapetabbo, na pavāraṇā ṭhapetabbā”tiādinā nayena samathakkhandhake niddiṭṭhesu
atk-vin02a4:193_0: 329. Navakesu – nava āghātavatthūnīti “anatthaṃ me acarī”tiādīni nava. Nava āghātapaṭivinayāti
atk-vin02a4:193_1: “anatthaṃ me acari, taṃ kutettha labbhāti āghātaṃ paṭivinetī”tiādīni nava. Nava vinītavatthūnīti
atk-vin02a4:193_2: navahi āghātavatthūhi ārati virati paṭivirati setughāto. Navahi saṅgho bhijjatīti
atk-vin02a4:193_3: “navannaṃ vā, upāli, atirekanavannaṃ vā saṅgharāji ceva hoti saṅghabhedo cā”ti. Nava
atk-vin02a4:193_4: paramānīti pubbe vuttaparamāneva navakavasena yojetvā veditabbāni. Nava taṇhāmūlakā
atk-vin02a4:193_5: nāma taṇhaṃ paṭicca pariyesanā, pariyesanaṃ paṭicca lābho, lābhaṃ paṭicca vinicchayo,
atk-vin02a4:193_6: vinicchayaṃ paṭicca chandarāgo, chandarāgaṃ paṭicca ajjhosānaṃ, ajjhosānaṃ paṭicca
atk-vin02a4:193_7: pariggaho, pariggahaṃ paṭicca macchariyaṃ, macchariyaṃ paṭicca ārakkhā, ārakkhādhikaraṇaṃ
atk-vin02a4:193_9: “seyyassa seyyohamasmī”timānādayo. Nava cīvarānīti ticīvaranti vā vassikasāṭikāti
atk-vin02a4:193_10: vātiādinā nayena vuttāni. Na vikappetabbānīti adhiṭṭhitakālato paṭṭhāya na vikappetabbāni.
atk-vin02a4:193_11: Nava adhammikāni dānānīti saṅghassa pariṇataṃ aññasaṅghassa vā cetiyassa vā puggalassa
atk-vin02a4:193_12: vā pariṇāmeti, cetiyassa pariṇataṃ aññacetiyassa vā saṅghassa vā puggalassa vā pariṇāmeti,
atk-vin02a4:193_13: puggalassa pariṇataṃ aññapuggalassa vā saṅghassa vā cetiyassa vā pariṇāmetīti evaṃ vuttāni.
atk-vin02a4:194_0: Nava paṭiggahaparibhogāti etesaṃyeva dānānaṃ paṭiggahā ca paribhogā ca. Tīṇi dhammikāni
atk-vin02a4:194_1: dānānīti saṅghassa ninnaṃ saṅghasseva deti, cetiyassa ninnaṃ cetiyasseva, puggalassa
atk-vin02a4:194_2: ninnaṃ puggalasseva detīti imāni tīṇi. Paṭiggahapaṭibhogāpi tesaṃyeva paṭiggahā ca
atk-vin02a4:194_3: paribhogā ca. Nava adhammikā saññattiyoti adhammavādipuggalo, adhammavādisambahulā,
atk-vin02a4:194_4: adhammavādisaṅghoti evaṃ tīṇi tikāni samathakkhandhake niddiṭṭhāni. Dhammikā saññattiyopi
atk-vin02a4:194_5: dhammavādī puggalotiādinā nayena tattheva niddiṭṭhā. Adhammakamme dve navakāni ovādavaggassa
atk-vin02a4:194_6: paṭhamasikkhāpadaniddese pācittiyavasena vuttāni. Dhammakamme dve navakāni tattheva
atk-vin02a4:197_0: 330. Dasakesu – dasa āghātavatthūnīti navakesu vuttāni nava “aṭṭhāne vā pana āghāto
atk-vin02a4:197_1: jāyatī”ti iminā saddhiṃ dasa honti. Āghātapaṭivinayāpi tattha vuttā nava “aṭṭhāne
atk-vin02a4:197_2: vā pana āghāto jāyati, taṃ kutettha labbhāti āghātaṃ paṭivinetī”ti iminā saddhiṃ
atk-vin02a4:197_3: dasa veditabbā. Dasa vinītavatthūnīti dasahi āghātavatthūhi viratisaṅkhātāni dasa.
atk-vin02a4:197_5: sammādiṭṭhi, “sassato loko”tiādinā vasena pana antaggāhikā diṭṭhi veditabbā. Dasa
atk-vin02a4:197_6: micchattāti micchādiṭṭhiādayo micchāvimuttipariyosānā, viparītā sammattā. Salākaggāhā
atk-vin02a4:198_0: Dasahaṅgehi samannāgato bhikkhu ubbāhikāya sammannitabboti “sīlavā hotī”tiādinā nayena
atk-vin02a4:198_1: samathakkhandhake vuttehi dasahi. Dasa ādīnavā rājantepurappavesane rājasikkhāpade
atk-vin02a4:198_2: niddiṭṭhā. Dasa dānavatthūnīti annaṃ pānaṃ vatthaṃ yānaṃ mālā gandhaṃ vilepanaṃ seyyāvasathaṃ
atk-vin02a4:198_3: padīpeyyaṃ. Dasa ratanānīti muttāmaṇiveḷuriyādīni. Dasa paṃsukūlānīti sosānikaṃ,
atk-vin02a4:198_4: pāpaṇikaṃ, undūrakkhāyitaṃ, upacikakkhāyitaṃ, aggidaḍḍhaṃ, gokhāyitaṃ, ajikakkhāyitaṃ,
atk-vin02a4:198_5: thūpacīvaraṃ, ābhisekiyaṃ, bhatapaṭiyābhatanti etesu upasampannena ussukkaṃ kātabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:198_6: Dasa cīvaradhāraṇāti “sabbanīlakāni cīvarāni dhārentī”ti vuttavasena dasāti kurundiyaṃ
atk-vin02a4:198_7: vuttaṃ. Mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “navasu kappiyacīvaresu udakasāṭikaṃ vā saṅkaccikaṃ
atk-vin02a4:199_0: Avandanīyapuggalā senāsanakkhandhake niddiṭṭhā. Dasa akkosavatthūni omasavāde niddiṭṭhāni.
atk-vin02a4:199_1: Dasa ākārā pesuññasikkhāpade niddiṭṭhā. Dasa senāsanānīti mañco, pīṭhaṃ, bhisi, bimbohanaṃ,
atk-vin02a4:199_2: cimilikā, uttarattharaṇaṃ, taṭṭikā, cammakhaṇḍo, nisīdanaṃ, tiṇasanthāro, paṇṇasanthāroti.
atk-vin02a4:199_3: Dasa varāni yāciṃsūti visākhā aṭṭha, suddhodanamahārājā ekaṃ, jīvako ekaṃ. Yāguānisaṃsā
atk-vin02a4:199_4: ca akappiyamaṃsāni ca bhesajjakkhandhake niddiṭṭhāni. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānamevāti.
atk-vin02a4:202_0: 331. Ekādasakesu – ekādasāti paṇḍakādayo ekādasa. Ekādasa pādukāti dasa ratanamayā,
atk-vin02a4:202_2: gacchanti. Ekādasa pattāti tambalohamayena vā dārumayena vā saddhiṃ dasa ratanamayā.
atk-vin02a4:202_3: Ekādasa cīvarānīti sabbanīlakādīni ekādasa. Yāvatatiyakāti ukkhittānuvattikā bhikkhunī,
atk-vin02a4:202_4: saṅghādisesā aṭṭha, ariṭṭho, caṇḍakāḷīti. Ekādasa antarāyikā nāma “nasi animittā”ti
atk-vin02a4:202_5: ādayo. Ekādasa cīvarāni adhiṭṭhātabbānīti ticīvaraṃ, vassikasāṭikā, nisīdanaṃ, paccattharaṇaṃ,
atk-vin02a4:202_7: Na vikappetabbānīti etāneva adhiṭṭhitakālato paṭṭhāya na vikappetabbāni. Gaṇṭhikā
atk-vin02a4:202_8: ca vidhā ca suttamayena saddhiṃ ekādasa honti, te sabbe khuddakakkhandhake niddiṭṭhā.
atk-vin02a4:202_9: Pathaviyo pathavisikkhāpade niddiṭṭhā. Nissayapaṭipassaddhiyo upajjhāyamhā pañca,
atk-vin02a4:202_10: ācariyamhā cha; evaṃ ekādasa. Avandiyapuggalā naggena saddhiṃ ekādasa, te sabbe senāsanakkhandhake
atk-vin02a4:202_11: niddiṭṭhā. Ekādasa paramāni pubbe vuttesu cuddasasu ekādasakavasena yojetvā veditabbāni.
atk-vin02a4:202_12: Ekādasa varānīti mahāpajāpatiyā yācitavarena saddhiṃ pubbe vuttāni dasa. Ekādasa
atk-vin02a4:202_13: sīmādosāti “atikhuddakaṃ sīmaṃ sammannantī”tiādinā nayena kammavagge āgamissanti.
atk-vin02a4:203_0: Akkosakaparibhāsake puggale ekādasādīnavā nāma “yo so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu akkosako
atk-vin02a4:203_1: paribhāsako ariyūpavādī, sabrahmacārīnaṃ aṭṭhānametaṃ anavakāso yaṃ so ekādasannaṃ
atk-vin02a4:203_2: byasanānaṃ aññataraṃ byasanaṃ na nigaccheyya. Katamesaṃ ekādasannaṃ? Anadhigataṃ
atk-vin02a4:203_3: nādhigacchati, adhigatā parihāyati, saddhammassa na vodāyanti, saddhammesu vā adhimāniko
atk-vin02a4:203_4: hoti, anabhirato vā brahmacariyaṃ carati, aññataraṃ vā saṃkiliṭṭhaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati,
atk-vin02a4:203_5: sikkhaṃ vā paccakkhāya hīnāyāvattati, gāḷhaṃ vā rogātaṅkaṃ phusati, ummādaṃ vā pāpuṇāti
atk-vin02a4:203_6: cittakkhepaṃ vā, sammūḷho kālaṃ karoti, kāyassa bhedā parammaraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ
atk-vin02a4:203_7: vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjatī”ti. Ettha ca saddhammoti buddhavacanaṃ adhippetaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:204: Āsevitāyāti ādito paṭṭhāya sevitāya. Bhāvitāyāti nipphāditāya vaḍḍhitāya
atk-vin02a4:205_0: Vā. Bahulīkatāyāti punappunaṃ katāya. Yānīkatāyāti suyuttayānasadisāya katāya. Vatthukatāyāti
atk-vin02a4:205_1: yathā patiṭṭhā hoti; evaṃ katāya. Anuṭṭhitāyāti anu anu pavattitāya; niccādhiṭṭhitāyāti
atk-vin02a4:205_2: attho. Paricitāyāti samantato citāya; sabbadisāsu citāya ācitāya bhāvitāya abhivaḍḍhitāyāti
atk-vin02a4:205_3: attho. Susamāraddhāyāti suṭṭhu samāraddhāya; vasībhāvaṃ upanītāyāti attho. Na pāpakaṃ
atk-vin02a4:205_4: supinanti pāpakameva na passati, bhadrakaṃ pana vuḍḍhikāraṇabhūtaṃ passati. Devatā
atk-vin02a4:205_5: rakkhantīti ārakkhadevatā dhammikaṃ rakkhaṃ paccupaṭṭhāpenti. Tuvaṭaṃ cittaṃ samādhiyatīti
atk-vin02a4:205_6: khippaṃ cittaṃ samādhiyati. Uttari appaṭivijjhantoti mettājhānato uttariṃ arahattaṃ
atk-vin02a4:205_7: asacchikaronto sekho vā puthujjano vā hutvā kālaṃ karonto brahmalokūpago hoti. Sesaṃ
atk-vin02a4:209_0: 332. “Uposathakammassa ko ādī”tiādīnaṃ pucchānaṃ vissajjane sāmaggī ādīti “uposathaṃ
atk-vin02a4:209_1: karissāmā”ti sīmaṃ sodhetvā chandapārisuddhiṃ āharitvā sannipatitānaṃ kāyasāmaggī
atk-vin02a4:209_2: ādi. Kiriyā majjheti pubbakiccaṃ katvā pātimokkhaosāraṇakiriyā majjhe. Niṭṭhānaṃ
atk-vin02a4:209_3: pariyosānanti “tattha sabbeheva samaggehi sammodamānehi avivadamānehi sikkhitabba”nti
atk-vin02a4:209_4: idaṃ pātimokkhaniṭṭhānaṃ pariyosānaṃ. Pavāraṇākammassa sāmaggī ādīti “pavāraṇaṃ karissāmā”ti
atk-vin02a4:209_5: sīmaṃ sodhetvā chandapavāraṇaṃ āharitvā sannipatitānaṃ kāyasāmaggī ādi. Kiriyā majjheti
atk-vin02a4:209_6: pavāraṇāñatti ca pavāraṇākathā ca majjhe, saṅghanavakassa “passanto paṭikarissāmī”ti
atk-vin02a4:209_7: vacanaṃ pariyosānaṃ. Tajjanīyakammādīsu vatthu nāma yena vatthunā kammāraho hoti,
atk-vin02a4:209_8: taṃ vatthu. Puggaloti yena taṃ vatthu kataṃ, so puggalo. Kammavācā pariyosānanti
atk-vin02a4:209_9: “kataṃ saṅghena itthannāmassa bhikkhuno tajjanīyakammaṃ, khamati saṅghassa, tasmā
atk-vin02a4:209_10: tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī”ti evaṃ tassā tassā kammavācāya avasānavacanaṃ pariyosānaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:212_0: 334. Atthavasapakaraṇe – dasa atthavasetiādīsu yaṃ vattabbaṃ taṃ paṭhamapārājikavaṇṇanāyameva
atk-vin02a4:212_1: vuttaṃ. Yaṃ saṅghasuṭṭhu taṃ saṅghaphāsūtiādīsu uparimaṃ uparimaṃ padaṃ heṭṭhimassa
atk-vin02a4:213_0: Atthasataṃ dhammasatantiādimhi pana yadetaṃ dasasu padesu ekekaṃ mūlaṃ katvā dasakkhattuṃ
atk-vin02a4:213_1: yojanāya padasataṃ vuttaṃ. Tattha pacchimassa pacchimassa padassa vasena atthasataṃ
atk-vin02a4:213_2: purimassa purimassa vasena dhammasataṃ veditabbaṃ. Atha vā ye dasa atthavase paṭicca
atk-vin02a4:213_3: tathāgatena sāvakānaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ, ye pubbe paṭhamapārājikavaṇṇanāyaṃ “tattha
atk-vin02a4:213_4: saṅghasuṭṭhutā nāma saṅghassa suṭṭhubhāvo ‘suṭṭhu devā’ti āgataṭṭhāne viya ‘suṭṭhu
atk-vin02a4:213_5: bhante’ti vacanasampaṭicchanabhāvo, yo ca tathāgatassa vacanaṃ sampaṭicchati, tassa
atk-vin02a4:213_6: taṃ dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāya hoti, tasmā saṅghassa ‘suṭṭhu bhante’ti mama vacanasampaṭicchanatthaṃ
atk-vin02a4:213_7: paññapessāmi asampaṭicchane ādīnavaṃ sampaṭicchane ca ānisaṃsaṃ dassetvā na balakkārena
atk-vin02a4:213_8: abhibhavitvāti etamatthaṃ āvikaronto āha – saṅghasuṭṭhutāyā”ti evamādinā nayena vaṇṇitā,
atk-vin02a4:213_9: tesaṃ idha dasakkhattuṃ āgatattā atthasataṃ tadatthajotakānañca padānaṃ vasena dhammasataṃ
atk-vin02a4:213_10: veditabbaṃ. Idāni atthajotakānaṃ niruttīnaṃ vasena niruttisataṃ, dhammabhūtānaṃ niruttīnaṃ
atk-vin02a4:213_11: vasena niruttisatanti dve niruttisatāni, atthasate ñāṇasataṃ, dhammasate ñāṇasataṃ,
atk-vin02a4:213_12: dvīsu niruttisatesu dve ñāṇasatānīti cattāri ñāṇasatāni ca veditabbāni.
atk-vin02a4:216: Iti hi yaṃ vuttaṃ, idametaṃ paṭicca vuttanti.
atk-vin02a4:221_0: 335. Ekaṃsaṃ cīvaraṃ katvāti ekasmiṃ aṃsakūṭe cīvaraṃ katvā; sādhukaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ
atk-vin02a4:221_1: katvāti attho. Paggaṇhitvāna añjalinti dasanakhasamodhānasamujjalaṃ añjaliṃ ukkhipitvā.
atk-vin02a4:221_2: Āsīsamānarūpo vāti paccāsīsamānarūpo viya. Kissa tvaṃ idha māgatoti kena kāraṇena
atk-vin02a4:221_3: kimatthaṃ patthayamāno tvaṃ idha āgato. Ko evamāha? Sammāsambuddho. Kaṃ evamāha?
atk-vin02a4:221_4: Āyasmantaṃ upāliṃ. Iti āyasmā upāli bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā “dvīsu vinayesū”ti
atk-vin02a4:221_5: imaṃ gāthaṃ pucchi. Athassa bhagavā “bhaddako te ummaṅgo”tiādīni vatvā taṃ vissajjesi.
atk-vin02a4:221_6: Esa nayo sabbattha. Iti ime sabbapañhe buddhakāle upālitthero pucchi. Bhagavā byākāsi.
atk-vin02a4:221_7: Saṅgītikāle pana mahākassapatthero pucchi. Upālitthero byākāsi.
atk-vin02a4:222_0: Tattha bhaddako te ummaṅgoti bhaddakā te pañhā; pañhā hi avijjandhakārato ummujjitvā
atk-vin02a4:222_1: ṭhitattā “ummaṅgo”ti vuccati. Tagghāti kāraṇatthe nipāto. Yasmā maṃ pucchasi, tasmā
atk-vin02a4:222_2: te ahamakkhissanti attho. Sampaṭicchanatthe vā, “tagghā”ti hi iminā vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā
atk-vin02a4:222_3: akkhissanti āha. “Samādahitvā visibbenti, sāmisena, sasitthaka”nti imāni tīṇiyeva
atk-vin02a4:224: 336. Yaṃ taṃ pucchimhāti yaṃ tvaṃ apucchimhā. Akittayīti abhāsi. Noti amhākaṃ. Taṃ taṃ byākatanti yaṃ yaṃ puṭṭhaṃ, taṃ tadeva byākataṃ. Anaññathāti aññathā akatvā byākataṃ.
atk-vin02a4:225_0: Ye duṭṭhullā sā sīlavipattīti ettha kiñcāpi sīlavipatti nāma pañhe natthi, atha kho
atk-vin02a4:225_1: duṭṭhullaṃ vissajjetukāmatāyetaṃ vuttaṃ. Catūsu hi vipattīsu duṭṭhullaṃ ekāya vipattiyā
atk-vin02a4:225_2: saṅgahitaṃ, aduṭṭhullaṃ tīhi vipattīhi saṅgahitaṃ. Tasmā “ye duṭṭhullā sā sīlavipattī”ti
atk-vin02a4:225_3: vatvā tameva vitthārato dassetuṃ “pārājikaṃ saṅghādiseso sīlavipattīti vuccatī”ti āha.
atk-vin02a4:226: Idāni tissannaṃ vipattīnaṃ vasena aduṭṭhullaṃ dassetuṃ “thullaccaya”ntiādimāha. Tattha yo cāyaṃ, akkosati hasādhippāyoti idaṃ dubbhāsitassa vatthudassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:227: Abbhācikkhantīti “tathāhaṃ bhagavatā dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāmī”ti vadantā abbhācikkhanti.
atk-vin02a4:228: Ayaṃ sā ājīvavipattisammatāti ayaṃ chahi sikkhāpadehi saṅgahitā ājīvavipatti nāma catutthā vipatti sammatāti ettāvatā “aduṭṭhulla”nti idaṃ vissajjitaṃ hoti.
atk-vin02a4:231_0: 337. Yasmā pana “ye ca yāvatatiyakā”ti ayaṃ pañho “ekādasa yāvatatiyakā”ti evaṃ saṅkhāvasena
atk-vin02a4:231_1: vissajjito, tasmā saṅkhānusandhivaseneva “kati chedanakānī”tiādike aññe antarāpañhe
atk-vin02a4:231_2: pucchi. Tesaṃ vissajjanatthaṃ “cha chedanakānī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha “ekaṃ bhedanakaṃ,
atk-vin02a4:231_3: ekaṃ uddālanakaṃ, sodasa jānanti paññattā”ti idameva apubbaṃ. Sesaṃ mahāvagge vibhattameva.
atk-vin02a4:231_4: Yaṃ panetaṃ apubbaṃ tattha ekaṃ bhedanakanti sūcigharaṃ. Ekaṃ uddālanakanti tūlonaddhamañcapīṭhaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:231_5: Sodasāti soḷasa. Jānanti paññattāti “jāna”nti evaṃ vatvā paññattā, te evaṃ veditabbā
atk-vin02a4:231_6: – “jānaṃ saṅghikaṃ lābhaṃ pariṇataṃ attano pariṇāmeyya, jānaṃ pubbupagataṃ bhikkhuṃ
atk-vin02a4:231_7: anupakhajja nisajjaṃ kappeyya, jānaṃ sappāṇakaṃ udakaṃ tiṇaṃ vā mattikaṃ vā siñceyya
atk-vin02a4:231_8: vā siñcāpeyya vā, jānaṃ bhikkhuniparipācitaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñjeyya, jānaṃ āsādanāpekkho
atk-vin02a4:231_9: bhuttasmiṃ pācittiyaṃ, jānaṃ sappāṇakaṃ udakaṃ paribhuñjeyya, jānaṃ yathādhammaṃ
atk-vin02a4:231_10: nihatādhikaraṇaṃ, jānaṃ duṭṭhullaṃ āpattiṃ paṭicchādeyya, jānaṃ ūnavīsativassaṃ puggalaṃ
atk-vin02a4:231_11: upasampādeyya, jānaṃ theyyasatthena saddhiṃ, jānaṃ tathāvādinā bhikkhunā akatānudhammena,
atk-vin02a4:231_12: jānaṃ tathānāsitaṃ samaṇuddesaṃ, jānaṃ saṅghikaṃ lābhaṃ pariṇataṃ puggalassa pariṇāmeyya,
atk-vin02a4:231_13: jānaṃ pārājikaṃ dhammaṃ ajjhāpannaṃ bhikkhuniṃ neva attanā paṭicodeyya, jānaṃ coriṃ
atk-vin02a4:231_14: vajjhaṃ viditaṃ anapaloketvā, jānaṃ sabhikkhukaṃ ārāmaṃ anāpucchā paviseyyā”ti.
atk-vin02a4:233_0: 338. Idāni “sādhāraṇaṃ asādhāraṇa”nti imaṃ purimapañhaṃ vissajjento “vīsaṃ dve satānī”tiādimāha.
atk-vin02a4:233_1: Tattha bhikkhunīhi asādhāraṇesu cha saṅghādisesāti vissaṭṭhi, kāyasaṃsaggo, duṭṭhullaṃ,
atk-vin02a4:233_2: attakāma, kuṭi, vihāroti. Dve aniyatehi aṭṭhāti dvīhi aniyatehi saddhiṃ aṭṭha ime.
atk-vin02a4:236: Chabbassāni nisīdanaṃ, dve lomā paṭhamo patto;
atk-vin02a4:244: Nisīdane ca yā sikkhā, vassikā yā ca sāṭikā;
atk-vin02a4:246_0: Bhikkhūhi asādhāraṇesupi saṅghamhā dasa nissareti “saṅghamhā nissārīyatī”ti evaṃ
atk-vin02a4:246_1: vibhaṅge vuttā, mātikāyaṃ pana “nissāraṇīyaṃ saṅghādisesa”nti evaṃ āgatā dasa. Nissaggiyāni
atk-vin02a4:246_2: dvādasāti bhikkhunivibhaṅge vibhattāni nissaggiyāneva. Khuddakāpi tattha vibhattakhuddakā
atk-vin02a4:246_3: eva. Tathā cattāro pāṭidesanīyā, iti satañceva tiṃsañca sikkhā vibhaṅge bhikkhunīnaṃ
atk-vin02a4:246_4: bhikkhūhi asādhāraṇā. Sesaṃ imasmiṃ sādhāraṇāsādhāraṇavissajjane uttānameva.
atk-vin02a4:247_0: Idāni vipattiyo ca “yehi samathehi sammantī”ti idaṃ pañhaṃ vissajjento aṭṭheva pārājikātiādimāha.
atk-vin02a4:247_1: Tattha durāsadāti iminā tesaṃ sappaṭibhayataṃ dasseti. Kaṇhasappādayo viya hi ete
atk-vin02a4:247_2: durāsadā durūpagamanā durāsajjanā, āpajjiyamānā mūlacchedāya saṃvattanti. Tālavatthusamūpamāti
atk-vin02a4:247_3: sabbaṃ tālaṃ uddharitvā tālassa vatthumattakaraṇena samūpamā. Yathā vatthumattakato
atk-vin02a4:247_4: tālo na puna pākatiko hoti, evaṃ na puna pākatikā honti.
atk-vin02a4:248_0: Evaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ upamaṃ dassetvā puna ekekassa vuttaṃ upamaṃ dassento paṇḍupalāsotiādimāha.
atk-vin02a4:248_1: Aviruḷhī bhavanti teti yathā ete paṇḍupalāsādayo punaharitādibhāvena aviruḷhidhammā
atk-vin02a4:248_2: honti; evaṃ pārājikāpi puna pakatisīlābhāvena aviruḷhidhammā hontīti attho. Ettāvatā
atk-vin02a4:248_3: “vipattiyo ca yehi samathehi sammantī”ti ettha imā tāva aṭṭha pārājikavipattiyo kehici
atk-vin02a4:248_4: samathehi na sammantīti evaṃ dassitaṃ hoti. Yā pana vipattiyo sammanti, tā dassetuṃ
atk-vin02a4:248_5: tevīsati saṅghādisesātiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha tīhi samathehīti sabbasaṅgāhikavacanametaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:248_6: Saṅghādisesā hi dvīhi samathehi sammanti, na tiṇavatthārakena. Sesā tīhipi sammanti.
atk-vin02a4:249_0: Dve uposathā dve pavāraṇāti idaṃ bhikkhūnañca bhikkhunīnañca vasena vuttaṃ. Vibhattimattadassaneneva
atk-vin02a4:249_1: cetaṃ vuttaṃ, na samathehi vūpasamanavasena. Bhikkhuuposatho, bhikkhuniuposatho,
atk-vin02a4:249_2: bhikkhupavāraṇā, bhikkhunipavāraṇāti imāpi hi catasso vibhattiyo; vibhajanānīti attho.
atk-vin02a4:249_3: Cattāri kammānīti adhammenavaggādīni uposathakammāni. Pañceva uddesā caturo bhavanti
atk-vin02a4:249_4: anaññathāti bhikkhūnaṃ pañca uddesā bhikkhunīnaṃ caturo bhavanti, aññathā na bhavanti;
atk-vin02a4:249_5: imā aparāpi vibhattiyo. Āpattikkhandhā ca bhavanti satta, adhikaraṇāni cattārīti
atk-vin02a4:249_6: imā pana vibhattiyo samathehi sammanti, tasmā sattahi samathehītiādimāha. Atha vā
atk-vin02a4:249_7: “dve uposathā dve pavāraṇā cattāri kammāni pañceva uddesā caturo bhavanti, anaññathā”ti
atk-vin02a4:249_8: imāpi catasso vibhattiyo nissāya “nassantete vinassantete”tiādinā nayena yā āpattiyo
atk-vin02a4:249_9: āpajjanti, tā yasmā vuttappakāreheva samathehi sammanti, tasmā taṃmūlakānaṃ āpattīnaṃ
atk-vin02a4:249_10: samathadassanatthampi tā vibhattiyo vuttāti veditabbā. Kiccaṃ ekenāti kiccādhikaraṇaṃ
atk-vin02a4:251_0: 339. Evaṃ pucchānukkamena sabbapañhe vissajjetvā idāni “āpattikkhandhā ca bhavanti
atk-vin02a4:251_1: sattā”ti ettha saṅgahitaāpattikkhandhānaṃ paccekaṃ nibbacanamattaṃ dassento pārājikantiādimāha.
atk-vin02a4:251_2: Tattha pārājikanti gāthāya ayamattho – yadidaṃ puggalāpattisikkhāpadapārājikesu āpattipārājikaṃ
atk-vin02a4:251_3: nāma vuttaṃ, taṃ āpajjanto puggalo yasmā parājito parājayamāpanno saddhammā cuto
atk-vin02a4:251_4: paraddho bhaṭṭho niraṅkato ca hoti, anihate tasmiṃ puggale puna uposathappavāraṇādibhedo
atk-vin02a4:251_5: saṃvāso natthi. Tenetaṃ iti vuccatīti tena kāraṇena etaṃ āpattipārājikanti vuccati.
atk-vin02a4:251_6: Ayañhettha saṅkhepattho – yasmā parājito hoti tena, tasmā etaṃ pārājikanti vuccati.
atk-vin02a4:252_0: Dutiyagāthāyapi byañjanaṃ anādiyitvā atthamattameva dassetuṃ saṅghova deti parivāsantiādi
atk-vin02a4:252_1: vuttaṃ. Ayaṃ panettha attho – imaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjitvā vuṭṭhātukāmassa yaṃ taṃ āpattivuṭṭhānaṃ
atk-vin02a4:252_2: tassa ādimhi ceva parivāsadānatthāya ādito sese majjhe mānattadānatthāya mūlāyapaṭikassanena
atk-vin02a4:252_3: vā saha mānattadānatthāya, avasāne abbhānatthāya ca saṅgho icchitabbo, na hettha
atk-vin02a4:252_4: ekampi kammaṃ vinā saṅghena sakkā kātunti saṅgho, ādimhi ceva sese ca icchitabbo
atk-vin02a4:253_0: Tatiyagāthāya aniyato na niyatoti yasmā na niyato, tasmā aniyato ayamāpattikkhandhoti
atk-vin02a4:253_1: attho. Kiṃ kāraṇā na niyatoti? Anekaṃsikataṃ padaṃ, yasmā idaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ anekaṃsena
atk-vin02a4:253_2: katanti attho. Kathaṃ anekaṃsena? Tiṇṇamaññataraṃ ṭhānaṃ, tiṇṇaṃ dhammānaṃ aññatarena
atk-vin02a4:253_3: kāretabboti hi tattha vuttaṃ, tasmā “aniyato”ti pavuccati, so āpattikkhandho aniyatoti
atk-vin02a4:253_4: vuccati. Yathā ca tiṇṇaṃ aññataraṃ ṭhānaṃ, evaṃ dvinnaṃ dhammānaṃ aññataraṃ ṭhānaṃ
atk-vin02a4:254: Catutthagāthāya accayo tena samo natthīti desanāgāminīsu accayesu tena samo thūlo accayo natthi, tenetaṃ iti vuccati; thūlattā accayassa etaṃ thullaccayanti vuccatīti attho.
atk-vin02a4:255: Pañcamagāthāya nissajjitvāna deseti tenetanti nissajjitvā desetabbato nissaggiyanti vuccatīti attho.
atk-vin02a4:256_0: Chaṭṭhagāthāya pāteti kusalaṃ dhammanti sañcicca āpajjantassa kusaladhammasaṅkhātaṃ
atk-vin02a4:256_1: kusalacittaṃ pāteti, tasmā pāteti cittanti pācittiyaṃ. Yaṃ pana cittaṃ pāteti, taṃ
atk-vin02a4:256_2: yasmā ariyamaggaṃ aparajjhati, cittasammohakāraṇañca hoti, tasmā “ariyamaggaṃ aparajjhati,
atk-vin02a4:257_1: bhikkhu aññātako santotiādi vuttaṃ. Paṭidesetabbato pana sā āpatti pāṭidesanīyāti vuccati.
atk-vin02a4:258_0: Dukkaṭagāthāya aparaddhaṃ viraddhañca khalitanti sabbametaṃ “yañca dukkaṭa”nti ettha
atk-vin02a4:258_1: vuttassa dukkaṭassa pariyāyavacanaṃ. Yañhi duṭṭhu kataṃ virūpaṃ vā kataṃ, taṃ dukkaṭaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:258_2: Taṃ panetaṃ yathā satthārā vuttaṃ; evaṃ akatattā aparaddhaṃ, kusalaṃ virajjhitvā
atk-vin02a4:258_3: pavattattā viraddhaṃ, ariyavattapaṭipadaṃ anāruḷhattā khalitaṃ. Yaṃ manusso kareti
atk-vin02a4:258_4: idaṃ panassa opammanidassanaṃ. Tassattho – yathā hi yaṃ loke manusso āvi vā yadi
atk-vin02a4:258_5: vā raho pāpaṃ karoti, taṃ dukkaṭanti pavedenti; evamidampi buddhappaṭikuṭṭhena lāmakabhāvena
atk-vin02a4:259_0: Dubbhāsitagāthāya dubbhāsitaṃ durābhaṭṭhanti duṭṭhu ābhaṭṭhaṃ bhāsitaṃ lapitanti
atk-vin02a4:259_1: durābhaṭṭhaṃ. Yaṃ durābhaṭṭhaṃ, taṃ dubbhāsitanti attho. Kiñca bhiyyo? Saṃkiliṭṭhañca
atk-vin02a4:259_2: yaṃ padaṃ, saṃkiliṭṭhaṃ yasmā taṃ padaṃ hotīti attho. Tathā yañca viññū garahanti,
atk-vin02a4:259_3: yasmā ca naṃ viññū garahantīti attho. Tenetaṃ iti vuccatīti tena saṃkiliṭṭhabhāvena
atk-vin02a4:259_4: ca viññugarahanenāpi ca etaṃ iti vuccati; “dubbhāsita”nti evaṃ vuccatīti attho.
atk-vin02a4:260_0: Sekhiyagāthāya “ādi cetaṃ caraṇañcā”tiādinā nayena sekhassa santakabhāvaṃ dīpeti.
atk-vin02a4:260_1: Tasmā sekhassa idaṃ sekhiyanti ayamettha saṅkhepattho. Idaṃ “garukalahukañcāpī”tiādipañhehi
atk-vin02a4:260_2: asaṅgahitassa “handa vākyaṃ suṇoma te”ti iminā pana āyācanavacanena saṅgahitassa
atk-vin02a4:261_0: Channamativassatītiādimhipi eseva nayo. Tattha channamativassatīti gehaṃ tāva tiṇādīhi
atk-vin02a4:261_1: acchannaṃ ativassati. Idaṃ pana āpattisaṅkhātaṃ gehaṃ channaṃ ativassati; mūlāpattiñhi
atk-vin02a4:261_2: chādento aññaṃ navaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati. Vivaṭaṃ nātivassatīti gehaṃ tāva avivaṭaṃ
atk-vin02a4:261_3: succhannaṃ nātivassati. Idaṃ pana āpattisaṅkhātaṃ gehaṃ vivaṭaṃ nātivassati; mūlāpattiñhi
atk-vin02a4:261_4: vivaranto desanāgāminiṃ desetvā vuṭṭhānagāminito vuṭṭhahitvā suddhante patiṭṭhāti.
atk-vin02a4:261_5: Āyatiṃ saṃvaranto aññaṃ āpattiṃ nāpajjati. Tasmā channaṃ vivarethāti tena kāraṇena
atk-vin02a4:261_6: desanāgāminiṃ desento vuṭṭhānagāminito ca vuṭṭhahanto channaṃ vivaretha. Evaṃ taṃ
atk-vin02a4:262_0: Gati migānaṃ pavananti ajjhokāse byagghādīhi paripātiyamānānaṃ migānaṃ pavanaṃ rukkhādigahanaṃ
atk-vin02a4:262_1: araññaṃ gati paṭisaraṇaṃ hoti, taṃ patvā te assāsanti. Eteneva nayena ākāso pakkhīnaṃ
atk-vin02a4:262_2: gati. Avassaṃ upagamanaṭṭhena pana vibhavo gati dhammānaṃ, sabbesampi saṅkhatadhammānaṃ
atk-vin02a4:262_3: vināsova tesaṃ gati. Na hi te vināsaṃ agacchantā ṭhātuṃ sakkonti. Sucirampi ṭhatvā
atk-vin02a4:262_4: pana nibbānaṃ arahato gati, khīṇāsavassa arahato anupādisesanibbānadhātu ekaṃsena gatīti attho.
atk-vin02a4:266_0: 340. Adhikaraṇabhede ime dasa ukkoṭāti adhikaraṇānaṃ ukkoṭetvā puna adhikaraṇaukkoṭena
atk-vin02a4:266_1: samathānaṃ ukkoṭaṃ dassetuṃ “vivādādhikaraṇaṃ ukkoṭento kati samathe ukkoṭetī”tiādimāha.
atk-vin02a4:266_2: Tattha vivādādhikaraṇaṃ ukkoṭento dve samathe ukkoṭetīti sammukhāvinayañca yebhuyyasikañca
atk-vin02a4:266_3: ime dve ukkoṭeti, paṭisedheti; paṭikkosatīti attho. Anuvādādhikaraṇaṃ ukkoṭento cattāroti
atk-vin02a4:266_4: sammukhāvinayaṃ, sativinayaṃ, amūḷhavinayaṃ, tassapāpiyasikanti ime cattāro samathe
atk-vin02a4:266_5: ukkoṭeti. Āpattādhikaraṇaṃ ukkoṭento tayoti sammukhāvinayaṃ, paṭiññātakaraṇaṃ, tiṇavatthārakanti
atk-vin02a4:266_6: ime tayo samathe ukkoṭeti. Kiccādhikaraṇaṃ ukkoṭento ekanti sammukhāvinayaṃ imaṃ
atk-vin02a4:267_0: 341. Kati ukkoṭātiādipucchānaṃ vissajjane pana dvādasasu ukkoṭesu akataṃ kammantiādayo
atk-vin02a4:267_1: tāva tayo ukkoṭā visesato dutiye anuvādādhikaraṇe labbhanti. Anihataṃ kammantiādayo
atk-vin02a4:267_2: tayo paṭhame vivādādhikaraṇe labbhanti. Avinicchitantiādayo tayo tatiye āpattādhikaraṇe
atk-vin02a4:267_3: labbhanti. Avūpasantantiādayo tayo catutthe kiccādhikaraṇe labbhanti; apica dvādasāpi
atk-vin02a4:268_0: Tatthajātakaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ ukkoṭetīti yasmiṃ vihāre “mayhaṃ iminā patto gahito, cīvaraṃ
atk-vin02a4:268_1: gahita”ntiādinā nayena pattacīvarādīnaṃ atthāya adhikaraṇaṃ uppannaṃ hoti, tasmiṃyeva
atk-vin02a4:268_2: ca naṃ vihāre āvāsikā sannipatitvā “alaṃ āvuso”ti attapaccatthike saññāpetvā pāḷimuttakavinicchayeneva
atk-vin02a4:268_3: vūpasamenti, idaṃ tatthajātakaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ nāma. Yenāpi vinicchayena samitaṃ, sopi
atk-vin02a4:269_0: Tatthajātakaṃ vūpasantanti sace pana taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ nevāsikā vūpasametuṃ na sakkonti,
atk-vin02a4:269_1: athañño vinayadharo āgantvā “kiṃ āvuso imasmiṃ vihāre uposatho vā pavāraṇā vā ṭhitā”ti
atk-vin02a4:269_2: pucchati, tehi ca tasmiṃ kāraṇe kathite taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ khandhakato ca parivārato
atk-vin02a4:269_3: ca suttena vinicchinitvā vūpasameti, idaṃ tatthajātakaṃ vūpasantaṃ nāma adhikaraṇaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:270_0: Antarāmaggeti te attapaccatthikā “na mayaṃ etassa vinicchaye tiṭṭhāma, nāyaṃ vinaye
atk-vin02a4:270_1: kusalo, asukasmiṃ nāma gāme vinayadharā therā vasanti, tattha gantvā vinicchinissāmā”ti
atk-vin02a4:270_2: gacchantā antarāmaggeyeva kāraṇaṃ sallakkhetvā aññamaññaṃ vā saññāpenti, aññe vā
atk-vin02a4:270_3: te bhikkhū nijjhāpenti, idampi vūpasantameva hoti. Evaṃ vūpasantaṃ antarāmagge adhikaraṇaṃ
atk-vin02a4:271_0: Antarāmagge vūpasantanti na heva kho pana aññamaññaṃ saññattiyā vā sabhāgabhikkhunijjhāpanena
atk-vin02a4:271_1: vā vūpasantaṃ hoti; apica kho paṭipathaṃ āgacchanto eko vinayadharo disvā “kattha
atk-vin02a4:271_2: āvuso gacchathā”ti pucchitvā “asukaṃ nāma gāmaṃ, iminā nāma kāraṇenā”ti vutte “alaṃ,
atk-vin02a4:271_3: āvuso, kiṃ tattha gatenā”ti tattheva dhammena vinayena taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasameti,
atk-vin02a4:271_4: idaṃ antarāmagge vūpasantaṃ nāma. Etaṃ ukkoṭentassāpi pācittiyameva.
atk-vin02a4:272_0: Tattha gatanti sace pana “alaṃ, āvuso, kiṃ tattha gatenā”ti vuccamānāpi “mayaṃ tattheva
atk-vin02a4:272_1: gantvā vinicchayaṃ pāpessāmā”ti vinayadharassa vacanaṃ anādiyitvā gacchantiyeva,
atk-vin02a4:272_2: gantvā sabhāgānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ etamatthaṃ ārocenti. Sabhāgā bhikkhū “alaṃ, āvuso, saṅghasannipātaṃ
atk-vin02a4:272_3: nāma garuka”nti tattheva nisīdāpetvā vinicchinitvā saññāpenti, idampi vūpasantameva
atk-vin02a4:272_4: hoti. Evaṃ vūpasantaṃ tattha gataṃ adhikaraṇaṃ ukkoṭeti yo, tassāpi pācittiyameva.
atk-vin02a4:273_0: Tattha gataṃ vūpasantanti na heva kho pana sabhāgabhikkhūnaṃ saññattiyā vūpasantaṃ
atk-vin02a4:273_1: hoti; apica kho saṅghaṃ sannipātetvā ārocitaṃ saṅghamajjhe vinayadharā vūpasamenti,
atk-vin02a4:273_2: idaṃ tattha gataṃ vūpasantaṃ nāma. Etaṃ ukkoṭentassāpi pācittiyameva.
atk-vin02a4:274: Sativinayanti khīṇāsavassa dinnaṃ sativinayaṃ ukkoṭeti, pācittiyameva. Ummattakassa dinne amūḷhavinaye pāpussannassa dinnāya tassapāpiyasikāyapi eseva nayo.
atk-vin02a4:275_0: Tiṇavatthārakaṃ ukkoṭetīti saṅghena tiṇavatthārakasamathena vūpasamite adhikaraṇe
atk-vin02a4:275_1: “āpatti nāma ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ upasaṅkamitvā ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā desiyamānā
atk-vin02a4:275_2: vuṭṭhāti, yaṃ panetaṃ niddāyantassāpi āpattivuṭṭhānaṃ nāma, etaṃ mayhaṃ na khamatī”ti
atk-vin02a4:275_3: evaṃ vadantopi tiṇavatthārakaṃ ukkoṭeti nāma, tassāpi pācittiyameva.
atk-vin02a4:276_0: Chandāgatiṃ gacchanto adhikaraṇaṃ ukkoṭetīti vinayadharo hutvā attano upajjhāyādīnaṃ
atk-vin02a4:276_1: atthāya “adhammaṃ dhammo”tiādīni dīpetvā pubbe vinicchitaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ dvādasasu
atk-vin02a4:276_2: ukkoṭesu yena kenaci ukkoṭento chandāgatiṃ gacchanto adhikaraṇaṃ ukkoṭeti nāma. Dvīsu
atk-vin02a4:276_3: pana attapaccatthikesu ekasmiṃ “anatthaṃ me acarī”tiādinā nayena samuppannāghāto,
atk-vin02a4:276_4: tassa parājayaṃ āropanatthaṃ “adhammaṃ dhammo”tiādīni dīpetvā pubbe vinicchitaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ
atk-vin02a4:276_5: dvādasasu ukkoṭesu yena kenaci ukkoṭento dosāgatiṃ gacchanto adhikaraṇaṃ ukkoṭeti
atk-vin02a4:276_6: nāma. Mando pana momūho momūhattā eva “adhammaṃ dhammo”tiādīni dīpetvā vuttanayeneva
atk-vin02a4:276_7: ukkoṭento mohāgatiṃ gacchanto adhikaraṇaṃ ukkoṭeti nāma. Sace pana dvīsu attapaccatthikesu
atk-vin02a4:276_8: eko visamāni kāyakammādīni gahanamicchādiṭṭhiṃ balavante ca pakkhantariye abhiññāte
atk-vin02a4:276_9: bhikkhū nissitattā visamanissito gahananissito balavanissito ca hoti, tassa bhayena
atk-vin02a4:276_10: “ayaṃ me jīvitantarāyaṃ vā brahmacariyantarāyaṃ vā kareyyā”ti “adhammaṃ dhammo”tiādīni
atk-vin02a4:276_11: dīpetvā vuttanayeneva ukkoṭento bhayāgatiṃ gacchanto adhikaraṇaṃ ukkoṭeti nāma.
atk-vin02a4:277_0: Tadahupasampannoti eko sāmaṇero byatto hoti bahussuto, so vinicchaye parājayaṃ patvā
atk-vin02a4:277_1: maṅkubhūte bhikkhū disvā pucchati “kasmā maṅkubhūtātthā”ti? Te tassa taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ
atk-vin02a4:277_2: ārocenti. So te evaṃ vadeti “hotu, bhante, maṃ upasampādetha, ahaṃ taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ
atk-vin02a4:277_3: vūpasamessāmī”ti. Te taṃ upasampādenti. So dutiyadivase bheriṃ paharitvā saṅghaṃ
atk-vin02a4:277_4: sannipāteti. Tato bhikkhūhi “kena saṅgho sannipātito”ti vutte “mayā”ti vadati. “Kasmā
atk-vin02a4:277_6: pana hiyyo kuhiṃ gato”ti? “Anupasampannomhi, bhante, ajja pana upasampannomhī”ti.
atk-vin02a4:277_7: So vattabbo “idaṃ āvuso tumhādisānaṃ bhagavatā sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ, ‘tadahupasampanno
atk-vin02a4:277_8: ukkoṭeti, ukkoṭanakaṃ pācittiya’nti, gaccha āpattiṃ desehī”ti. Āgantukepi eseva nayo.
atk-vin02a4:278_0: Kārakoti ekaṃ saṅghena saddhiṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vinicchinitvā pariveṇagataṃ parājitā bhikkhū
atk-vin02a4:278_1: vadanti “kissa, bhante, tumhehi evaṃ vinicchitaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ, nanu evaṃ vinicchinitabba”nti.
atk-vin02a4:278_2: So “kasmā paṭhamaṃyeva evaṃ na vaditthā”ti taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ ukkoṭeti. Evaṃ yo kārako
atk-vin02a4:278_3: ukkoṭeti, tassāpi ukkoṭanakaṃ pācittiyaṃ. Chandadāyakoti eko adhikaraṇavinicchaye
atk-vin02a4:278_4: chandaṃ datvā sabhāge bhikkhū parājayaṃ patvā āgate maṅkubhūte disvā “sve dāni ahaṃ
atk-vin02a4:278_5: vinicchinissāmī”ti saṅghaṃ sannipātetvā “kasmā sannipātesī”ti vutte “hiyyo adhikaraṇaṃ
atk-vin02a4:278_6: dubbinicchitaṃ, tamahaṃ ajja vinicchinissāmī”ti. “Hiyyo pana tvaṃ kattha gato”ti.
atk-vin02a4:278_7: “Chandaṃ datvā nisinnomhī”ti. So vattabbo “idaṃ āvuso tumhādisānaṃ bhagavatā sikkhāpadaṃ
atk-vin02a4:278_8: paññattaṃ, ‘chandadāyako ukkoṭeti, ukkoṭanakaṃ pācittiya’nti, gaccha āpattiṃ desehī”ti.
atk-vin02a4:280_0: 342. Vivādādhikaraṇaṃ kiṃnidānantiādīsu kiṃ nidānamassāti kiṃnidānaṃ. Ko samudayo
atk-vin02a4:280_1: assāti kiṃsamudayaṃ. Kā jāti assāti kiṃjātikaṃ. Ko pabhavo assāti kiṃpabhavaṃ. Ko
atk-vin02a4:280_2: sambhāro assāti kiṃsambhāraṃ. Kiṃ samuṭṭhānaṃ assāti kiṃsamuṭṭhānaṃ. Sabbānetāni
atk-vin02a4:281_1: Vivādaṃ nissāya uppajjanakavivādavasenetaṃ vuttaṃ. Anuvādo nidānaṃ assāti anuvādanidānaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:281_2: Idampi anuvādaṃ nissāya uppajjanakaanuvādavasena vuttaṃ. Āpatti nidānaṃ assāti āpattinidānaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:281_3: Āpattādhikaraṇapaccayā catasso āpattiyo āpajjatīti evaṃ āpattiṃ nissāya uppajjanakaāpattivasenetaṃ
atk-vin02a4:281_4: vuttaṃ. Kiccayaṃ nidānamassāti kiccayanidānaṃ; catubbidhaṃ saṅghakammaṃ kāraṇamassāti
atk-vin02a4:281_5: attho. Ukkhittānuvattikāya bhikkhuniyā yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsanādīnaṃ kiccaṃ nissāya
atk-vin02a4:281_6: uppajjanakakiccānaṃ vasenetaṃ vuttaṃ. Ayaṃ catunnampi adhikaraṇānaṃ vissajjanapakkhe
atk-vin02a4:282_1: vasena hetunidānāditā veditabbā. Tatiyapucchāya vissajjane byañjanamattaṃ nānaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:283_0: 343. Mūlapucchāya vissajjane dvādasa mūlānīti kodhaupanāhayugaḷakādīni cha vivādāmūlāni,
atk-vin02a4:283_1: lobhadosamohā tayo, alobhādosāmohā tayoti imāni ajjhattasantānappavattāni dvādasa
atk-vin02a4:283_2: mūlāni. Cuddasa mūlānīti tāneva dvādasa kāyavācāhi saddhiṃ cuddasa honti. Cha mūlānīti
atk-vin02a4:284_0: Samuṭṭhānapucchāya vissajjane aṭṭhārasa bhedakaravatthūni samuṭṭhānāni, tañhi etesu
atk-vin02a4:284_1: aṭṭhārasasu bhedakaravatthūsu samuṭṭhāti, etehi vā kāraṇabhūtehi samuṭṭhāti. Tenassetāni
atk-vin02a4:285_0: 344. Vivādādhikaraṇaṃ āpattītiādibhede ekena adhikaraṇena kiccādhikaraṇenāti idaṃ
atk-vin02a4:285_1: yena adhikaraṇena sammanti, taṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ, na panetāni ekaṃsato kiccādhikaraṇeneva
atk-vin02a4:285_2: sammanti. Na hi puggalassa santike desentassa kiccādhikaraṇaṃ nāma atthi.
atk-vin02a4:286: Na katamena samathenāti sāvasesāpatti viya na sammati. Na hi sakkā sā desetuṃ, na tato vuṭṭhāya suddhante patiṭṭhātuṃ.
atk-vin02a4:288: 349. Tato paraṃ yattha sativinayotiādikā sammukhāvinayaṃ amuñcitvā cha yamakapucchā vuttā, tāsaṃ vissajjaneneva attho pakāsito.
atk-vin02a4:289_1: dvinnampi samathānaṃ siddhattā sammukhāvinayoti vā sativinayoti vā ime dhammā saṃsaṭṭhā,
atk-vin02a4:289_2: no visaṃsaṭṭhā. Yasmā pana kadalikkhandhe pattavaṭṭīnaṃ viya na sakkā tesaṃ vinibbhujitvā
atk-vin02a4:289_3: nānākaraṇaṃ dassetuṃ, tena vuttaṃ “na ca labbhā imesaṃ dhammānaṃ vinibbhujitvā vinibbhujitvā
atk-vin02a4:291_0: 352. Kiṃnidānoti pucchāvissajjane nidānaṃ nidānamassāti nidānanidāno. Tattha saṅghasammukhatā,
atk-vin02a4:291_1: dhammasammukhatā, vinayasammukhatā, puggalasammukhatāti idaṃ sammukhāvinayassa nidānaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:291_2: Sativepullapatto khīṇāsavo laddhupavādo sativinayassa nidānaṃ. Ummattako bhikkhu
atk-vin02a4:291_3: amūḷhavinayassa nidānaṃ. Yo ca deseti, yassa ca deseti, ubhinnaṃ sammukhībhāvo paṭiññātakaraṇassa
atk-vin02a4:291_4: nidānaṃ. Bhaṇḍanajātānaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasametuṃ asakkuṇeyyatā yebhuyyasikāya nidānaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:291_5: Pāpussanno puggalo tassapāpiyasikāya nidānaṃ. Bhaṇḍanajātānaṃ bahu assāmaṇakaajjhācāro
atk-vin02a4:292_0: 353. Mūlapucchāya vissajjanaṃ uttānameva. Samuṭṭhānapucchāya kiñcāpi “sattannaṃ samathānaṃ
atk-vin02a4:292_1: katame chattiṃsa samuṭṭhānā”ti vuttaṃ, sammukhāvinayassa pana kammasaṅgahābhāvena
atk-vin02a4:292_2: samuṭṭhānābhāvato channaṃyeva samathānaṃ cha samuṭṭhānāni vibhattāni. Tattha kammassa
atk-vin02a4:292_3: kiriyāti ñatti veditabbā. Karaṇanti tassāyeva ñattiyā ṭhapetabbakāle ṭhapanaṃ. Upagamananti
atk-vin02a4:292_4: sayaṃ upagamanaṃ; attanāyeva tassa kammassa karaṇanti attho. Ajjhupagamananti ajjhesanupagamanaṃ;
atk-vin02a4:292_5: aññaṃ saddhivihārikādikaṃ “idaṃ kammaṃ karohī”ti ajjhesananti attho. Adhivāsanāti
atk-vin02a4:292_6: “ruccati me etaṃ, karotu saṅgho”ti evaṃ adhivāsanā; chandadānanti attho. Appaṭikkosanāti
atk-vin02a4:292_7: “na metaṃ khamati, mā evaṃ karothā”ti appaṭisedhanā. Iti channaṃ chakkānaṃ vasena
atk-vin02a4:294_1: no adhikaraṇanti ayaṃ mātāputtādīnaṃ vivādo viruddhavādattā vivādo nāma hoti, samathehi
atk-vin02a4:294_2: pana adhikaraṇīyatāya abhāvato adhikaraṇaṃ na hoti. Anuvādādīsupi eseva nayo. Sesaṃ
atk-vin02a4:298_0: 359. Dutiyagāthāsaṅgaṇiyaṃ codanāti vatthuñca āpattiñca dassetvā codanā. Sāraṇāti
atk-vin02a4:298_1: dosasāraṇā. Saṅgho kimatthāyāti saṅghasannipāto kimatthāya. Matikammaṃ pana kissa
atk-vin02a4:298_2: kāraṇāti matikammaṃ vuccati mantaggahaṇaṃ; taṃ kissa kāraṇāti attho.
atk-vin02a4:299_0: Codanā sāraṇatthāyāti vuttappakārā codanā, tena cuditakapuggalena codakadosasāraṇatthāya.
atk-vin02a4:299_1: Niggahatthāya sāraṇāti dosasāraṇā pana tassa puggalassa niggahatthāya. Saṅgho pariggahatthāyāti
atk-vin02a4:299_2: tattha sannipatito saṅgho vinicchayapariggahaṇatthāya; dhammādhammaṃ tulanatthāya
atk-vin02a4:299_3: suvinicchitadubbinicchitaṃ jānanatthāyāti attho. Matikammaṃ pana pāṭiyekkanti suttantikattherānañca
atk-vin02a4:300: Mā kho paṭighanti cuditake vā codake vā kopaṃ mā janayi. Sace anuvijjako tuvanti sace tvaṃ saṅghamajjhe otiṇṇaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vinicchituṃ nisinno vinayadharo.
atk-vin02a4:301_0: Viggāhikanti “na tvaṃ imaṃ dhammavinayaṃ ājānāsī”tiādinayappavattaṃ. Anatthasaṃhitanti
atk-vin02a4:301_1: yā anatthaṃ janayati, parisaṃ khobhetvā uṭṭhāpeti, evarūpiṃ kathaṃ mā abhaṇi. Sutte
atk-vin02a4:301_2: vinaye vātiādīsu suttaṃ nāma ubhatovibhaṅgo. Vinayo nāma khandhako. Anulomo nāma
atk-vin02a4:301_3: parivāro. Paññattaṃ nāma sakalaṃ vinayapiṭakaṃ. Anulomikaṃ nāma cattāro mahāpadesā.
atk-vin02a4:302_0: Anuyogavattaṃ nisāmayāti anuyuñjanavattaṃ nisāmehi. Kusalena buddhimatā katanti chekena
atk-vin02a4:302_1: paṇḍitena ñāṇapāramippattena bhagavatā nīharitvā ṭhapitaṃ. Suvuttanti supaññāpitaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:302_2: Sikkhāpadānulomikanti sikkhāpadānaṃ anulomaṃ. Ayaṃ tāva padattho, ayaṃ panettha sādhippāyasaṅkhepavaṇṇanā
atk-vin02a4:302_3: – “sace tvaṃ anuvijjako, mā sahasā bhaṇi, mā anatthasaṃhitaṃ viggāhikakathaṃ bhaṇi.
atk-vin02a4:302_4: Yaṃ pana kusalena buddhimatā lokanāthena etesu suttādīsu anuyogavattaṃ kathaṃ supaññattaṃ
atk-vin02a4:302_5: sabbasikkhāpadānaṃ anulomaṃ, taṃ nisāmaya taṃ upadhārehī”ti. Gatiṃ na nāsento samparāyikanti
atk-vin02a4:302_6: attano samparāye sugatinibbattiṃ anāsento anuyogavattaṃ nisāmaya. Yo hi taṃ anisāmetvā
atk-vin02a4:302_7: anuyuñjati, so samparāyikaṃ attano gatiṃ nāseti, tasmā tvaṃ anāsento nisāmayāti attho.
atk-vin02a4:302_8: Idāni taṃ anuyogavattaṃ dassetuṃ hitesītiādimāha. Tattha hitesīti hitaṃ esanto gavesanto;
atk-vin02a4:302_9: mettañca mettāpubbabhāgañca upaṭṭhapetvāti attho. Kālenāti yuttapattakālena; ajjhesitakāleyeva
atk-vin02a4:303: Sahasā vohāraṃ mā padhāresīti yo etesaṃ sahasā vohāro hoti, sahasā bhāsitaṃ, taṃ mā padhāresi, mā gaṇhittha.
atk-vin02a4:304_0: Paṭiññānusandhitena kārayeti ettha anusandhitanti kathānusandhi vuccati, tasmā paṭiññānusandhinā
atk-vin02a4:304_1: kāraye; kathānusandhiṃ sallakkhetvā paṭiññāya kārayeti attho. Atha vā paṭiññāya ca
atk-vin02a4:304_2: anusandhitena ca kāraye, lajjiṃ paṭiññāya kāraye; alajjiṃ vattānusandhināti attho.
atk-vin02a4:304_3: Tasmā eva paṭiññā lajjīsūti gāthamāha. Tattha vattānusandhitena kārayeti vattānusandhinā
atk-vin02a4:304_4: kāraye, yā assa vattena saddhiṃ paṭiññā sandhiyati, tāya paṭiññāya kārayeti attho.
atk-vin02a4:305: Sañciccāti jānanto āpajjati. Parigūhatīti nigūhati na deseti na vuṭṭhāti.
atk-vin02a4:306: Sā ahampi jānāmīti yaṃ tumhehi vuttaṃ, taṃ saccaṃ, ahampi naṃ evameva jānāmi. Aññañca tāhanti aññañca taṃ ahaṃ pucchāmi.
atk-vin02a4:307_0: Pubbāparaṃ na jānātīti purekathitañca pacchākathitañca na jānāti. Akovidoti tasmiṃ
atk-vin02a4:307_1: pubbāpare akusalo. Anusandhivacanapathaṃ na jānātīti kathānusandhivacanaṃ vinicchayānusandhivacanañca na jānāti.
atk-vin02a4:308_0: Sīlavipattiyā codetīti dvīhi āpattikkhandhehi codeti. Ācāradiṭṭhiyāti ācāravipattiyā
atk-vin02a4:308_1: ceva diṭṭhivipattiyā ca. Ācāravipattiyā codento pañcahāpattikkhandhehi codeti, diṭṭhivipattiyā
atk-vin02a4:308_2: codento micchādiṭṭhiyā ceva antaggāhikadiṭṭhiyā ca codeti. Ājīvenapi codetīti ājīvahetupaññattehi
atk-vin02a4:308_3: chahi sikkhāpadehi codeti. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānamevāti.
atk-vin02a4:312_0: 360-361. Idāni evaṃ uppannāya codanāya vinayadharena kattabbakiccaṃ dassetuṃ anuvijjakenātiādi
atk-vin02a4:312_1: āraddhaṃ. Tattha diṭṭhaṃ diṭṭhenāti gāthāya ayamattho – ekeneko mātugāmena saddhiṃ
atk-vin02a4:312_2: ekaṭṭhānato nikkhamanto vā pavisanto vā diṭṭho, so taṃ pārājikena codeti, itaro tassa
atk-vin02a4:312_3: dassanaṃ anujānāti. Taṃ pana dassanaṃ paṭicca pārājikaṃ na upeti, na paṭijānāti.
atk-vin02a4:312_4: Evamettha yaṃ tena diṭṭhaṃ, taṃ tassa “diṭṭho mayā”ti iminā diṭṭhavacanena sameti.
atk-vin02a4:312_5: Yasmā pana itaro taṃ dassanaṃ paṭicca dosaṃ na paṭijānāti, tasmā asuddhaparisaṅkito
atk-vin02a4:312_6: hoti; amūlakaparisaṅkitoti attho. Tassa puggalassa “suddho aha”nti paṭiññāya tena
atk-vin02a4:312_7: saddhiṃ uposatho kātabbo. Sesagāthādvayepi eseva nayo. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānamevāti.
atk-vin02a4:315_0: 362-363. Codanāya ko ādītiādipucchānaṃ vissajjane sacce ca akuppe cāti sacce patiṭṭhātabbaṃ
atk-vin02a4:315_1: akuppe ca. Yaṃ kataṃ vā na kataṃ vā, tadeva vattabbaṃ, na ca codake vā anuvijjake
atk-vin02a4:315_2: vā saṅghe vā kopo uppādetabbo. Otiṇṇānotiṇṇaṃ jānitabbanti otiṇṇañca anotiṇṇañca
atk-vin02a4:315_3: vacanaṃ jānitabbaṃ. Tatrāyaṃ jānanavidhi – ettakā codakassa pubbakathā, ettakā pacchimakathā,
atk-vin02a4:315_4: ettakā cuditakassa pubbakathā, ettakā pacchimakathāti jānitabbā. Codakassa pamāṇaṃ
atk-vin02a4:315_5: gaṇhitabbaṃ, cuditakassa pamāṇaṃ gaṇhitabbaṃ, anuvijjakassa pamāṇaṃ gaṇhitabbaṃ,
atk-vin02a4:315_6: anuvijjako appamattakampi ahāpento “āvuso samannāharitvā ujuṃ katvā āharā”ti vattabbo,
atk-vin02a4:315_7: saṅghena evaṃ paṭipajjitabbaṃ. Yena dhammena yena vinayena yena satthusāsanena taṃ
atk-vin02a4:315_8: adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasammatīti ettha dhammoti bhūtaṃ vatthu. Vinayoti codanā ceva sāraṇā
atk-vin02a4:315_9: ca. Satthusāsananti ñattisampadā ceva anussāvanasampadā ca. Etena hi dhammena ca
atk-vin02a4:315_10: vinayena ca satthusāsanena ca adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasamati, tasmā anuvijjakena bhūtena
atk-vin02a4:315_11: vatthunā codetvā āpattiṃ sāretvā ñattisampadāya ceva anussāvanasampadāya ca taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ
atk-vin02a4:315_12: vūpasametabbaṃ, anuvijjakena evaṃ paṭipajjitabbaṃ. Sesamettha uttānameva.
atk-vin02a4:316_1: ca paribhāsatīti avamaññaṃ karonto “kiṃ ime jānantī”ti paribhāsati. Khato upahatindriyoti
atk-vin02a4:316_2: tāya chandādigāmitāya tena ca paribhāsanena attanā attano khatattā khato. Saddhādīnañca
atk-vin02a4:316_3: indriyānaṃ upahatattā upahatindriyo. Nirayaṃ gacchati dummedho, na ca sikkhāya gāravoti
atk-vin02a4:316_4: so khato upahatindriyo paññāya abhāvato dummedho tīsu sikkhāsu asikkhanato na ca
atk-vin02a4:316_5: sikkhāya gāravo kāyassa bhedā nirayameva upagacchati, tasmā na ca āmisaṃ nissāya…pe…
atk-vin02a4:316_6: yathā dhammo tathā kareti. Tassattho na ca āmisaṃ nissāya kare, cuditakacodakesu
atk-vin02a4:316_7: hi aññatarena dinnaṃ cīvarādiāmisaṃ gaṇhanto āmisaṃ nissāya karoti, evaṃ na kareyya.
atk-vin02a4:316_8: Na ca nissāya puggalanti “ayaṃ me upajjhāyo vā ācariyo vā”tiādinā nayena chandādīhi
atk-vin02a4:316_9: gacchanto puggalaṃ nissāya karoti, evaṃ na kareyya. Atha kho ubhopete vivajjetvā
atk-vin02a4:317_0: Upakaṇṇakaṃ jappatīti “evaṃ kathehi, mā evaṃ kathayitthā”ti kaṇṇamūle manteti. Jimhaṃ
atk-vin02a4:317_1: pekkhatīti dosameva gavesati. Vītiharatīti vinicchayaṃ hāpeti. Kummaggaṃ paṭisevatīti āpattiṃ dīpeti.
atk-vin02a4:318: Akālena ca codetīti anokāse anajjhiṭṭhova codeti. Pubbāparaṃ na jānātīti purimakathañca pacchimakathañca na jānāti.
atk-vin02a4:319: Anusandhivacanapathaṃ na jānātīti kathānusandhivinicchayānusandhivasena vacanaṃ na jānāti. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānamevāti.
atk-vin02a4:323_0: 365. Cūḷasaṅgāme saṅgāmāvacarena bhikkhunāti saṅgāmo vuccati adhikaraṇavinicchayatthāya
atk-vin02a4:323_1: saṅghasannipāto. Tatra hi attapaccatthikā ceva sāsanapaccatthikā ca uddhammaṃ ubbinayaṃ
atk-vin02a4:323_2: satthu sāsanaṃ dīpentā samosaranti vesālikā vajjiputtakā viya. Yo bhikkhu tesaṃ paccatthikānaṃ
atk-vin02a4:323_3: laddhiṃ madditvā sakavādadīpanatthāya tattha avacarati, ajjhogāhetvā vinicchayaṃ
atk-vin02a4:323_4: pavatteti, so saṅgāmāvacaro nāma yasatthero viya. Tena saṅgāmāvacarena bhikkhunā
atk-vin02a4:323_5: saṅghaṃ upasaṅkamantena nīcacittena saṅgho upasaṅkamitabbo. Nīcacittenāti mānaddhajaṃ
atk-vin02a4:323_6: nipātetvā nihatamānacittena. Rajoharaṇasamenāti pādapuñchanasamena; yathā rajoharaṇassa
atk-vin02a4:323_7: saṃkiliṭṭhe vā asaṃkiliṭṭhe vā pāde puñchiyamāne neva rāgo na doso; evaṃ iṭṭhāniṭṭhesu
atk-vin02a4:323_8: arajjantena adussantenāti attho. Yathāpatirūpe āsaneti yathāpatirūpaṃ āsanaṃ ñatvā
atk-vin02a4:323_9: attano pāpuṇanaṭṭhāne therānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ piṭṭhiṃ adassetvā nisīditabbaṃ. Anānākathikenāti
atk-vin02a4:323_10: nānāvidhaṃ taṃ taṃ anatthakathaṃ akathentena. Atiracchānakathikenāti diṭṭhasutamutampi
atk-vin02a4:323_11: rājakathādikaṃ tiracchānakathaṃ akathentena. Sāmaṃ vā dhammo bhāsitabboti saṅghasannipātaṭṭhāne
atk-vin02a4:323_13: vā kathā dhammo nāma. Evarūpo dhammo sayaṃ vā bhāsitabbo, paro vā ajjhesitabbo. Yo
atk-vin02a4:323_14: bhikkhu tathārūpiṃ kathaṃ kathetuṃ pahoti, so vattabbo – “āvuso saṅghamajjhamhi pañhe
atk-vin02a4:323_15: uppanne tvaṃ katheyyāsī”ti. Ariyo vā tuṇhībhāvo nātimaññitabboti ariyā tuṇhī nisīdantā
atk-vin02a4:323_16: na bālaputhujjanā viya nisīdanti. Aññataraṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvāva nisīdanti. Iti
atk-vin02a4:323_17: kammaṭṭhānamanasikāravasena tuṇhībhāvo ariyo tuṇhībhāvo nāma, so nātimaññitabbo,
atk-vin02a4:323_18: kiṃ kammaṭṭhānānuyogenāti nāvajānitabbo; attano patirūpaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvāva
atk-vin02a4:324_0: Na upajjhāyo pucchitabboti “ko nāmo tuyhaṃ upajjhāyo”ti na pucchitabbo. Esa nayo
atk-vin02a4:324_1: sabbattha. Na jātīti “khattiyajātiyo tvaṃ brāhmaṇajātiyo”ti evaṃ jāti na pucchitabbā.
atk-vin02a4:324_2: Na āgamoti “dīghabhāṇakosi tvaṃ majjhimabhāṇako”ti evaṃ āgamo na pucchitabbo. Kulapadesoti
atk-vin02a4:324_3: khattiyakulādivaseneva veditabbo. Atrassa pemaṃ vā doso vāti atra puggale etesaṃ
atk-vin02a4:324_4: kāraṇānaṃ aññataravasena pemaṃ vā bhaveyya doso vā.
atk-vin02a4:325_0: No parisakappikenāti parisakappakena parisānuvidhāyakena na bhavitabbaṃ; yaṃ parisāya
atk-vin02a4:325_1: ruccati, tadeva cetetvā kappetvā na kathetabbanti attho. Na hatthamuddā dassetabbāti
atk-vin02a4:325_2: kathetabbe ca akathetabbe ca saññājananatthaṃ hatthavikāro na kātabbo.
atk-vin02a4:326_0: Atthaṃ anuvidhiyantenāti vinicchayapaṭivedhameva sallakkhentena “idaṃ suttaṃ upalabbhati,
atk-vin02a4:326_1: imasmiṃ vinicchaye idaṃ vakkhāmī”ti evaṃ paritulayantena nisīditabbanti attho. Na
atk-vin02a4:326_2: ca āsanā vuṭṭhātabbanti na āsanā vuṭṭhāya sannipātamaṇḍale vicaritabbaṃ, vinayadhare
atk-vin02a4:326_3: uṭṭhite sabbā parisā uṭṭhahati. Na vītihātabbanti na vinicchayo hāpetabbo. Na kummaggo
atk-vin02a4:326_4: sevitabboti na āpatti dīpetabbā. Asāhasikena bhavitabbanti na sahasākārinā bhavitabbaṃ;
atk-vin02a4:326_5: sahasā duruttavacanaṃ na kathetabbanti attho. Vacanakkhamenāti duruttavācaṃ khamanasīlena.
atk-vin02a4:326_6: Hitaparisakkināti hitesinā hitagavesinā karuṇā ca karuṇāpubbabhāgo ca upaṭṭhāpetabboti
atk-vin02a4:326_7: ayaṃ padadvayepi adhippāyo. Anasuruttenāti na asuruttena. Asuruttaṃ vuccati viggāhikakathāsaṅkhātaṃ
atk-vin02a4:326_8: asundaravacanaṃ; taṃ na kathetabbanti attho. Attā pariggahetabboti “vinicchinituṃ
atk-vin02a4:326_9: vūpasametuṃ sakkhissāmi nu kho no”ti evaṃ attā pariggahetabbo; attano pamāṇaṃ jānitabbanti
atk-vin02a4:326_10: attho. Paro pariggahetabboti “lajjiyā nu kho ayaṃ parisā, sakkā saññāpetuṃ udāhu
atk-vin02a4:327_0: Codako pariggahetabboti “dhammacodako nu kho no”ti evaṃ pariggahetabbo. Cuditako
atk-vin02a4:327_1: pariggahetabboti “dhammacuditako nu kho no”ti evaṃ pariggahetabbo. Adhammacodako
atk-vin02a4:327_2: pariggahetabboti tassa pamāṇaṃ jānitabbaṃ. Sesesupi eseva nayo. Vuttaṃ ahāpentenāti
atk-vin02a4:327_3: codakacuditakehi vuttavacanaṃ ahāpentena. Avuttaṃ apakāsentenāti anosaṭaṃ vatthuṃ
atk-vin02a4:327_4: appakāsentena. Mando hāsetabboti mando momūho paggaṇhitabbo, “nanu tvaṃ kulaputto”ti
atk-vin02a4:327_5: uttejetvā anuyogavattaṃ kathāpetvā tassa anuyogo gaṇhitabbo. Bhīrū assāsetabboti
atk-vin02a4:327_6: yassa saṅghamajjhaṃ vā gaṇamajjhaṃ vā anosaṭapubbattā sārajjaṃ uppajjati, tādiso
atk-vin02a4:327_7: “mā bhāyi, vissaṭṭho kathehi, mayaṃ te upatthambhā bhavissāmā”ti vatvāpi anuyogavattaṃ
atk-vin02a4:327_8: kathāpetabbo. Caṇḍo nisedhetabboti apasādetabbo tajjetabbo. Asuci vibhāvetabboti
atk-vin02a4:327_9: alajjiṃ pakāsetvā āpattiṃ desāpetabbo. Ujumaddavenāti yo bhikkhu uju sīlavā kāyavaṅkādirahito,
atk-vin02a4:327_10: so maddaveneva upacaritabbo. Dhammesu ca puggalesu cāti ettha yo dhammagaruko hoti
atk-vin02a4:327_11: na puggalagaruko, ayameva dhammesu ca puggalesu ca majjhattoti veditabbo.
atk-vin02a4:328_0: 366. Suttaṃ saṃsandanatthāyātiādīsu tena ca pana evaṃ sabrahmacārīnaṃ piyamanāpagarubhāvanīyena
atk-vin02a4:328_1: anuvijjakena samudāhaṭesu suttādīsu suttaṃ saṃsandanatthāya; āpattānāpattīnaṃ saṃsandanatthanti
atk-vin02a4:328_2: veditabbaṃ. Opammaṃ nidassanatthāyāti opammaṃ atthadassanatthāya. Attho viññāpanatthāyāti
atk-vin02a4:328_3: attho jānāpanatthāya. Paṭipucchā ṭhapanatthāyāti pucchā puggalassa ṭhapanatthāya.
atk-vin02a4:328_4: Okāsakammaṃ codanatthāyāti vatthunā vā āpattiyā vā codanatthāya. Codanā sāraṇatthāyāti
atk-vin02a4:328_5: dosādosaṃ sarāpanatthāya. Sāraṇā savacanīyatthāyāti dosādosasāraṇā savacanīyakaraṇatthāya.
atk-vin02a4:328_6: Savacanīyaṃ palibodhatthāyāti savacanīyaṃ “imamhā āvāsā paraṃ mā pakkamī”ti evaṃ
atk-vin02a4:328_7: palibodhatthāya. Palibodho vinicchayatthāyāti vinicchayaṃ pāpanatthāya. Vinicchayo
atk-vin02a4:328_8: santīraṇatthāyāti dosādosaṃ santīraṇatthāya tulanatthāya. Santīraṇaṃ ṭhānāṭṭhānagamanatthāyāti
atk-vin02a4:328_11: attho. Paccekaṭṭhāyino avisaṃvādakaṭṭhāyinoti issariyādhipaccajeṭṭhakaṭṭhāne ca avisaṃvādakaṭṭhāne
atk-vin02a4:328_12: ca ṭhitā; na te apasādetabbāti attho.
atk-vin02a4:329_0: Idāni ye mandā mandabuddhino evaṃ vadeyyuṃ “vinayo nāma kimatthāyā”ti tesaṃ vacanokāsapidahanatthamattaṃ
atk-vin02a4:329_1: dassetuṃ vinayo saṃvaratthāyātiādimāha. Tattha vinayo saṃvaratthāyāti sakalāpi vinayapaññatti
atk-vin02a4:329_2: kāyavacīdvārasaṃvaratthāya. Ājīvavisuddhipariyosānassa sīlassa upanissayo hoti; paccayo
atk-vin02a4:329_3: hotīti attho. Esa nayo sabbattha. Apicettha avippaṭisāroti pāpapuññānaṃ katākatavasena
atk-vin02a4:329_4: cittavippaṭisārābhāvo. Pāmujjanti dubbalā taruṇapīti. Pītīti balavā bahalapīti. Passaddhīti
atk-vin02a4:329_5: kāyacittadarathapaṭippassaddhi. Sukhanti kāyikacetasikasukhaṃ. Tañhi duvidhampi samādhissa
atk-vin02a4:329_6: upanissayapaccayo hoti. Samādhīti cittekaggatā. Yathābhūtañāṇadassananti taruṇavipassanā;
atk-vin02a4:329_7: udayabbayañāṇassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Cittekaggatā hi taruṇavipassanāya upanissayapaccayo
atk-vin02a4:329_8: hoti. Nibbidāti sikhāpattā vuṭṭhānagāminibalavavipassanā. Virāgoti ariyamaggo. Vimuttīti
atk-vin02a4:329_9: arahattaphalaṃ. Catubbidhopi hi ariyamaggo arahattaphalassa upanissayapaccayo hoti.
atk-vin02a4:329_11: apaccayaparinibbānatthāya. Apaccayaparinibbānassa hi taṃ paccayo hoti, tasmiṃ anuppatte
atk-vin02a4:329_12: avassaṃ parinibbāyitabbatoti. Etadatthā kathāti ayaṃ vinayakathā nāma etadatthā.
atk-vin02a4:329_13: Mantanāti vinayamantanā eva. Upanisāti ayaṃ “vinayo saṃvaratthāyā”tiādikā paramparapaccayatāpi
atk-vin02a4:329_14: etadatthāya. Sotāvadhānanti imissā paramparapaccayakathāya sotāvadhānaṃ. Imaṃ kathaṃ
atk-vin02a4:329_15: sutvā yaṃ uppajjati ñāṇaṃ, tampi etadatthāya. Yadidaṃ anupādā cittassa vimokkhoti
atk-vin02a4:329_16: yo ayaṃ catūhi upādānehi anupādiyitvā cittassa arahattaphalasaṅkhāto vimokkho, sopi
atk-vin02a4:331_0: Vatthuṃ vipattiṃ āpattiṃ, nidānaṃ ākāraakovido pubbāparaṃ na jānātīti “vatthu”ntiādīni
atk-vin02a4:331_1: “na jānātī”ti padena sambandho. “Akovido”ti padassa “sa ve tādisako”ti iminā sambandho.
atk-vin02a4:331_2: Tasmā ayamettha yojanā – yo bhikkhu pārājikādīnaṃ vatthuṃ na jānāti, catubbidhaṃ
atk-vin02a4:331_3: vipattiṃ na jānāti, sattavidhaṃ āpattiṃ na jānāti, “idaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ asukasmiṃ nāma
atk-vin02a4:331_4: nagare paññatta”nti evaṃ nidānaṃ na jānāti, “idaṃ purimavacanaṃ idaṃ pacchimavacana”nti
atk-vin02a4:331_5: pubbāparaṃ na jānāti, “idaṃ kataṃ idaṃ akata”nti katākataṃ na jānāti. Samena cāti
atk-vin02a4:331_6: teneva pubbāparaṃ ajānanassa samena aññāṇena, “katākataṃ na jānātī”ti vuttaṃ hoti;
atk-vin02a4:331_7: evaṃ tāva najānāti-padena saddhiṃ sambandho veditabbo. Yaṃ panetaṃ “ākāraakovido”ti
atk-vin02a4:331_8: vuttaṃ, tattha ākāraakovidoti kāraṇākāraṇe akovido. Iti yvāyaṃ vatthuādīnipi na jānāti,
atk-vin02a4:331_9: ākārassa ca akovido, sa ve tādisako bhikkhu apaṭikkhoti vuccati.
atk-vin02a4:332_0: Kammañca adhikaraṇañcāti imesampi padānaṃ “na jānātī”ti padeneva sambandho. Ayaṃ
atk-vin02a4:332_1: panettha yojanā – tatheva iti yvāyaṃ kammañca na jānāti, adhikaraṇañca na jānāti,
atk-vin02a4:332_2: sattappakāre samathe cāpi akovido, rāgādīhi pana ratto duṭṭho ca mūḷho ca, bhayena
atk-vin02a4:332_3: bhayā gacchati, sammohena mohā gacchati, rattattā pana duṭṭhattā ca chandā dosā ca
atk-vin02a4:332_4: gacchati, paraṃ saññāpetuṃ asamatthatāya na ca saññattikusalo, kāraṇākāraṇadassane
atk-vin02a4:332_5: asamatthatāya nijjhattiyā ca akovido attano sadisāya parisāya laddhattā laddhapakkho,
atk-vin02a4:332_6: hiriyā paribāhirattā ahiriko, kāḷakehi kammehi samannāgatattā kaṇhakammo, dhammādariyapuggalādariyānaṃ
atk-vin02a4:332_7: abhāvato anādaro, sa ve tādisako bhikkhu apaṭikkhoti vuccati, na paṭikkhitabbo na
atk-vin02a4:332_8: oloketabbo, na sammannitvā issariyādhipaccajeṭṭhakaṭṭhāne ṭhapetabboti attho. Sukkapakkhagāthānampi
atk-vin02a4:336_0: 368-374. Mahāsaṅgāme – vatthuto vā vatthuṃ saṅkamatīti “paṭhamapārājikavatthu mayā
atk-vin02a4:336_1: diṭṭhaṃ vā sutaṃ vā”ti vatvā puna pucchiyamāno nighaṃsiyamāno “na mayā paṭhamapārājikassa
atk-vin02a4:336_2: vatthu diṭṭhaṃ, na sutaṃ; dutiyapārājikassa vatthu diṭṭhaṃ vā sutaṃ vā”ti vadati.
atk-vin02a4:336_3: Eteneva nayena sesavatthusaṅkamanaṃ, vipattito vipattisaṅkamanaṃ āpattito āpattisaṅkamanañca
atk-vin02a4:336_4: veditabbaṃ. Yo pana “neva mayā diṭṭhaṃ, na suta”nti vatvā pacchā “mayāpetaṃ diṭṭhaṃ
atk-vin02a4:336_5: vā sutaṃ vā”ti vadati, “diṭṭhaṃ vā sutaṃ vā”ti vatvā pacchā “na diṭṭhaṃ vā na sutaṃ
atk-vin02a4:336_6: vā”ti vadati, ayaṃ avajānitvā paṭijānāti, paṭijānitvā avajānātīti veditabbo. Eseva
atk-vin02a4:337_1: sañcarittaṃ vuttaṃ. Kāyasaṃsaggādittayaṃ sarūpeneva vuttaṃ. Iti imāni pañca methunadhammassa
atk-vin02a4:338: 376. Cattāri apalokanakammānīti adhammenavaggādīni. Sesesupi eseva nayo. Iti cattāri catukkāni soḷasa honti.
atk-vin02a4:340_0: 379. Bahujanaahitāya paṭipanno hotīti vinayadharena hi evaṃ chandādigatiyā adhikaraṇe
atk-vin02a4:340_1: vinicchite tasmiṃ vihāre saṅgho dvidhā bhijjati. Ovādūpajīviniyo bhikkhuniyopi dve
atk-vin02a4:340_2: bhāgā honti. Upāsakāpi upāsikāyopi dārakāpi dārikāyopi tesaṃ ārakkhadevatāpi tatheva
atk-vin02a4:340_3: dvidhā bhijjanti. Tato bhummadevatā ādiṃ katvā yāva akaniṭṭhabrahmāno dvidhāva honti.
atk-vin02a4:340_4: Tena vuttaṃ – “bahujanaahitāya paṭipanno hoti…pe… dukkhāya devamanussāna”nti.
atk-vin02a4:341: 382. Visamanissitoti visamāni kāyakammādīni nissito. Gahananissitoti micchādiṭṭhiantaggāhikadiṭṭhisaṅkhātaṃ gahanaṃ nissito. Balavanissitoti balavante abhiññāte bhikkhū nissito.
atk-vin02a4:342: 393. Tassa avajānantoti tassa vacanaṃ avajānanto. Upayogatthe vā sāmivacanaṃ, taṃ avajānantoti attho.
atk-vin02a4:343: 394. Yaṃ atthāyāti yadatthāya. Taṃ atthanti so attho. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānamevāti.
atk-vin02a4:347: 403. Kathine – aṭṭha mātikāti khandhake vuttā pakkamanantikādikā aṭṭha. Palibodhānisaṃsāpi pubbe vuttā eva.
atk-vin02a4:348_0: 404. Payogassāti cīvaradhovanādino sattavidhassa pubbakaraṇassatthāya yo udakāharaṇādiko
atk-vin02a4:348_1: payogo kayirati, tassa payogassa. Katame dhammā anantarapaccayena paccayoti anāgatavasena
atk-vin02a4:348_2: anantarā hutvā katame dhammā paccayā hontīti attho. Samanantarapaccayenāti suṭṭhu
atk-vin02a4:348_3: anantarapaccayena, anantarapaccayameva āsannataraṃ katvā pucchati. Nissayapaccayenāti
atk-vin02a4:348_4: uppajjamānassa payogassa nissayaṃ ādhārabhāvaṃ upagatā viya hutvā katame dhammā paccayā
atk-vin02a4:348_5: hontīti attho. Upanissayapaccayenāti upetena nissayapaccayena; nissayapaccayameva
atk-vin02a4:348_6: upagatataraṃ katvā pucchati. Purejātapaccayenāti iminā paṭhamaṃ uppannassa paccayabhāvaṃ
atk-vin02a4:348_7: pucchati. Pacchājātapaccayenāti iminā pacchā uppajjanakassa paccayabhāvaṃ pucchati.
atk-vin02a4:348_8: Sahajātapaccayenāti iminā apubbaṃ acarimaṃ uppajjamānānaṃ paccayabhāvaṃ pucchati.
atk-vin02a4:348_11: Mātikānañca palibodhānañcāti aṭṭhannaṃ mātikānaṃ dvinnañca palibodhānaṃ. Vatthussāti
atk-vin02a4:349_0: Evaṃ yañca labbhati yañca na labbhati, sabbaṃ pucchitvā idāni yaṃ yassa labbhati,
atk-vin02a4:349_1: tadeva dassento pubbakaraṇaṃ payogassātiādinā nayena vissajjanamāha. Tassattho –
atk-vin02a4:349_2: yaṃ vuttaṃ “payogassa katame dhammā”tiādi, tattha vuccate, pubbakaraṇaṃ payogassa
atk-vin02a4:349_4: hi sattavidhampi pubbakaraṇaṃ yasmā tena payogena nipphādetabbassa pubbakaraṇassatthāya
atk-vin02a4:349_5: so payogo kayirati, tasmā imehi catūhi paccayehi paccayo hoti. Purejātapaccaye panesa
atk-vin02a4:349_6: uddiṭṭhadhammesu ekadhammampi na labhati, aññadatthu pubbakaraṇassa sayaṃ purejātapaccayo
atk-vin02a4:349_7: hoti, payoge sati pubbakaraṇassa nipphajjanato. Tena vuttaṃ – “payogo pubbakaraṇassa
atk-vin02a4:349_8: purejātapaccayena paccayo”ti. Pacchājātapaccayaṃ pana labhati, tena vuttaṃ – “pubbakaraṇaṃ
atk-vin02a4:349_9: payogassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo”ti. Pacchā uppajjanakassa hi pubbakaraṇassa
atk-vin02a4:349_10: atthāya so payogo kayirati. Sahajātapaccayaṃ pana mātikāpalibodhānisaṃsasaṅkhāte
atk-vin02a4:349_11: pannarasa dhamme ṭhapetvā añño payogādīsu ekopi dhammo na labhati, te eva hi pannarasa
atk-vin02a4:349_12: dhammā saha kathinatthārena ekato nipphajjantīti aññamaññaṃ sahajātapaccayā honti.
atk-vin02a4:349_13: Tena vuttaṃ – “pannarasa dhammā sahajātapaccayena paccayo”ti. Etenupāyena sabbapadavissajjanāni veditabbāni.
atk-vin02a4:352_1: ettha cha cīvarāni hetu ceva paccayo cāti veditabbāni. Pubbapayogādīnañhi sabbesaṃ
atk-vin02a4:352_2: tāniyeva hetu, tāni paccayo. Na hi chabbidhe cīvare asati payogo atthi, na pubbakaraṇādīni,
atk-vin02a4:353_0: 408. Saṅgahavāre – vacībhedenāti “imāya saṅghāṭiyā, iminā uttarāsaṅgena, iminā antaravāsakena
atk-vin02a4:353_1: kathinaṃ attharāmī”ti etena vacībhedena. Katimūlādipucchāvissajjane – kiriyā majjheti
atk-vin02a4:354: 411. Vatthuvipannaṃ hotīti akappiyadussaṃ hoti. Kālavipannaṃ nāma ajja dāyakehi dinnaṃ sve saṅgho kathinatthārakassa deti. Karaṇavipannaṃ nāma tadaheva chinditvā akataṃ.
atk-vin02a4:356_0: 412. Kathinaṃ jānitabbantiādipucchāya vissajjane – tesaññeva dhammānanti yesu rūpādidhammesu
atk-vin02a4:356_1: sati kathinaṃ nāma hoti, tesaṃ samodhānaṃ missībhāvo. Nāmaṃ nāmakammantiādinā pana
atk-vin02a4:356_2: “kathina”nti idaṃ bahūsu dhammesu nāmamattaṃ, na paramatthato eko dhammo atthīti dasseti.
atk-vin02a4:357_0: Catuvīsatiyā ākārehīti “na ullikhitamattenā”tiādīhi pubbe vuttakāraṇehi. Sattarasahi
atk-vin02a4:357_1: ākārehīti “ahatena atthataṃ hoti kathina”ntiādīhi pubbe vuttakāraṇehi. Nimittakammādīsu
atk-vin02a4:358_0: 416. Ekuppādā ekanirodhāti uppajjamānāpi ekato uppajjanti, nirujjhamānāpi ekato nirujjhanti.
atk-vin02a4:358_1: Ekuppādā nānānirodhāti uppajjamānā ekato uppajjanti, nirujjhamānā nānā nirujjhanti.
atk-vin02a4:358_2: Kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti? Sabbepi atthārena saddhiṃ ekato uppajjanti, atthāre hi sati uddhāro
atk-vin02a4:358_3: nāma. Nirujjhamānā panettha purimā dve atthārena saddhiṃ ekato nirujjhanti, uddhārabhāvaṃ
atk-vin02a4:358_4: pāpuṇanti. Atthārassa hi nirodho etesañca uddhārabhāvo ekakkhaṇe hoti, itare nānā
atk-vin02a4:358_5: nirujjhanti. Tesu uddhārabhāvaṃ pattesupi atthāro tiṭṭhatiyeva. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānamevāti.
atk-vin02a4:364_0: 417. Upālipañhesu katihi nu kho bhanteti pucchāya ayaṃ sambandho. Thero kira rahogato
atk-vin02a4:364_1: sabbāni imāni pañcakāni āvajjetvā “bhagavantaṃ dāni pucchitvā imesaṃ nissāya vasanakādīnaṃ
atk-vin02a4:364_2: atthāya tantiṃ ṭhapessāmī”ti bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā “katihi nu kho bhante”tiādinā
atk-vin02a4:364_3: nayena pañhe pucchi. Tesaṃ vissajjane uposathaṃ na jānātīti navavidhaṃ uposathaṃ
atk-vin02a4:364_4: na jānāti. Uposathakammaṃ na jānātīti adhammenavaggādibhedaṃ catubbidhaṃ uposathakammaṃ
atk-vin02a4:364_5: na jānāti. Pātimokkhaṃ na jānātīti dve mātikā na jānāti. Pātimokkhuddesaṃ na jānātīti
atk-vin02a4:364_6: bhikkhūnaṃ pañcavidhaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ catubbidhanti navavidhaṃ pātimokkhuddesaṃ na jānāti.
atk-vin02a4:365: Pavāraṇaṃ na jānātīti navavidhaṃ pavāraṇaṃ na jānāti. Pavāraṇākammaṃ na jānātīti adhammenavaggādibhedaṃ catubbidhaṃ pavāraṇākammaṃ na jānāti.
atk-vin02a4:366: Āpattānāpattiṃ na jānātīti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ sikkhāpade niddiṭṭhaṃ āpattiñca anāpattiñca na jānāti.
atk-vin02a4:367: Āpanno kammakatoti āpattiṃ āpanno tappaccayāva saṅghena kammaṃ kataṃ hoti.
atk-vin02a4:369: 420. Kammaṃ nappaṭippassambhetabbanti ayaṃ yasmā anulomavatte na vattati, tasmā nāssa kammaṃ paṭippassambhetabbaṃ; sarajjukova vissajjetabboti attho.
atk-vin02a4:370_0: 421. Sace upāli saṅgho samaggakaraṇīyāni kammāni karotīti sace samaggehi karaṇīyāni
atk-vin02a4:370_1: uposathādīni kammāni karoti, uposathapavāraṇādīsu hi ṭhitāsu upatthambho na dātabbo.
atk-vin02a4:370_2: Sace hi saṅgho accayaṃ desāpetvā saṅghasāmaggiṃ karoti, tiṇavatthārakasamathaṃ vā
atk-vin02a4:370_3: katvā uposathapavāraṇaṃ karoti, evarūpaṃ samaggakaraṇīyaṃ nāma kammaṃ hoti. Tatra
atk-vin02a4:370_4: ceti sace tādise kamme bhikkhuno nakkhamati, diṭṭhāvikammampi katvā tathārūpā sāmaggī
atk-vin02a4:370_5: upetabbā, evaṃ vilomaggāho na gaṇhitabbo. Yatra pana uddhammaṃ ubbinayaṃ satthu sāsanaṃ
atk-vin02a4:370_6: dīpenti, tattha diṭṭhāvikammaṃ na vaṭṭati, paṭibāhitvā pakkamitabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:371_0: Ussitamantī cāti lobhadosamohamānussannaṃ vācaṃ bhāsitā kaṇhavāco anatthakadīpano.
atk-vin02a4:371_1: Nissitajappīti attano dhammatāya ussadayuttaṃ bhāsituṃ na sakkoti; atha kho “mayā
atk-vin02a4:371_2: saddhiṃ rājā evaṃ kathesi, asukamahāmatto evaṃ kathesi, asuko nāma mayhaṃ ācariyo
atk-vin02a4:371_3: vā upajjhāyo vā tepiṭako mayā saddhiṃ evaṃ kathesī”ti evaṃ aññaṃ nissāya jappati.
atk-vin02a4:371_4: Na ca bhāsānusandhikusaloti kathānusandhivacane ca vinicchayānusandhivacane ca akusalo
atk-vin02a4:371_5: hoti. Na yathādhamme yathāvinayeti na bhūtena vatthunā āpattiṃ sāretvā codetā hoti.
atk-vin02a4:372_0: Ussādetā hotīti “amhākaṃ ācariyo mahātepiṭako paramadhammakathiko”tiādinā nayena
atk-vin02a4:372_1: ekaccaṃ ussādeti. Dutiyapade “āpattiṃ kiṃ so na jānātī”tiādinā ekaccaṃ apasādeti.
atk-vin02a4:372_2: Adhammaṃ gaṇhātīti aniyyānikapakkhaṃ gaṇhāti. Dhammaṃ paṭibāhatīti niyyānikapakkhaṃ
atk-vin02a4:372_3: paṭibāhati. Samphañca bahuṃ bhāsatīti bahuṃ niratthakakathaṃ katheti.
atk-vin02a4:373_0: Pasayha pavattā hotīti anajjhiṭṭho bhāre anāropite kevalaṃ mānaṃ nissāya ajjhottharitvā
atk-vin02a4:373_1: anadhikāre kathetā hoti. Anokāsakammaṃ kāretvāti okāsakammaṃ akāretvā pavattā hoti.
atk-vin02a4:373_2: Na yathādiṭṭhiyā byākatā hotīti yassa attano diṭṭhi taṃ purakkhatvā na byākatā; laddhiṃ
atk-vin02a4:373_3: nikkhipitvā ayathābhuccaṃ adhammādīsu dhammādiladdhiko hutvā kathetā hotīti attho.
atk-vin02a4:375_0: 424. Āpattiyā payogaṃ na jānātīti “ayaṃ āpatti kāyappayogā, ayaṃ vacīpayogā”ti na
atk-vin02a4:375_1: jānāti. Āpattiyā vūpasamaṃ na jānātīti “ayaṃ āpatti desanāya vūpasamati, ayaṃ vuṭṭhānena,
atk-vin02a4:375_2: ayaṃ neva desanāya na vuṭṭhānenā”ti na jānāti. Āpattiyā na vinicchayakusalo hotīti
atk-vin02a4:375_3: “imasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ ayaṃ āpattī”ti na jānāti, dosānurūpaṃ āpattiṃ uddharitvā patiṭṭhāpetuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-vin02a4:376_0: Adhikaraṇasamuṭṭhānaṃ na jānātīti “idaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ aṭṭhārasa bhedakaravatthūni nissāya
atk-vin02a4:376_1: samuṭṭhāti, idaṃ catasso vipattiyo, idaṃ pañca vā satta vā āpattikkhandhe, idaṃ cattāri
atk-vin02a4:376_2: saṅghakiccāni nissāya samuṭṭhātī”ti na jānāti. Payogaṃ na jānātīti “idaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ
atk-vin02a4:376_3: dvādasamūlappayogaṃ, idaṃ cuddasamūlappayogaṃ, idaṃ chamūlapayogaṃ, idaṃ ekamūlapayoga”nti
atk-vin02a4:376_4: na jānāti. Adhikaraṇānañhi yathāsakaṃmūlameva payogā nāma honti, taṃ sabbampi na
atk-vin02a4:376_5: jānātīti attho. Vūpasamaṃ na jānātīti “idaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ dvīhi samathehi vūpasamati,
atk-vin02a4:376_6: idaṃ tīhi, idaṃ catūhi, idaṃ ekena samathena vūpasamatī”ti na jānāti. Na vinicchayakusalo
atk-vin02a4:376_7: hotīti adhikaraṇaṃ vinicchinitvā samathaṃ pāpetuṃ na jānāti.
atk-vin02a4:377_0: Kammaṃ na jānātīti tajjanīyādi sattavidhaṃ kammaṃ na jānāti. Kammassa karaṇaṃ na
atk-vin02a4:377_1: jānātīti “idaṃ kammaṃ iminā nīhārena kātabba”nti na jānāti. Kammassa vatthuṃ na jānātīti
atk-vin02a4:377_2: “idaṃ tajjanīyassa vatthu, idaṃ niyassādīna”nti na jānāti. Vattanti sattasu kammesu
atk-vin02a4:377_3: heṭṭhā catunnaṃ kammānaṃ aṭṭhārasavidhaṃ tividhassa ca ukkhepanīyakammassa tecattālīsavidhaṃ
atk-vin02a4:377_4: vattaṃ na jānāti. Kammassa vūpasamaṃ na jānātīti “yo bhikkhu vatte vattitvā yācati,
atk-vin02a4:377_5: tassa kammaṃ paṭippassambhetabbaṃ, accayo desāpetabbo”ti na jānāti.
atk-vin02a4:378_0: Vatthuṃ na jānātīti sattannaṃ āpattikkhandhānaṃ vatthuṃ na jānāti. Nidānaṃ na jānātīti
atk-vin02a4:378_1: “idaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ imasmiṃ nagare paññattaṃ, idaṃ imasmi”nti na jānāti. Paññattiṃ
atk-vin02a4:378_2: na jānātīti paññattianupaññattianuppannapaññattivasena tividhaṃ paññattiṃ na jānāti.
atk-vin02a4:378_3: Padapaccābhaṭṭhaṃ na jānātīti sammukhā kātabbaṃ padaṃ na jānāti. “Buddho bhagavā”ti
atk-vin02a4:378_4: vattabbe “bhagavā buddho”ti heṭṭhupariyaṃ katvā padaṃ yojeti.
atk-vin02a4:379: Akusalo ca hoti vinayeti vinayapāḷiyañca aṭṭhakathāyañca akusalo hoti.
atk-vin02a4:380_0: Ñattiṃ na jānātīti saṅkhepato hi duvidhā ñatti – “esā ñattī”ti evaṃ niddiṭṭhā ca
atk-vin02a4:380_1: aniddiṭṭhā ca. Tattha yā evaṃ aniddiṭṭhā, sā “kammañatti” nāma hoti. Yā niddiṭṭhā,
atk-vin02a4:380_2: sā “kammapādañatti” nāma, taṃ sabbena sabbaṃ ñattiṃ na jānāti. Ñattiyā karaṇaṃ na
atk-vin02a4:380_3: jānātīti navasu ṭhānesu kammañattiyā karaṇaṃ na jānāti, dvīsu ṭhānesu kammapādañattiyā.
atk-vin02a4:380_4: Ñattiyā anussāvananti “imissā ñattiyā ekā anussāvanā, imissā tisso”ti na jānāti.
atk-vin02a4:380_5: Ñattiyā samathaṃ na jānātīti yvāyaṃ sativinayo, amūḷhavinayo, tassapāpiyasikā, tiṇavatthārakoti
atk-vin02a4:380_6: catubbidho samatho ñattiyā vinā na hoti, taṃ ñattiyā samathoti na jānāti. Ñattiyā
atk-vin02a4:380_7: vūpasamaṃ na jānātīti yaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ iminā catubbidhena ñattisamathena vūpasamati,
atk-vin02a4:380_8: tassa taṃ vūpasamaṃ “ayaṃ ñattiyā vūpasamo kato”ti na jānāti.
atk-vin02a4:381_0: Suttaṃ na jānātīti ubhatovibhaṅgaṃ na jānāti. Suttānulomaṃ na jānātīti cattāro mahāpadese
atk-vin02a4:381_1: na jānāti. Vinayaṃ na jānātīti khandhakaparivāraṃ na jānāti. Vinayānulomaṃ na jānātīti
atk-vin02a4:381_2: cattāro mahāpadeseyeva na jānāti. Na ca ṭhānāṭhānakusaloti kāraṇākāraṇakusalo na hoti.
atk-vin02a4:382_0: Dhammaṃ na jānātīti ṭhapetvā vinayapiṭakaṃ avasesaṃ piṭakadvayaṃ na jānāti. Dhammānulomaṃ
atk-vin02a4:382_1: na jānātīti suttantike cattāro mahāpadese na jānāti. Vinayaṃ na jānātīti khandhakaparivārameva
atk-vin02a4:382_2: na jānāti. Vinayānulomaṃ na jānātīti cattāro mahāpadese na jānāti. Ubhatovibhaṅgā
atk-vin02a4:382_3: panettha asaṅgahitā honti, tasmāyaṃ kurundiyaṃ vuttaṃ – “vinayanti sakalaṃ vinayapiṭakaṃ
atk-vin02a4:382_4: na jānātī”ti taṃ na gahetabbaṃ. Na ca pubbāparakusalo hotīti purekathāya ca pacchākathāya
atk-vin02a4:382_5: ca akusalo hoti. Sesaṃ sabbattha vuttapaṭipakkhavasena ñeyyattā pubbe pakāsitattā ca uttānamevāti.
atk-vin02a4:385_1: āpattidesanāsaṅkhātānaṃ vinayakammānametaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Anāpattiyā diṭṭhiṃ āvi karotīti
atk-vin02a4:385_2: anāpattimeva āpattīti desetīti attho. Adesanāgāminiyāti garukāpattiyā diṭṭhiṃ āvikaroti;
atk-vin02a4:385_3: saṅghādisesañca pārājikañca desetīti attho. Desitāyāti lahukāpattiyāpi desitāya diṭṭhiṃ
atk-vin02a4:386_0: Catūhi pañcahi diṭṭhinti yathā catūhi pañcahi diṭṭhi āvikatā hoti, evaṃ āvikaroti;
atk-vin02a4:386_1: cattāro pañca janā ekato āpattiṃ desentīti attho. Manomānasenāti manasaṅkhātena mānasena
atk-vin02a4:386_2: diṭṭhiṃ āvikaroti; vacībhedaṃ akatvā citteneva āpattiṃ desetīti attho.
atk-vin02a4:387_0: Nānāsaṃvāsakassāti laddhinānāsaṃvāsakassa vā kammanānāsaṃvāsakassa vā santike diṭṭhiṃ
atk-vin02a4:387_1: āvikaroti; āpattiṃ desetīti attho. Nānāsīmāyāti samānasaṃvāsakassāpi nānāsīmāya ṭhitassa
atk-vin02a4:387_2: santike āvikaroti. Māḷakasīmāya hi ṭhitena sīmantarikāya ṭhitassa sīmantarikāya vā
atk-vin02a4:387_3: ṭhitena avippavāsasīmāya ṭhitassāpi āpattiṃ desetuṃ na vaṭṭati. Apakatattassāti ukkhittakassa
atk-vin02a4:387_4: vā, yassa vā uposathapavāraṇā ṭhapitā honti, tassa santike desetīti attho.
atk-vin02a4:388: 430. Nālaṃ okāsakammaṃ kātunti na pariyattaṃ kātuṃ; na kātabbanti attho. Idhāpi apakatatto ukkhittako ca ṭhapitauposathapavāraṇo ca. Cāvanādhippāyoti sāsanato cāvetukāmo.
atk-vin02a4:389_0: 432. Mandattā momūhattāti mandabhāvena momūhabhāvena vissajjitampi jānituṃ asamattho,
atk-vin02a4:389_1: kevalaṃ attano momūhabhāvaṃ pakāsentoyeva pucchati ummattako viya. Pāpicchoti “evaṃ
atk-vin02a4:389_2: maṃ jano sambhāvessatī”ti pāpikāya icchāya pucchati. Paribhavāti paribhavaṃ āropetukāmo
atk-vin02a4:389_3: hutvā pucchati. Aññabyākaraṇesupi eseva nayo. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānamevāti. Attādānavagge
atk-vin02a4:389_4: ca dhutaṅgavagge ca yaṃ vattabbaṃ siyā, taṃ sabbaṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva.
atk-vin02a4:392_0: 444. Musāvādavagge – pārājikaṃ gacchatīti pārājikagāmī; pārājikāpattibhāvaṃ pāpuṇātīti
atk-vin02a4:392_1: attho. Itaresupi eseva nayo. Tattha asantauttarimanussadhammārocanamusāvādo pārājikagāmī,
atk-vin02a4:392_2: amūlakena pārājikena anuddhaṃsanamusāvādo saṅghādisesagāmī, “yo te vihāre vasatī”tiādinā
atk-vin02a4:392_3: pariyāyena jānantassa vuttamusāvādo thullaccayagāmī, ajānantassa dukkaṭagāmī, “sampajānamusāvāde
atk-vin02a4:393_0: Adassanenāti vinayadharassa adassanena. Kappiyākappiyesu hi kukkucce uppanne vinayadharaṃ
atk-vin02a4:393_1: disvā kappiyākappiyabhāvaṃ paṭipucchitvā akappiyaṃ pahāya kappiyaṃ kareyya, taṃ apassanto
atk-vin02a4:393_2: pana akappiyampi kappiyanti karonto āpajjati. Evaṃ āpajjitabbaṃ āpattiṃ vinayadharassa
atk-vin02a4:393_3: dassanena nāpajjati, adassaneneva āpajjati, tena vuttaṃ “adassanenā”ti. Assavanenāti
atk-vin02a4:393_4: ekavihārepi vasanto pana vinayadharassa upaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā kappiyākappiyaṃ apucchitvā
atk-vin02a4:393_5: vā aññesañca vuccamānaṃ asuṇanto āpajjatiyeva, tena vuttaṃ “assavanenā”ti. Pasuttakatāti
atk-vin02a4:393_6: pasuttakatāya. Sahagāraseyyañhi pasuttakabhāvenapi āpajjati. Akappiye kappiyasaññitāya
atk-vin02a4:393_7: āpajjanto pana tathāsaññī āpajjati. Satisammosā ekarattātikkamādivasena āpajjitabbaṃ
atk-vin02a4:396_0: 450. Bhikkhunivagge – alābhāyāti catunnaṃ paccayānaṃ alābhatthāya; yathā paccaye
atk-vin02a4:396_1: na labhanti, tathā parisakkati vāyamatīti attho. Anatthāyāti anatthaṃ kalisāsanaṃ
atk-vin02a4:396_2: āropento parisakkati. Avāsāyāti avāsatthāya; yasmiṃ gāmakhette vasanti, tato nīharaṇatthāya.
atk-vin02a4:397: 451. “Katihi nu kho bhante aṅgehi samannāgatāya bhikkhuniyā kammaṃ kātabba”nti sattannaṃ kammānaṃ aññataraṃ sandhāya pucchati.
atk-vin02a4:398_1: na kathetabbo. Yasmā pana khīṇāsavo bhikkhu na visaṃvādeti, tathārūpassa kathāmaggassa
atk-vin02a4:398_2: sāmī hutvā katheti, na itaro; tasmā paṭhamapañcake “na asekkhenā”ti paṭikkhipitvā
atk-vin02a4:399_1: na hoti. Na dhammapaṭisambhidāpattoti pāḷidhamme paṭisambhidāpatto na hoti. Na niruttipaṭisambhidāpattoti
atk-vin02a4:399_2: vohāraniruttiyaṃ paṭisambhidāpatto na hoti. Na paṭibhānapaṭisambhidāpattoti yāni
atk-vin02a4:399_3: tāni paṭibhānasaṅkhātāni atthapaṭisambhidādīni ñāṇāni, tesu paṭisambhidāpatto na
atk-vin02a4:399_4: hoti. Yathāvimuttaṃ cittaṃ na paccavekkhitāti catunnaṃ phalavimuttīnaṃ vasena yathāvimuttaṃ
atk-vin02a4:399_5: cittaṃ ekūnavīsatibhedāya paccavekkhaṇāya na paccavekkhitā hoti. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānamevāti.
atk-vin02a4:402_0: 455. Ubbāhikavagge – na atthakusaloti na aṭṭhakathākusalo; atthuddhāre cheko na hoti.
atk-vin02a4:402_1: Na dhammakusaloti ācariyamukhato anuggahitattā pāḷiyaṃ na kusalo, na pāḷisūro. Na
atk-vin02a4:402_2: niruttikusaloti bhāsantaravohāre na kusalo. Na byañjanakusaloti sithiladhanitādivasena
atk-vin02a4:402_3: parimaṇḍalabyañjanāropane kusalo na hoti; na akkharaparicchede nipuṇoti attho. Na
atk-vin02a4:403_0: Kodhanotiādīni yasmā kodhādīhi abhibhūto kāraṇākāraṇaṃ na jānāti, vinicchituṃ na
atk-vin02a4:403_1: sakkoti, tasmā vuttāni. Pasāretā hoti no sāretāti mohetā hoti, na satiuppādetā; codakacuditakānaṃ
atk-vin02a4:403_2: kathaṃ moheti pidahati na sāretīti attho. Sesamettha ubbāhikavagge uttānamevāti.
atk-vin02a4:406_0: 457. Adhikaraṇavūpasamavagge – puggalagaru hotīti “ayaṃ me upajjhāyo, ayaṃ me ācariyo”tiādīni
atk-vin02a4:406_1: cintetvā tassa jayaṃ ākaṅkhamāno “adhammaṃ dhammo”ti dīpeti. Saṅghagaru hotīti dhammañca
atk-vin02a4:406_2: vinayañca amuñcitvā vinicchinanto saṅghagaruko nāma hoti. Cīvarādīni gahetvā vinicchinanto
atk-vin02a4:406_3: āmisagaruko nāma hoti, tāni aggahetvā yathādhammaṃ vinicchinanto saddhammagaruko nāma hoti.
atk-vin02a4:407_0: 458. Pañcahupāli ākārehīti pañcahi kāraṇehi saṅgho bhijjati – kammena, uddesena,
atk-vin02a4:407_1: voharanto, anussāvanena, salākaggāhenāti. Ettha kammenāti apalokanādīsu catūsu kammesu
atk-vin02a4:407_2: aññatarena kammena. Uddesenāti pañcasu pātimokkhuddesesu aññatarena uddesena. Voharantoti
atk-vin02a4:407_3: kathayanto; tāhi tāhi upapattīhi “adhammaṃ dhammo”tiādīni aṭṭhārasa bhedakaravatthūni
atk-vin02a4:407_4: dīpento. Anussāvanenāti “nanu tumhe jānātha mayhaṃ uccākulā pabbajitabhāvaṃ bahussutabhāvañca,
atk-vin02a4:407_5: mādiso nāma uddhammaṃ ubbinayaṃ satthu sāsanaṃ gāheyyāti cittampi uppādetuṃ tumhākaṃ
atk-vin02a4:407_6: yuttaṃ, kiṃ mayhaṃ avīci nīluppalavanamiva sītalo, kimahaṃ apāyato na bhāyāmī”tiādinā
atk-vin02a4:407_7: nayena kaṇṇamūle vacībhedaṃ katvā anussāvanena. Salākaggāhenāti evaṃ anussāvetvā
atk-vin02a4:407_8: tesaṃ cittaṃ upatthambhetvā anivattidhamme katvā “gaṇhatha imaṃ salāka”nti salākaggāhena.
atk-vin02a4:408_0: Ettha ca kammameva uddeso vā pamāṇaṃ, vohārānussāvanasalākaggāhā pana pubbabhāgā.
atk-vin02a4:408_1: Aṭṭhārasavatthudīpanavasena hi voharante tattha rucijananatthaṃ anussāvetvā salākāya
atk-vin02a4:408_2: gāhitāyapi abhinnova hoti saṅgho. Yadā pana evaṃ cattāro vā atireke vā salākaṃ gāhetvā
atk-vin02a4:408_3: āveṇikaṃ kammaṃ vā uddesaṃ vā karoti, tadā saṅgho bhinno nāma hoti. Iti yaṃ saṅghabhedakakkhandhakavaṇṇanāyaṃ
atk-vin02a4:408_4: avocumhā “evaṃ aṭṭhārasasu vatthūsu yaṃkiñci ekampi vatthuṃ dīpetvā tena tena kāraṇena
atk-vin02a4:408_5: ‘imaṃ gaṇhatha, imaṃ rocethā’ti saññāpetvā salākaṃ gāhetvā visuṃ saṅghakamme kate
atk-vin02a4:408_6: saṅgho bhinno hoti. Parivāre pana ‘pañcahi, upāli, ākārehi saṅgho bhijjatī’tiādi
atk-vin02a4:408_7: vuttaṃ. Tassa iminā idha vuttena saṅghabhedalakkhaṇena atthato nānākaraṇaṃ natthi.
atk-vin02a4:408_8: Taṃ panassa nānākaraṇābhāvaṃ tattheva pakāsayissāmā”ti, svāyaṃ pakāsito hoti.
atk-vin02a4:409_0: Paññattetanti paññattaṃ etaṃ. Kva paññattaṃ? Vattakkhandhake. Tatra hi cuddasa khandhakavattāni
atk-vin02a4:409_1: paññattāni. Tenāha – “paññattetaṃ, upāli, mayā āgantukānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ āgantukavatta”ntiādi.
atk-vin02a4:409_2: Evampi kho upāli saṅgharāji hoti, no ca saṅghabhedoti ettāvatā hi saṅgharājimattameva
atk-vin02a4:409_3: hoti, na tāva saṅghabhedo; anupubbena pana ayaṃ saṅgharāji vaḍḍhamānā saṅghabhedāya
atk-vin02a4:409_4: saṃvattatīti attho. Yathārattanti rattiparimāṇānurūpaṃ; yathātheranti attho. Āvenibhāvaṃ
atk-vin02a4:409_5: karitvāti visuṃ vavatthānaṃ karitvā. Kammākammāni karontīti aparāparaṃ saṅghakammaṃ
atk-vin02a4:409_6: upādāya khuddakāni ceva mahantāni ca kammāni karonti. Sesametthāpi adhikaraṇavūpasamavagge uttānameva.
atk-vin02a4:411_0: 459. Saṅghabhedavaggadvaye – vinidhāya diṭṭhiṃ kammenāti tesu adhammādīsu adhammādayo
atk-vin02a4:411_1: eteti evaṃdiṭṭhikova hutvā taṃ diṭṭhiṃ vinidhāya te dhammādivasena dīpetvā visuṃ
atk-vin02a4:411_2: kammaṃ karoti. Iti yaṃ vinidhāya diṭṭhiṃ kammaṃ karoti, tena evaṃ katena vinidhāya
atk-vin02a4:411_3: diṭṭhiṃ kammena saddhiṃ pañcaṅgāni honti, “imehi kho upāli pañcahaṅgehī”ti ayamekasmiṃ
atk-vin02a4:411_4: pañcake atthayojanā. Etena nayena sabbapañcakāni veditabbāni. Etthāpi ca vohārādi
atk-vin02a4:411_5: aṅgattayaṃ pubbabhāgavaseneva vuttaṃ. Kammuddesavasena pana atekicchatā veditabbā.
atk-vin02a4:411_6: Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānameva. Na hettha kiñci atthi yaṃ pubbe avuttanayaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:413: 461. Āvāsikavagge – yathābhataṃ nikkhittoti yathā āharitvā ṭhapito.
atk-vin02a4:414: 462. Vinayabyākaraṇāti vinayapañhe vissajjanā. Pariṇāmetīti niyāmeti dīpeti katheti. Sesamettha uttānameva.
atk-vin02a4:416_0: 467. Kathinatthāravagge – otamasikoti andhakāragato; tañhi vandantassa mañcapādādīsupi
atk-vin02a4:416_1: nalāṭaṃ paṭihaññeyya. Asamannāharantoti kiccayapasutattā vandanaṃ asamannāharanto.
atk-vin02a4:416_2: Suttoti niddaṃ okkanto. Ekāvattoti ekato āvatto sapattapakkhe ṭhito verī visabhāgapuggalo
atk-vin02a4:416_3: vuccati; ayaṃ avandiyo. Ayañhi vandiyamāno pādenapi pahareyya. Aññavihitoti aññaṃ cintayamāno.
atk-vin02a4:417_0: Khādantoti piṭṭhakhajjakādīni khādanto. Uccārañca passāvañca karonto anokāsagatattā
atk-vin02a4:417_1: avandiyo. Ukkhittakoti tividhenapi ukkhepanīyakammena ukkhittako avandiyo. Tajjanīyādikammakatā
atk-vin02a4:417_2: pana cattāro vanditabbā. Uposathapavāraṇāpi tehi saddhiṃ labbhanti. Ādito paṭṭhāya
atk-vin02a4:417_3: ca vuttesu avandiyesu naggañca ukkhittakañca vandantasseva āpatti. Itaresaṃ pana
atk-vin02a4:417_4: asāruppaṭṭhena ca antarā vuttakāraṇena ca vandanā paṭikkhittā. Ito paraṃ pacchāupasampannādayo
atk-vin02a4:417_5: dasapi āpattivatthubhāveneva avandiyā. Te vandantassa hi niyameneva āpatti. Iti imesu
atk-vin02a4:417_6: pañcasu pañcakesu terasa jane vandantassa anāpatti, dvādasannaṃ vandanāya āpatti.
