atk-vin02a4:418: 468. Ācariyo vandiyoti pabbajjācariyo upasampadācariyo nissayācariyo uddesācariyo ovādācariyoti ayaṃ pañcavidhopi ācariyo vandiyo. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānamevāti.
atk-vin02a4:422_0: 470. Acittako āpajjatītiādīsu sahaseyyādipaṇṇattivajjaṃ asañcicca āpajjanto acittako
atk-vin02a4:422_1: āpajjati, desento sacittako vuṭṭhāti. Yaṃkiñci sañcicca āpajjanto sacittako āpajjati,
atk-vin02a4:422_2: tiṇavatthārakena vuṭṭhahanto acittako vuṭṭhāti. Pubbe vuttameva tiṇavatthārakena
atk-vin02a4:422_3: vuṭṭhahanto acittako āpajjati, acittako vuṭṭhāti. Itaraṃ desento sacittako āpajjati,
atk-vin02a4:422_4: sacittako vuṭṭhāti. “Dhammadānaṃ karomī”ti padasodhammādīni karonto kusalacitto āpajjati,
atk-vin02a4:422_5: “buddhānaṃ anusāsaniṃ karomī”ti udaggacitto desento kusalacitto vuṭṭhāti. Domanassiko
atk-vin02a4:422_6: hutvā desento akusalacitto vuṭṭhāti, tiṇavatthārakena niddāgatova vuṭṭhahanto abyākatacitto
atk-vin02a4:422_7: vuṭṭhāti. Bhiṃsāpanādīni katvā “buddhānaṃ sāsanaṃ karomī”ti somanassiko desento akusalacitto
atk-vin02a4:422_8: āpajjati, kusalacitto vuṭṭhāti. Domanassikova desento akusalacitto vuṭṭhāti, vuttanayeneva
atk-vin02a4:422_9: tiṇavatthārakena vuṭṭhahanto abyākatacitto vuṭṭhāti. Niddokkantasamaye sahagāraseyyaṃ
atk-vin02a4:422_10: āpajjanto abyākatacitto āpajjati, vuttanayeneva panettha “kusalacitto vuṭṭhātī”tiādi veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:423: Paṭhamaṃ pārājikaṃ katihi samuṭṭhānehītiādi pubbe vuttanayattā uttānameva.
atk-vin02a4:424: 473. Cattāro pārājikā katihi samuṭṭhānehītiādīsu ukkaṭṭhaparicchedato yaṃ yaṃ samuṭṭhānaṃ yassa yassa labbhati, taṃ sabbaṃ vuttameva hoti.
atk-vin02a4:428_0: 474. “Kati āpattiyo kāyikā”tiādigāthānaṃ vissajjane cha āpattiyo kāyikāti antarapeyyāle
atk-vin02a4:428_1: catutthena āpattisamuṭṭhānena cha āpattiyo āpajjati, “bhikkhu methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevati,
atk-vin02a4:428_2: āpatti pārājikassā”tiādinā nayena vuttāpattiyo. Kāyadvāre samuṭṭhitattā hi etā kāyikāti
atk-vin02a4:428_3: vuccanti. Cha vācasikāti tasmiṃyeva antarapeyyāle pañcamena āpattisamuṭṭhānena cha
atk-vin02a4:428_4: āpattiyo āpajjati, “bhikkhu pāpiccho icchāpakato”tiādinā nayena vuttāpattiyo. Chādentassa
atk-vin02a4:428_5: tissoti vajjapaṭicchādikāya bhikkhuniyā pārājikaṃ, bhikkhussa saṅghādisesapaṭicchādane
atk-vin02a4:428_6: pācittiyaṃ, attano duṭṭhullāpattipaṭicchādane dukkaṭaṃ. Pañca saṃsaggapaccayāti bhikkhuniyā
atk-vin02a4:428_7: kāyasaṃsagge pārājikaṃ, bhikkhuno saṅghādiseso, kāyena kāyapaṭibaddhe thullaccayaṃ,
atk-vin02a4:428_8: nissaggiyena kāyapaṭibaddhe dukkaṭaṃ, aṅgulipatodake pācittiyanti imā kāyasaṃsaggapaccayā pañcāpattiyo.
atk-vin02a4:429_1: bhikkhuniyā rattivippavāse saṅghādiseso, “paṭhamampi yāmaṃ chādeti, dutiyampi tatiyampi
atk-vin02a4:429_2: yāmaṃ chādeti, uddhaste aruṇe channā hoti āpatti, yo chādeti so dukkaṭaṃ desāpetabbo”ti
atk-vin02a4:429_3: imā aruṇugge tisso āpattiyo āpajjati. Dve yāvatatiyakāti ekādasa yāvatatiyakā nāma,
atk-vin02a4:429_4: paññattivasena pana dve honti bhikkhūnaṃ yāvatatiyakā bhikkhunīnaṃ yāvatatiyakāti.
atk-vin02a4:429_5: Ekettha aṭṭhavatthukāti bhikkhunīnaṃyeva ekā ettha imasmiṃ sāsane aṭṭhavatthukā nāma.
atk-vin02a4:429_6: Ekena sabbasaṅgahoti “yassa siyā āpatti, so āvikareyyā”ti iminā ekena nidānuddesena
atk-vin02a4:430_0: Vinayassa dve mūlānīti kāyo ceva vācā ca. Garukā dve vuttāti pārājikasaṅghādisesā.
atk-vin02a4:430_1: Dve duṭṭhullacchādanāti vajjapaṭicchādikāya pārājikaṃ saṅghādisesaṃ paṭicchādakassa
atk-vin02a4:431_0: Gāmantare catassoti “bhikkhu bhikkhuniyā saddhiṃ saṃvidahati, dukkaṭaṃ; aññassa gāmassa
atk-vin02a4:431_1: upacāraṃ okkamati, pācittiyaṃ; bhikkhuniyā gāmantaraṃ gacchantiyā parikkhitte gāme
atk-vin02a4:431_2: paṭhamapāde thullaccayaṃ, dutiyapāde saṅghādiseso; aparikkhittassa paṭhamapāde upacārokkamane
atk-vin02a4:431_4: catasso āpattiyo. Catasso nadipārapaccayāti “bhikkhu bhikkhuniyā saddhiṃ saṃvidahati,
atk-vin02a4:431_5: dukkaṭaṃ; nāvaṃ abhiruhati, pācittiyaṃ; bhikkhuniyā nadipāraṃ gacchantiyā uttaraṇakāle
atk-vin02a4:431_6: paṭhamapāde thullaccayaṃ, dutiyapāde saṅghādiseso”ti imā catasso. Ekamaṃse thullaccayanti
atk-vin02a4:432_0: Dve vācasikā rattinti bhikkhunī rattandhakāre appadīpe purisena saddhiṃ hatthapāse
atk-vin02a4:432_1: ṭhitā sallapati, pācittiyaṃ; hatthapāsaṃ vijahitvā ṭhitā sallapati, dukkaṭaṃ. Dve
atk-vin02a4:432_2: vācasikā divāti bhikkhunī divā paṭicchanne okāse purisena saddhiṃ hatthapāse ṭhitā
atk-vin02a4:432_3: sallapati, pācittiyaṃ; hatthapāsaṃ vijahitvā sallapati, dukkaṭaṃ. Dadamānassa tissoti
atk-vin02a4:432_4: maraṇādhippāyo manussassa visaṃ deti, so ce tena marati, pārājikaṃ; yakkhapetānaṃ
atk-vin02a4:432_5: deti, te ce maranti, thullaccayaṃ; tiracchānagatassa deti, so ce marati, pācittiyaṃ;
atk-vin02a4:432_6: aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā cīvaradāne pācittiyanti evaṃ dadamānassa tisso āpattiyo. Cattāro
atk-vin02a4:432_7: ca paṭiggaheti hatthaggāha-veṇiggāhesu saṅghādiseso, mukhena aṅgajātaggahaṇe pārājikaṃ,
atk-vin02a4:432_8: aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā cīvarapaṭiggahaṇe nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ, avassutāya avassutassa
atk-vin02a4:432_9: hatthato khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ paṭiggaṇhantiyā thullaccayaṃ; evaṃ paṭiggahe cattāro
atk-vin02a4:434: 475. Pañca desanāgāminiyoti lahukā pañca. Cha sappaṭikammāti pārājikaṃ ṭhapetvā avasesā. Ekettha appaṭikammāti ekā pārājikāpatti.
atk-vin02a4:435_0: Vinayagarukā dve vuttāti pārājikañceva saṅghādisesañca. Kāyavācasikāni cāti sabbāneva
atk-vin02a4:435_1: sikkhāpadāni kāyavācasikāni, manodvāre paññattaṃ ekasikkhāpadampi natthi. Eko vikāle
atk-vin02a4:435_2: dhaññarasoti loṇasovīrakaṃ. Ayameva hi eko dhaññaraso vikāle vaṭṭati. Ekā ñatticatutthena
atk-vin02a4:435_3: sammutīti bhikkhunovādakasammuti. Ayameva hi ekā ñatticatutthakammena sammuti anuññātā.
atk-vin02a4:436_0: Pārājikā kāyikā dveti bhikkhūnaṃ methunapārājikaṃ bhikkhunīnañca kāyasaṃsaggapārājikaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:436_1: Dve saṃvāsabhūmiyoti attanā vā attānaṃ samānasaṃvāsakaṃ karoti, samaggo vā saṅgho
atk-vin02a4:436_2: ukkhittaṃ osāreti. Kurundiyaṃ pana “samānasaṃvāsakabhūmi ca nānāsaṃvāsakabhūmi cā”ti
atk-vin02a4:436_3: evaṃ dve saṃvāsabhūmiyo vuttā. Dvinnaṃ ratticchedoti pārivāsikassa ca mānattacārikassa
atk-vin02a4:436_4: ca paññattā. Dvaṅgulā duveti dve dvaṅgulapaññattiyo, “dvaṅgulapabbaparamaṃ ādātabba”nti
atk-vin02a4:437_0: Dve attānaṃ vadhitvānāti bhikkhunī attānaṃ vadhitvā dve āpattiyo āpajjati; vadhati
atk-vin02a4:437_1: rodati, āpatti pācittiyassa; vadhati na rodati, āpatti dukkaṭassa. Dvīhi saṅgho bhijjatīti
atk-vin02a4:437_2: kammena ca salākaggāhena ca. Dvettha paṭhamāpattikāti ettha sakalepi vinaye dve paṭhamāpattikā
atk-vin02a4:437_3: ubhinnaṃ paññattivasena. Itarathā pana nava bhikkhūnaṃ nava bhikkhunīnanti aṭṭhārasa
atk-vin02a4:437_4: honti. Ñattiyā karaṇā duveti dve ñattikiccāni – kammañca kammapādakā ca. Navasu ṭhānesu
atk-vin02a4:438_0: Pāṇātipāte tissoti “anodissa opātaṃ khaṇati, sace manusso marati, pārājikaṃ; yakkhapetānaṃ
atk-vin02a4:438_1: maraṇe thullaccayaṃ; tiracchānagatassa maraṇe pācittiya”nti imā tisso honti. Vācā
atk-vin02a4:438_2: pārājikā tayoti vajjapaṭicchādikāya ukkhittānuvattikāya aṭṭhavatthukāyāti. Kurundiyaṃ
atk-vin02a4:438_3: pana “āṇattiyā adinnādāne, manussamaraṇe, uttarimanussadhammaullapane cā”ti evaṃ
atk-vin02a4:438_4: tayo vuttā. Obhāsanā tayoti vaccamaggaṃ passāvamaggaṃ ādissa vaṇṇāvaṇṇabhāsane saṅghādiseso,
atk-vin02a4:438_5: vaccamaggaṃ passāvamaggaṃ ṭhapetvā adhakkhakaṃ ubbhajāṇumaṇḍalaṃ ādissa vaṇṇāvaṇṇabhaṇane
atk-vin02a4:438_6: thullaccayaṃ, ubbhakkhakaṃ adhojāṇumaṇḍalaṃ ādissa vaṇṇāvaṇṇabhaṇane dukkaṭaṃ. Sañcarittena
atk-vin02a4:438_7: vā tayoti paṭiggaṇhāti vīmaṃsati paccāharati, āpatti saṅghādisesassa; paṭiggaṇhāti
atk-vin02a4:438_8: vīmaṃsati na paccāharati, āpatti thullaccayassa; paṭiggaṇhāti na vīmaṃsati na paccāharati,
atk-vin02a4:438_9: āpatti dukkaṭassāti ime sañcarittena kāraṇabhūtena tayo āpattikkhandhā honti.
atk-vin02a4:439_0: Tayo puggalā na upasampādetabbāti addhānahīno aṅgahīno vatthuvipanno ca tesaṃ nānākaraṇaṃ
atk-vin02a4:439_1: vuttameva. Apicettha yo pattacīvarena aparipūro, paripūro ca na yācati, imepi aṅgahīneneva
atk-vin02a4:439_3: vatthuvipanneneva saṅgahitāti veditabbā. Esa nayo kurundiyaṃ vutto. Tayo kammānaṃ
atk-vin02a4:439_4: saṅgahāti ñattikappanā, vippakatapaccattaṃ, atītakaraṇanti. Tattha “dadeyya kareyyā”tiādibhedā
atk-vin02a4:439_6: atītakaraṇaṃ nāmāti imehi tīhi kammāni saṅgayhanti. Aparehipi tīhi kammāni saṅgayhanti
atk-vin02a4:439_7: – vatthunā, ñattiyā, anussāvanāyāti. Vatthusampannañhi ñattisampannaṃ anussāvanasampannañca
atk-vin02a4:439_8: kammaṃ nāma hoti, tena vuttaṃ “tayo kammānaṃ saṅgahā”ti. Nāsitakā tayo nāma mettiyaṃ
atk-vin02a4:439_9: bhikkhuniṃ nāsetha, dūsako nāsetabbo, dasahaṅgehi samannāgato sāmaṇero nāsetabbo,
atk-vin02a4:439_10: kaṇṭakaṃ samaṇuddesaṃ nāsethāti evaṃ liṅgasaṃvāsadaṇḍakammanāsanāvasena tayo nāsitakā
atk-vin02a4:439_11: veditabbā. Tiṇṇannaṃ ekavācikāti “anujānāmi bhikkhave dve tayo ekānussāvane kātu”nti
atk-vin02a4:439_12: vacanato tiṇṇaṃ janānaṃ ekupajjhāyena nānācariyena ekānussāvanā vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a4:440_0: Adinnādāne tissoti pāde vā atirekapāde vā pārājikaṃ, atirekamāsake thullaccayaṃ,
atk-vin02a4:440_1: māsake vā ūnamāsake vā dukkaṭaṃ. Catasso methunapaccayāti akkhayite pārājikaṃ, yebhuyyena
atk-vin02a4:440_2: khayite thullaccayaṃ, vivaṭakate mukhe dukkaṭaṃ, jatumaṭṭhake pācittiyaṃ. Chindantassa
atk-vin02a4:440_3: tissoti vanappatiṃ chindantassa pārājikaṃ, bhūtagāme pācittiyaṃ, aṅgajāte thullaccayaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:440_4: Pañca chaḍḍitapaccayāti anodissa visaṃ chaḍḍeti, sace tena manusso marati, pārājikaṃ;
atk-vin02a4:440_5: yakkhapetesu thullaccayaṃ; tiracchānagate pācittiyaṃ; vissaṭṭhichaḍḍane saṅghādiseso;
atk-vin02a4:440_6: sekhiyesu harite uccārapassāvachaḍḍane dukkaṭaṃ – imā chaḍḍitapaccayā pañcāpattiyo honti.
atk-vin02a4:441_0: Pācittiyena dukkaṭā katāti bhikkhunovādakavaggasmiṃ dasasu sikkhāpadesu pācittiyena
atk-vin02a4:441_1: saddhiṃ dukkaṭā katā evāti attho. Caturettha navakā vuttāti paṭhamasikkhāpadamhiyeva
atk-vin02a4:441_2: adhammakamme dve, dhammakamme dveti evaṃ cattāro navakā vuttāti attho. Dvinnaṃ cīvarena
atk-vin02a4:441_3: cāti bhikkhūnaṃ santike upasampannāya cīvaraṃ dentassa pācittiyaṃ, bhikkhunīnaṃ santike
atk-vin02a4:441_4: upasampannāya dentassa dukkaṭanti evaṃ dvinnaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ cīvaraṃ dentassa cīvarena
atk-vin02a4:442: Aṭṭha pāṭidesanīyāti pāḷiyaṃ āgatā eva. Bhuñjantāmakadhaññena pācittiyena dukkaṭā katāti āmakadhaññaṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjantiyā pācittiyena saddhiṃ dukkaṭā katāyeva.
atk-vin02a4:443_0: Gacchantassa catassoti bhikkhuniyā vā mātugāmena vā saddhiṃ saṃvidhāya gacchantassa
atk-vin02a4:443_1: dukkaṭaṃ, gāmūpacārokkamane pācittiyaṃ, yā bhikkhunī ekā gāmantaraṃ gacchati, tassā
atk-vin02a4:443_2: gāmūpacāraṃ okkamantiyā paṭhamapāde thullaccayaṃ, dutiyapāde saṅghādisesoti gacchantassa
atk-vin02a4:443_3: imā catasso āpattiyo honti. Ṭhitassa cāpi tattakāti ṭhitassapi catasso evāti attho.
atk-vin02a4:443_4: Kathaṃ? Bhikkhunī andhakāre vā paṭicchanne vā okāse mittasanthavavasena purisassa
atk-vin02a4:443_5: hatthapāse tiṭṭhati, pācittiyaṃ; hatthapāsaṃ vijahitvā tiṭṭhati, dukkaṭaṃ; aruṇuggamanakāle
atk-vin02a4:443_6: dutiyikāya hatthapāsaṃ vijahantī tiṭṭhati, thullaccayaṃ; vijahitvā tiṭṭhati, saṅghādisesoti
atk-vin02a4:443_7: nisinnassa catasso āpattiyo. Nipannassāpi tattakāti sacepi hi sā nisīdati vā nipajjati
atk-vin02a4:445_0: 476. Pañca pācittiyānīti pañca bhesajjāni paṭiggahetvā nānābhājanesu vā ekabhājane
atk-vin02a4:445_1: vā amissetvā ṭhapitāni honti, sattāhātikkame so bhikkhu pañca pācittiyāni sabbāni
atk-vin02a4:445_2: nānāvatthukāni ekakkhaṇe āpajjati, “imaṃ paṭhamaṃ āpanno, imaṃ pacchā”ti na vattabbo.
atk-vin02a4:446_0: Nava pācittiyānīti yo bhikkhu nava paṇītabhojanāni viññāpetvā tehi saddhiṃ ekato
atk-vin02a4:446_1: ekaṃ kabaḷaṃ omadditvā mukhe pakkhipitvā paragaḷaṃ atikkāmeti, ayaṃ nava pācittiyāni
atk-vin02a4:446_2: sabbāni nānāvatthukāni ekakkhaṇe āpajjati “imaṃ paṭhamaṃ āpanno, imaṃ pacchā”ti na
atk-vin02a4:446_3: vattabbo. Ekavācāya deseyyāti “ahaṃ, bhante, pañca bhesajjāni paṭiggahetvā sattāhaṃ
atk-vin02a4:446_4: atikkāmetvā pañca āpattiyo āpanno, tā tumhamūle paṭidesemī”ti evaṃ ekavācāya deseyya,
atk-vin02a4:446_5: desitāva honti, dvīhi tīhi vācāhi kiccaṃ nāma natthi. Dutiyavissajjanepi “ahaṃ, bhante,
atk-vin02a4:446_6: nava paṇītabhojanāni viññāpetvā bhuñjitvā nava āpattiyo āpanno, tā tumhamūle paṭidesemī”ti vattabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:447_0: Vatthuṃ kittetvā deseyyāti “ahaṃ, bhante, pañca bhesajjāni paṭiggahetvā sattāhaṃ
atk-vin02a4:447_1: atikkāmesiṃ, yathāvatthukaṃ taṃ tumhamūle paṭidesemī”ti evaṃ vatthuṃ kittetvā deseyya,
atk-vin02a4:447_2: desitāva honti āpattiyo, āpattiyā nāmaggahaṇena kiccaṃ natthi. Dutiyavissajjanepi
atk-vin02a4:447_3: “ahaṃ, bhante, nava paṇītabhojanāni viññāpetvā bhutto, yathāvatthukaṃ taṃ tumhamūle
atk-vin02a4:448_0: Yāvatatiyake tissoti ukkhittānuvattikāya pārājikaṃ bhedakānuvattakānaṃ kokālikādīnaṃ
atk-vin02a4:448_1: saṅghādisesaṃ, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge caṇḍakāḷikāya ca bhikkhuniyā pācittiyanti
atk-vin02a4:448_2: imā yāvatatiyakā tisso āpattiyo. Cha vohārapaccayāti payuttavācāpaccayā cha āpattiyo
atk-vin02a4:448_3: āpajjatīti attho. Kathaṃ? Ājīvahetu ājīvakāraṇā pāpiccho icchāpakato asantaṃ abhūtaṃ
atk-vin02a4:448_4: uttarimanussadhammaṃ ullapati, āpatti pārājikassa. Ājīvahetu ājīvakāraṇā sañcarittaṃ
atk-vin02a4:448_5: samāpajjati, āpatti saṅghādisesassa. Ājīvahetu ājīvakāraṇā yo te vihāre vasati so
atk-vin02a4:448_6: arahāti vadati, āpatti thullaccayassa. Ājīvahetu ājīvakāraṇā bhikkhu paṇītabhojanāni
atk-vin02a4:448_7: attano atthāya viññāpetvā bhuñjati, āpatti pācittiyassa. Ājīvahetu ājīvakāraṇā bhikkhunī
atk-vin02a4:448_8: paṇītabhojanāni attano atthāya viññāpetvā bhuñjati, āpatti pāṭidesanīyassa. Ājīvahetu
atk-vin02a4:448_9: ājīvakāraṇā sūpaṃ vā odanaṃ vā agilāno attano atthāya viññāpetvā bhuñjati, āpatti dukkaṭassāti.
atk-vin02a4:449_0: Khādantassa tissoti manussamaṃse thullaccayaṃ, avasesesu akappiyamaṃsesu dukkaṭaṃ,
atk-vin02a4:449_1: bhikkhuniyā lasuṇe pācittiyaṃ. Pañca bhojanapaccayāti avassutā avassutassa purisassa
atk-vin02a4:449_2: hatthato bhojanaṃ gahetvā tattheva manussamaṃsaṃ lasuṇaṃ attano atthāya viññāpetvā
atk-vin02a4:449_3: gahitapaṇītabhojanāni avasesañca akappiyamaṃsaṃ pakkhipitvā vomissakaṃ omadditvā
atk-vin02a4:449_4: ajjhoharamānā saṅghādisesaṃ, thullaccayaṃ, pācittiyaṃ, pāṭidesanīyaṃ, dukkaṭanti
atk-vin02a4:450_0: Pañca ṭhānānīti “ukkhittānuvattikāya bhikkhuniyā yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsanāya appaṭinissajjantiyā
atk-vin02a4:450_1: ñattiyā dukkaṭaṃ, dvīhi kammavācāhi thullaccayaṃ, kammavācāpariyosāne āpatti pārājikassa,
atk-vin02a4:450_2: saṅghabhedāya parakkamanādīsu saṅghādiseso, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge pācittiya”nti
atk-vin02a4:450_3: evaṃ sabbā yāvatatiyakā pañca ṭhānāni gacchanti. Pañcannañceva āpattīti āpatti nāma
atk-vin02a4:450_4: pañcannaṃ sahadhammikānaṃ hoti, tattha dvinnaṃ nippariyāyena āpattiyeva, sikkhāmānasāmaṇerisāmaṇerānaṃ
atk-vin02a4:450_5: pana akappiyattā na vaṭṭati. Iminā pariyāyena tesaṃ āpatti na desāpetabbā, daṇḍakammaṃ
atk-vin02a4:450_6: pana tesaṃ kātabbaṃ. Pañcannaṃ adhikaraṇena cāti adhikaraṇañca pañcannamevāti attho.
atk-vin02a4:450_7: Etesaṃyeva hi pañcannaṃ pattacīvarādīnaṃ atthāya vinicchayavohāro adhikaraṇanti vuccati,
atk-vin02a4:451_0: Pañcannaṃ vinicchayo hotīti pañcannaṃ sahadhammikānaṃyeva vinicchayo nāma hoti. Pañcannaṃ
atk-vin02a4:451_1: vūpasamena cāti etesaṃyeva pañcannaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vinicchitaṃ vūpasantaṃ nāma hotīti
atk-vin02a4:451_2: attho. Pañcannañceva anāpattīti etesaṃyeva pañcannaṃ anāpatti nāma hotīti attho.
atk-vin02a4:451_3: Tīhi ṭhānehi sobhatīti saṅghādīhi tīhi kāraṇehi sobhati. Katavītikkamo hi puggalo
atk-vin02a4:451_4: sappaṭikammaṃ āpattiṃ saṅghamajjhe gaṇamajjhe puggalasantike vā paṭikaritvā abbhuṇhasīlo
atk-vin02a4:451_5: pākatiko hoti, tasmā tīhi ṭhānehi sobhatīti vuccati.
atk-vin02a4:452_0: Dve kāyikā rattinti bhikkhunī rattandhakāre purisassa hatthapāse ṭhānanisajjasayanāni
atk-vin02a4:452_1: kappayamānā pācittiyaṃ, hatthapāsaṃ vijahitvā ṭhānādīni kappayamānā dukkaṭanti dve
atk-vin02a4:452_2: kāyadvārasambhavā āpattiyo rattiṃ āpajjati. Dve kāyikā divāti eteneva upāyena divā
atk-vin02a4:452_3: paṭicchanne okāse dve āpattiyo āpajjati. Nijjhāyantassa ekā āpattīti “na ca, bhikkhave,
atk-vin02a4:452_4: sārattena mātugāmassa aṅgajātaṃ upanijjhāyitabbaṃ. Yo upanijjhāyeyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti
atk-vin02a4:452_5: nijjhāyantassa ayamekā āpatti. Ekā piṇḍapātapaccayāti “na ca, bhikkhave, bhikkhādāyikāya
atk-vin02a4:452_6: mukhaṃ oloketabba”nti ettha dukkaṭāpatti, antamaso yāguṃ vā byañjanaṃ vā dentassa
atk-vin02a4:452_7: sāmaṇerassāpi hi mukhaṃ ullokayato dukkaṭameva. Kurundiyaṃ pana “ekā piṇḍapātapaccayāti
atk-vin02a4:453_0: Aṭṭhānisaṃse sampassanti kosambakakkhandhake vuttānisaṃse. Ukkhittakā tayo vuttāti
atk-vin02a4:453_1: āpattiyā adassane appaṭikamme pāpikāya ca diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissaggeti. Tecattālīsa
atk-vin02a4:453_2: sammāvattanāti tesaṃyeva ukkhittakānaṃ ettakesu vattesu vattanā.
atk-vin02a4:454_1: musāvādo gacchati. Cuddasa paramanti vuccatīti dasāhaparamādinayena heṭṭhā vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:454_2: Dvādasa pāṭidesanīyāti bhikkhūnaṃ cattāri bhikkhunīnaṃ aṭṭha. Catunnaṃ desanāya cāti
atk-vin02a4:454_3: catunnaṃ accayadesanāyāti attho. Katamā pana sāti? Devadattena payojitānaṃ abhimārānaṃ
atk-vin02a4:454_4: accayadesanā, anuruddhattherassa upaṭṭhāyikāya accayadesanā, vaḍḍhassa licchavino
atk-vin02a4:454_5: accayadesanā, vāsabhagāmiyattherassa ukkhepanīyakammaṃ katvā āgatānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-vin02a4:455_0: Aṭṭhaṅgiko musāvādoti “pubbevassa hoti musā bhaṇissa”nti ādiṃ katvā “vinidhāya sañña”nti
atk-vin02a4:455_1: pariyosānehi aṭṭhahi aṅgehi aṭṭhaṅgiko. Uposathaṅgānipi pāṇaṃ na hanetiādinā nayena
atk-vin02a4:455_2: vuttāneva. Aṭṭha dūteyyaṅgānīti “idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sotā ca hoti sāvetā cā”tiādinā
atk-vin02a4:455_3: nayena saṅghabhedake vuttāni. Aṭṭha titthiyavattāni mahākhandhake vuttāni.
atk-vin02a4:456_0: Aṭṭhavācikā upasampadāti bhikkhunīnaṃ upasampadaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Aṭṭhannaṃ paccuṭṭhātabbanti
atk-vin02a4:456_1: bhattagge aṭṭhannaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ itarāhi paccuṭṭhāya āsanaṃ dātabbaṃ. Bhikkhunovādako
atk-vin02a4:456_2: aṭṭhahīti aṭṭhahaṅgehi samannāgato bhikkhu bhikkhunovādako sammannitabbo.
atk-vin02a4:457_0: Ekassa chejjanti gāthāya navasu janesu yo salākaṃ gāhetvā saṅghaṃ bhindati, tasseva
atk-vin02a4:457_1: chejjaṃ hoti, devadatto viya pārājikaṃ āpajjati. Bhedakānuvattakānaṃ catunnaṃ thullaccayaṃ
atk-vin02a4:457_2: kokālikādīnaṃ viya, dhammavādīnaṃ catunnaṃ anāpatti. Imā pana āpattiyo ca anāpattiyo
atk-vin02a4:458: Nava āghātavatthūnīti gāthāya navahīti navahi bhikkhūhi saṅgho bhijjati. Ñattiyā karaṇā navāti ñattiyā kātabbāni kammāni navāti attho. Sesaṃ uttānameva.
atk-vin02a4:460_0: 477. Dasa puggalā nābhivādetabbāti senāsanakkhandhake vuttā dasa janā. Añjali sāmīcena
atk-vin02a4:460_1: cāti sāmīcikammena saddhiṃ añjali ca tesaṃ na kātabbo, neva pānīyāpucchanatālavaṇṭaggahaṇādi
atk-vin02a4:460_2: khandhakavattaṃ tesaṃ dassetabbaṃ, na añjali paggaṇhitabboti attho. Dasannaṃ dukkaṭanti
atk-vin02a4:460_3: tesaṃyeva dasannaṃ evaṃ karontassa dukkaṭaṃ hoti. Dasa cīvaradhāraṇāti dasa divasāni
atk-vin02a4:461_0: Pañcannaṃ vassaṃvuṭṭhānaṃ, dātabbaṃ idha cīvaranti pañcannaṃ sahadhammikānaṃ sammukhāva
atk-vin02a4:461_2: ukkhittakānanti imesaṃ sattannaṃ sante patirūpe gāhake parammukhāpi dātabbaṃ. Soḷasannaṃ
atk-vin02a4:461_3: na dātabbanti sesānaṃ cīvarakkhandhake vuttānaṃ paṇḍakādīnaṃ soḷasannaṃ na dātabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:462_0: Katisataṃ rattisataṃ, āpattiyo chādayitvānāti katisataṃ āpattiyo rattisataṃ chādayitvāna.
atk-vin02a4:462_1: Dasasataṃ rattisataṃ, āpattiyo chādayitvānāti dasasataṃ āpattiyo rattisataṃ chādayitvāna.
atk-vin02a4:462_2: Ayañhettha saṅkhepattho – yo divase sataṃ sataṃ saṅghādisesāpattiyo āpajjitvā dasa
atk-vin02a4:462_3: dasa divase paṭicchādeti, tena rattisataṃ āpattisahassaṃ paṭicchāditaṃ hoti, so sabbāva
atk-vin02a4:462_4: tā āpattiyo dasāhapaṭicchannāti parivāsaṃ yācitvā dasa rattiyo vasitvāna mucceyya pārivāsikoti.
atk-vin02a4:463_0: Dvādasa kammadosā vuttāti apalokanakammaṃ adhammenavaggaṃ, adhammenasamaggaṃ, dhammenavaggaṃ,
atk-vin02a4:464: Catasso kammasampattiyoti apalokanakammaṃ dhammenasamaggaṃ, tathā sesānipīti evaṃ catasso kammasampattiyo vuttā.
atk-vin02a4:465_2: cha kammāni vuttāni. Ekettha dhammikā katāti ekaṃ dhammena samaggakammamevettha dhammikaṃ
atk-vin02a4:466_0: Yaṃ desitāti yāni desitāni vuttāni pakāsitāni. Anantajinenātiādīsu pariyantaparicchedabhāvarahitattā
atk-vin02a4:466_1: anantaṃ vuccati nibbānaṃ, taṃ bhagavatā raññā sapattagaṇaṃ abhimadditvā rajjaṃ viya
atk-vin02a4:466_2: kilesagaṇaṃ abhimadditvā jitaṃ vijitaṃ adhigataṃ sampattaṃ, tasmā bhagavā “anantajino”ti
atk-vin02a4:466_4: vivekapañcakaṃ addasāti vivekadassī; tena anantajinena tādinā vivekadassinā yāni
atk-vin02a4:466_5: āpattikkhandhāni desitāni vuttāni. Ekettha sammati vinā samathehīti ayamettha padasambandho,
atk-vin02a4:466_6: yāni satthārā satta āpattikkhandhāni desitāni, tattha ekāpi āpatti vinā samathehi
atk-vin02a4:466_7: na sammati, atha kho cha samathā cattāri adhikaraṇānīti sabbepime dhammā sammukhāvinayena
atk-vin02a4:466_8: sammanti, samāyogaṃ gacchanti. Ettha pana eko sammukhāvinayova vinā samathehi sammati,
atk-vin02a4:466_9: samathabhāvaṃ gacchati. Na hi tassa aññena samathena vinā anipphatti nāma atthi.
atk-vin02a4:466_10: Tena vuttaṃ – “ekettha sammati vinā samathehī”ti. Iminā tāva adhippāyena aṭṭhakathāsu
atk-vin02a4:466_11: attho vutto. Mayaṃ pana “vinā”ti nipātassa paṭisedhanamattamatthaṃ gahetvā “ekettha
atk-vin02a4:466_12: sammati vinā samathehī”ti etesu sattasu āpattikkhandhesu eko pārājikāpattikkhandho
atk-vin02a4:466_13: vinā samathehi sammatīti etamatthaṃ roceyyāma. Vuttampi cetaṃ “yā sā āpatti anavasesā,
atk-vin02a4:466_14: sā āpatti na katamena adhikaraṇena katamamhi ṭhāne na katamena samathena sammatī”ti.
atk-vin02a4:467_0: Chaūnadiyaḍḍhasatāti “idha, upāli, bhikkhu adhammaṃ dhammoti dīpeti, tasmiṃ adhammadiṭṭhi
atk-vin02a4:467_1: bhede adhammadiṭṭhi, tasmiṃ adhammadiṭṭhi bhede dhammadiṭṭhi, tasmiṃ adhammadiṭṭhi
atk-vin02a4:467_2: bhede vematiko, tasmiṃ dhammadiṭṭhi bhede adhammadiṭṭhi, tasmiṃ dhammadiṭṭhi bhede
atk-vin02a4:467_3: vematiko, tasmiṃ vematiko bhede adhammadiṭṭhi, tasmiṃ vematiko bhede dhammadiṭṭhi,
atk-vin02a4:467_4: tasmiṃ vematiko bhede vematiko”ti evaṃ yāni aṭṭhārasannaṃ bhedakaravatthūnaṃ vasena
atk-vin02a4:467_5: aṭṭhārasa aṭṭhakāni saṅghabhedakakkhandhake vuttāni, tesaṃ vasena chaūnadiyaḍḍhasataṃ āpāyikā veditabbā.
atk-vin02a4:468_0: Aṭṭhārasa anāpāyikāti “idha, upāli, bhikkhu adhammaṃ dhammoti dīpeti, tasmiṃ dhammadiṭṭhi
atk-vin02a4:468_1: bhede dhammadiṭṭhi avinidhāya diṭṭhiṃ avinidhāya khantiṃ avinidhāya ruciṃ avinidhāya
atk-vin02a4:468_2: bhāvaṃ anussāveti, salākaṃ gāheti ‘ayaṃ dhammo, ayaṃ vinayo, idaṃ satthusāsanaṃ,
atk-vin02a4:468_3: imaṃ gaṇhatha, imaṃ rocethā’ti, ayampi kho, upāli, saṅghabhedako na āpāyiko na nerayiko
atk-vin02a4:468_4: na kappaṭṭho na atekiccho”ti evaṃ ekekasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ ekekaṃ katvā saṅghabhedakakkhandhakāvasāne
atk-vin02a4:468_5: vuttā aṭṭhārasa janā. Aṭṭhārasa aṭṭhakā chaūnadiyaḍḍhasatavissajjane vuttāyeva.
atk-vin02a4:474_0: 479. Sedamocanagāthāsu asaṃvāsoti uposathapavāraṇādinā saṃvāsena asaṃvāso. Sambhogo
atk-vin02a4:474_1: ekacco tahiṃ na labbhatīti akappiyasambhogo na labbhati, nahāpanabhojanādipaṭijagganaṃ
atk-vin02a4:474_2: pana mātarāyeva kātuṃ labbhati. Avippavāsena anāpattīti sahagāraseyyāya anāpatti.
atk-vin02a4:474_3: Pañhā mesā kusalehi cintitāti esā pañhā kusalehi paṇḍitehi cintitā. Assā vissajjanaṃ
atk-vin02a4:474_4: dārakamātuyā bhikkhuniyā veditabbaṃ, tassā hi puttaṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttanti.
atk-vin02a4:475: Avissajjitagāthā garubhaṇḍaṃ sandhāya vuttā, attho panassā garubhaṇḍavinicchaye vuttoyeva.
atk-vin02a4:476_0: Dasa puggale na vadāmīti senāsanakkhandhake vutte dasa puggale na vadāmi. Ekādasa
atk-vin02a4:476_1: vivajjiyāti ye mahākhandhake ekādasa vivajjanīyapuggalā vuttā, tepi na vadāmi. Ayaṃ
atk-vin02a4:477: Kathaṃ nu sikkhāya asādhāraṇoti pañhā nahāpitapubbakaṃ bhikkhuṃ sandhāya vuttā. Ayañhi khurabhaṇḍaṃ pariharituṃ na labhati, aññe labhanti; tasmā sikkhāya asādhāraṇo.
atk-vin02a4:478: Taṃ puggalaṃ katamaṃ vadanti buddhāti ayaṃ pañhā nimmitabuddhaṃ sandhāya vuttā.
atk-vin02a4:479: Adhonābhiṃ vivajjiyāti adhonābhiṃ vivajjetvā. Ayaṃ pañhā yaṃ taṃ asīsakaṃ kabandhaṃ, yassa ure akkhīni ceva mukhañca hoti, taṃ sandhāya vuttā.
atk-vin02a4:480: Bhikkhu saññācikāya kuṭinti ayaṃ pañhā tiṇacchādanaṃ kuṭiṃ sandhāya vuttā. Dutiyapañhā sabbamattikāmayaṃ kuṭiṃ sandhāya vuttā.
atk-vin02a4:481_0: Āpajjeyya garukaṃ chejjavatthunti ayaṃ pañhā vajjapaṭicchādikaṃ bhikkhuniṃ sandhāya
atk-vin02a4:481_1: vuttā. Dutiyapañhā paṇḍakādayo abhabbapuggale sandhāya vuttā. Ekādasapi hi te gihibhāveyeva pārājikaṃ pattā.
atk-vin02a4:482_0: Vācāti vācāya anālapanto. Giraṃ no ca pare bhaṇeyyāti “iti ime sossantī”ti parapuggale
atk-vin02a4:482_1: sandhāya saddampi na nicchāreyya. Ayaṃ pañhā “santiṃ āpattiṃ nāvikareyya, sampajānamusāvādassa
atk-vin02a4:482_2: hotī”ti imaṃ musāvādaṃ sandhāya vuttā. Tassa hi bhikkhuno adhammikāya paṭiññāya tuṇhībhūtassa
atk-vin02a4:482_3: nisinnassa manodvāre āpatti nāma natthi. Yasmā pana āvikātabbaṃ na āvikaroti, tenassa
atk-vin02a4:482_4: vacīdvāre akiriyato ayaṃ āpatti samuṭṭhātīti veditabbā.
atk-vin02a4:483_0: Saṅghādisesā caturoti ayaṃ pañhā aruṇugge gāmantarapariyāpannaṃ nadipāraṃ okkantabhikkhuniṃ
atk-vin02a4:483_1: sandhāya vuttā, sā hi sakagāmato paccūsasamaye nikkhamitvā aruṇuggamanakāle vuttappakāraṃ
atk-vin02a4:484_0: Siyā āpattiyo nānāti ayaṃ pañhā ekatoupasampannā dve bhikkhuniyo sandhāya vuttā.
atk-vin02a4:484_1: Tāsu hi bhikkhūnaṃ santike ekatoupasampannāya hatthato gaṇhantassa pācittiyaṃ, bhikkhunīnaṃ
atk-vin02a4:485_0: Caturo janā saṃvidhāyāti ācariyo ca tayo ca antevāsikā chamāsakaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ avahariṃsu,
atk-vin02a4:485_1: ācariyassa sāhatthikā tayo māsakā, āṇattiyāpi tayova tasmā thullaccayaṃ āpajjati,
atk-vin02a4:485_2: itaresaṃ sāhatthiko ekeko, āṇattikā pañcāti tasmā pārājikaṃ āpajjiṃsu. Ayamettha
atk-vin02a4:485_3: saṅkhepo. Vitthāro pana adinnādānapārājike saṃvidāvahāravaṇṇanāyaṃ vutto.
atk-vin02a4:487: 480. Chiddaṃ tasmiṃ ghare natthīti ayaṃ pañhā dussakuṭiādīni santhatapeyyālañca sandhāya vuttā.
atk-vin02a4:488: Telaṃ madhuṃ phāṇitanti gāthā liṅgaparivattaṃ sandhāya vuttā.
atk-vin02a4:489_0: Nissaggiyenāti gāthā pariṇāmanaṃ sandhāya vuttā. Yo hi saṅghassa pariṇatalābhato
atk-vin02a4:489_1: ekaṃ cīvaraṃ attano, ekaṃ aññassāti dve cīvarāni “ekaṃ mayhaṃ, ekaṃ tassa dehī”ti
atk-vin02a4:489_2: ekapayaogena pariṇāmeti, so nissaggiyapācittiyañceva suddhikapācittiyañca ekato āpajjati.
atk-vin02a4:490: Kammañca taṃ kuppeyya vaggapaccayāti ayaṃ pañhā dvādasayojanapamāṇesu bārāṇasiādīsu nagaresu gāmasīmaṃ sandhāya vuttā.
atk-vin02a4:491: Padavītihāramattenāti gāthā sañcarittaṃ sandhāya vuttā, atthopi cassā sañcarittavaṇṇanāyameva vutto.
atk-vin02a4:492_0: Sabbāni tāni nissaggiyānīti ayaṃ pañhā aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā dhovāpanaṃ sandhāya
atk-vin02a4:492_1: vuttā. Sace hi tiṇṇampi cīvarānaṃ kākaūhadanaṃ vā kaddamamakkhitaṃ vā kaṇṇaṃ gahetvā
atk-vin02a4:492_2: bhikkhunī udakena dhovati, bhikkhussa kāyagatāneva nissaggiyāni honti.
atk-vin02a4:493: Saraṇagamanampi na tassa atthīti saraṇagamanaupasampadāpi natthi. Ayaṃ pana pañhā mahāpajāpatiyā upasampadaṃ sandhāya vuttā.
atk-vin02a4:494: Haneyya anariyaṃ mandoti tañhi itthiṃ vā purisaṃ vā anariyaṃ haneyya. Ayaṃ pañhā liṅgaparivattena itthibhūtaṃ pitaraṃ purisabhūtañca mātaraṃ sandhāya vuttā.
atk-vin02a4:495: Na tenānantaraṃ phuseti ayaṃ pañhā migasiṅgatāpasasīhakumārādīnaṃ viya tiracchānamātāpitaro sandhāya vuttā.
atk-vin02a4:496_0: Acodayitvāti gāthā dūtenupasampadaṃ sandhāya vuttā. Codayitvāti gāthā paṇḍakādīnaṃ
atk-vin02a4:496_1: upasampadaṃ sandhāya vuttā. Kurundiyaṃ pana “paṭhamagāthā aṭṭha asammukhākammāni,
atk-vin02a4:496_2: dutiyā anāpattikassa kammaṃ sandhāya vuttā”ti āgataṃ.
atk-vin02a4:497_0: Chindantassa āpattīti vanappatiṃ chindantassa pārājikaṃ, tiṇalatādiṃ chindantassa
atk-vin02a4:497_1: pācittiyaṃ, aṅgajātaṃ chindantassa thullaccayaṃ. Chindantassa anāpattīti kese ca
atk-vin02a4:497_2: nakhe ca chindantassa anāpatti. Chādentassa āpattīti attano āpattiṃ chādentassa aññesaṃ
atk-vin02a4:497_3: vā āpattiṃ. Chādentassa anāpattīti gehādīni chādentassa anāpatti.
atk-vin02a4:498_0: Saccaṃ bhaṇantoti gāthāya “sikharaṇīsi ubhatobyañjanāsī”ti saccaṃ bhaṇanto garukaṃ
atk-vin02a4:498_1: āpajjati, sampajānamusāvāde pana musā bhāsato lahukāpatti hoti, abhūtārocane musā
atk-vin02a4:498_2: bhaṇanto garukaṃ āpajjati, bhūtārocane saccaṃ bhāsato lahukāpatti hotīti.
atk-vin02a4:500: 481. Adhiṭṭhitanti gāthā nissaggiyacīvaraṃ anissajjitvā paribhuñjantaṃ sandhāya vuttā.
atk-vin02a4:501: Atthaṅgate sūriyeti gāthā romanthakaṃ sandhāya vuttā.
atk-vin02a4:502_0: Na rattacittoti gāthāya ayamattho – rattacitto methunadhammapārājikaṃ āpajjati. Theyyacitto
atk-vin02a4:502_1: adinnādānapārājikaṃ, paraṃ maraṇāya cetento manussaviggahapārājikaṃ, saṅghabhedako
atk-vin02a4:502_2: pana na rattacitto na ca pana theyyacitto na cāpi so paraṃ maraṇāya cetayi, salākaṃ
atk-vin02a4:502_3: panassa dentassa hoti chejjaṃ, pārājikaṃ hoti, salākaṃ paṭiggaṇhantassa bhedakānuvattakassa thullaccayaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:503: Gaccheyya aḍḍhayojananti ayaṃ pañhā suppatiṭṭhitanigrodhasadisaṃ ekakulassa rukkhamūlaṃ sandhāya vuttā.
atk-vin02a4:504: Kāyikānīti ayaṃ gāthā sambahulānaṃ itthīnaṃ kese vā aṅguliyo vā ekato gaṇhantaṃ sandhāya vuttā.
atk-vin02a4:505: Vācasikānīti ayaṃ gāthā “sabbā tumhe sikharaṇiyo”tiādinā nayena duṭṭhullabhāṇiṃ sandhāya vuttā.
atk-vin02a4:506_0: Tissitthiyo methunaṃ taṃ na seveti tisso itthiyo vuttā, tāsupi yaṃ taṃ methunaṃ nāma,
atk-vin02a4:506_1: taṃ na sevati. Tayo puriseti tayo purisepi upagantvā methunaṃ na sevati. Tayo anariyapaṇḍaketi
atk-vin02a4:506_2: ubhatobyañjanasaṅkhāte tayo anariye tayo ca paṇḍaketi imepi cha jane upagantvā methunaṃ
atk-vin02a4:506_3: na sevati. Na cācare methunaṃ byañjanasminti anulomapārājikavasenapi methunaṃ nācarati.
atk-vin02a4:506_4: Chejjaṃ siyā methunadhammapaccayāti siyā methunadhammapaccayā pārājikanti. Ayaṃ pañhā
atk-vin02a4:506_5: aṭṭhavatthukaṃ sandhāya vuttā, tassā hi methunadhammassa pubbabhāgaṃ kāyasaṃsaggaṃ
atk-vin02a4:507: Mātaraṃ cīvaranti ayaṃ gāthā piṭṭhisamaye vassikasāṭikatthaṃ satuppādakaraṇaṃ sandhāya vuttā. Vinicchayo panassā vassikasāṭikasikkhāpadavaṇṇanāyameva vutto.
atk-vin02a4:508_0: Kuddho ārādhako hotīti gāthā titthiyavattaṃ sandhāya vuttā. Titthiyo hi vattaṃ pūrayamāno
atk-vin02a4:508_1: titthiyānaṃ vaṇṇe bhaññamāne kuddho ārādhako hoti, vatthuttayassa vaṇṇe bhaññamāne
atk-vin02a4:508_2: kuddho gārayho hotīti tatthevassā vitthāro vutto. Dutiyagāthāpi tameva sandhāya vuttā.
atk-vin02a4:509_0: Saṅghādisesantiādi gāthā yā bhikkhunī avassutāva avassutassa purisassa hatthato piṇḍapātaṃ
atk-vin02a4:509_1: gahetvā manussamaṃsalasuṇapaṇītabhojanasesaakappiyamaṃsehi saddhiṃ omadditvā ajjhoharati, taṃ sandhāya vuttā.
atk-vin02a4:510_0: Eko upasampanno eko anupasampannoti gāthā ākāsagataṃ sandhāya vuttā. Sace hi dvīsu
atk-vin02a4:510_1: sāmaṇeresu eko iddhiyā kesaggamattampi pathaviṃ muñcitvā nisinno hoti, so anupasampanno
atk-vin02a4:510_2: nāma hoti. Saṅghenāpi ākāse nisīditvā bhūmigatassa kammaṃ na kātabbaṃ. Sace karoti, kuppati.
atk-vin02a4:511: Akappakatanti gāthā acchinnacīvarakaṃ bhikkhuṃ sandhāya vuttā. Tasmiṃyeva cassā sikkhāpade vitthārena vinicchayopi vutto.
atk-vin02a4:512_0: Na deti na paṭiggaṇhātīti nāpi uyyojikā deti, na uyyojitā tassā hatthato gaṇhāti.
atk-vin02a4:512_1: Paṭiggaho tena na vijjatīti teneva kāraṇena uyyojikāya hatthato uyyojitāya paṭiggaho
atk-vin02a4:512_2: na vijjati. Āpajjati garukanti evaṃ santepi avassutassa hatthato piṇḍapātaggahaṇe
atk-vin02a4:512_3: uyyojentī saṅghādisesāpattiṃ āpajjati. Tañca paribhogapaccayāti tañca pana āpattiṃ
atk-vin02a4:512_4: āpajjamānā tassā uyyojitāya paribhogapaccayā āpajjati. Tassā hi bhojanapariyosāne
atk-vin02a4:512_5: uyyojikāya saṅghādiseso hotīti. Dutiyagāthā tassāyeva udakadantaponaggahaṇe uyyojanaṃ sandhāya vuttā.
atk-vin02a4:513_0: Na bhikkhunī no ca phuseyya vajjanti sattarasakesu hi aññataraṃ āpattiṃ āpajjitvā
atk-vin02a4:513_1: anādariyena chādayamānāpi bhikkhunī chādanapaccayā vajjaṃ na phusati, aññaṃ navaṃ
atk-vin02a4:513_2: āpattiṃ nāpajjati, paṭicchannāya vā appaṭicchannāya vā āpattiyā pakkhamānattameva
atk-vin02a4:513_3: labhati. Ayaṃ pana bhikkhunīpi na hoti, sāvasesañca garukaṃ āpajjitvā chādetvā vajjaṃ
atk-vin02a4:513_4: na phusati. Pañhā mesā kusalehi cintitāti ayaṃ kira pañhā ukkhittakabhikkhuṃ sandhāya
atk-vin02a4:513_5: vuttā. Tena hi saddhiṃ vinayakammaṃ natthi, tasmā so saṅghādisesaṃ āpajjitvā chādento
atk-vin02a4:517_0: 482. Kammavagge catunnaṃ kammānaṃ nānākaraṇaṃ samathakkhandhake vuttameva. Kiñcāpi
atk-vin02a4:517_1: vuttaṃ, atha kho ayaṃ kammavinicchayo nāma ādito paṭṭhāya vuccamāno pākaṭo hoti,
atk-vin02a4:517_2: tasmā ādito paṭṭhāyevettha vattabbaṃ vadissāma. Cattārīti kammānaṃ gaṇanaparicchedavacanametaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:517_3: Kammānīti paricchinnakammanidassanaṃ. Apalokanakammaṃ nāma sīmaṭṭhakasaṅghaṃ sodhetvā
atk-vin02a4:517_4: chandārahānaṃ chandaṃ āharitvā samaggassa saṅghassa anumatiyā tikkhattuṃ sāvetvā
atk-vin02a4:517_5: kattabbaṃ kammaṃ. Ñattikammaṃ nāma vuttanayeneva samaggassa saṅghassa anumatiyā ekāya
atk-vin02a4:517_6: ñattiyā kattabbaṃ kammaṃ. Ñattidutiyakammaṃ nāma vuttanayeneva samaggassa saṅghassa
atk-vin02a4:517_7: anumatiyā ekāya ñattiyā ekāya ca anussāvanāyāti evaṃ ñattidutiyāya anussāvanāya kattabbaṃ
atk-vin02a4:517_8: kammaṃ. Ñatticatutthakammaṃ nāma vuttanayeneva samaggassa saṅghassa anumatiyā ekāya
atk-vin02a4:517_9: ñattiyā tīhi ca anussāvanāhīti evaṃ ñatticatutthāhi tīhi anussāvanāhi kattabbaṃ kammaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:518_0: Tattha apalokanakammaṃ apaloketvāva kātabbaṃ, ñattikammādivasena na kātabbaṃ. Ñattikammampi
atk-vin02a4:518_1: ekaṃ ñattiṃ ṭhapetvāva kātabbaṃ, apalokanakammādivasena na kātabbaṃ. Ñattidutiyakammaṃ
atk-vin02a4:518_2: pana apaloketvā kātabbampi atthi, akātabbampi atthi.
atk-vin02a4:519_0: Tattha sīmāsammuti, sīmāsamūhananaṃ, kathinadānaṃ, kathinuddhāro, kuṭivatthudesanā,
atk-vin02a4:519_1: vihāravatthudesanāti imāni cha kammāni garukāni apaloketvā kātuṃ na vaṭṭanti, ñattidutiyakammavācaṃ
atk-vin02a4:519_3: cāti etāni lahukakammāni apaloketvāpi kātuṃ vaṭṭanti, ñattikamma-ñatticatutthakammavasena
atk-vin02a4:519_4: pana na kātabbameva. Ñatticatutthakammavasena kayiramānaṃ daḷhataraṃ hoti, tasmā
atk-vin02a4:519_5: kātabbanti ekacce vadanti. Evaṃ pana sati kammasaṅkaro hoti, tasmā na kātabbanti
atk-vin02a4:519_6: paṭikkhittameva. Sace pana akkharaparihīnaṃ vā padaparihīnaṃ vā duruttapadaṃ vā hoti,
atk-vin02a4:519_7: tassa sodhanatthaṃ punappunaṃ vattuṃ vaṭṭati. Idaṃ akuppakammassa daḷhīkammaṃ hoti,
atk-vin02a4:520: Ñatticatutthakammaṃ ñattiñca tisso ca kammavācāyo sāvetvāva kātabbaṃ, apalokanakammādivasena na kātabbaṃ. Pañcahākārehi vipajjantīti pañcahi kāraṇehi vipajjanti.
atk-vin02a4:521_0: 483. Sammukhākaraṇīyaṃ kammaṃ asammukhā karoti, vatthuvipannaṃ adhammakammanti ettha
atk-vin02a4:521_1: atthi kammaṃ sammukhākaraṇīyaṃ; atthi asammukhākaraṇīyaṃ; tattha asammukhākaraṇīyaṃ
atk-vin02a4:521_2: nāma dūtenupasampadā, pattanikkujjanaṃ, pattukkujjanaṃ, ummattakassa bhikkhuno ummattakasammuti,
atk-vin02a4:521_3: sekkhānaṃ kulānaṃ sekkhasammuti, channassa bhikkhuno brahmadaṇḍo, devadattassa pakāsanīyakammaṃ,
atk-vin02a4:521_4: appasādanīyaṃ dassentassa bhikkhuno bhikkhunisaṅghena kātabbaṃ avandanīyakammanti
atk-vin02a4:521_5: aṭṭhavidhaṃ hoti, taṃ sabbaṃ tattha tattha vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Idaṃ aṭṭhavidhampi
atk-vin02a4:521_6: kammaṃ asammukhā kataṃ sukataṃ hoti akuppaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:522_0: Sesāni sabbakammāni sammukhā eva kātabbāni – saṅghasammukhatā, dhammasammukhatā,
atk-vin02a4:522_1: vinayasammukhatā, puggalasammukhatāti imaṃ catubbidhaṃ sammukhāvinayaṃ upanetvāva
atk-vin02a4:522_2: kātabbāni. Evaṃ katāni hi sukatāni honti. Evaṃ akatāni panetāni imaṃ sammukhāvinayasaṅkhātaṃ
atk-vin02a4:522_3: vatthuṃ vinā katattā vatthuvipannāni nāma honti. Tena vuttaṃ – “sammukhākaraṇīyaṃ
atk-vin02a4:523_0: Paṭipucchākaraṇīyādīsupi paṭipucchādikaraṇameva vatthu, taṃ vatthuṃ vinā katattā
atk-vin02a4:523_1: tesampi vatthuvipannatā veditabbā. Idaṃ panettha vacanatthamattaṃ. Paṭipucchā karaṇīyaṃ
atk-vin02a4:523_2: appaṭipucchā karotīti pucchitvā codetvā sāretvā kātabbaṃ apucchitvā acodetvā asāretvā
atk-vin02a4:523_3: karoti. Paṭiññāya karaṇīyaṃ appaṭiññāya karotīti paṭiññaṃ āropetvā yathādinnāya paṭiññāya
atk-vin02a4:523_4: kātabbaṃ appaṭiññāya karontassa vippalapantassa balakkārena karoti. Sativinayārahassāti
atk-vin02a4:523_6: ummattakassa. Tassapāpiyasikakammārahassāti upavāḷabhikkhusadisassa ussannapāpassa. Esa nayo sabbattha.
atk-vin02a4:524_0: Anuposathe uposathaṃ karotīti anuposathadivase uposathaṃ karoti. Uposathadivaso nāma
atk-vin02a4:524_1: ṭhapetvā kattikamāsaṃ avasesesu ekādasasu māsesu bhinnassa saṅghassa sāmaggidivaso
atk-vin02a4:524_2: ca yathāvuttacātuddasapannarasā ca. Etaṃ tippakārampi uposathadivasaṃ ṭhapetvā aññasmiṃ
atk-vin02a4:524_3: divase uposathaṃ karonto anuposathe uposathaṃ karoti nāma. Yatra hi pattacīvarādīnaṃ
atk-vin02a4:524_4: atthāya appamattakena kāraṇena vivadantā uposathaṃ vā pavāraṇaṃ vā ṭhapenti, tattha
atk-vin02a4:524_5: tasmiṃ adhikaraṇe vinicchite “samaggā jātāmhā”ti antarā sāmaggiuposathaṃ kātuṃ na
atk-vin02a4:524_6: labhanti, karontehi anuposathe uposatho kato nāma hoti.
atk-vin02a4:525_0: Apavāraṇāya pavāretīti apavāraṇādivase pavāreti; pavāraṇādivaso nāma ekasmiṃ kattikamāse
atk-vin02a4:525_1: bhinnassa saṅghassa sāmaggidivaso ca paccukkaḍḍhitvā ṭhapitadivaso ca dve ca puṇṇamāsiyo.
atk-vin02a4:525_2: Evaṃ catubbidhampi pavāraṇādivasaṃ ṭhapetvā aññasmiṃ divase pavārento apavāraṇāya
atk-vin02a4:525_3: pavāreti nāma. Idhāpi appamattakassa vivādassa vūpasame sāmaggipavāraṇaṃ kātuṃ na
atk-vin02a4:525_4: labhanti, karontehi apavāraṇāya pavāraṇā katā hoti. Apica ūnavīsativassaṃ vā antimavatthuṃ
atk-vin02a4:525_5: ajjhāpannapubbaṃ vā ekādasasu vā abhabbapuggalesu aññataraṃ upasampādentassapi vatthuvipannaṃ
atk-vin02a4:525_6: adhammakammaṃ hoti. Evaṃ vatthuto kammāni vipajjanti.
atk-vin02a4:526_0: 484. Ñattito vipattiyaṃ pana vatthuṃ na parāmasatīti yassa upasampadādikammaṃ karoti,
atk-vin02a4:526_1: taṃ na parāmasati, tassa nāmaṃ na gaṇhāti. “Suṇātu me bhante saṅgho, ayaṃ dhammarakkhito
atk-vin02a4:526_2: āyasmato buddharakkhitassa upasampadāpekkho”ti vattabbe “suṇātu me bhante saṅgho,
atk-vin02a4:526_3: āyasmato buddharakkhitassa upasampadāpekkho”ti vadati; evaṃ vatthuṃ na parāmasati.
atk-vin02a4:527_0: Saṅghaṃ na parāmasatīti saṅghassa nāmaṃ na gaṇhāti. “Suṇātu me bhante saṅgho, ayaṃ
atk-vin02a4:527_1: dhammarakkhito”ti vattabbe “suṇātu me bhante, ayaṃ dhammarakkhito”ti vadati; evaṃ
atk-vin02a4:528_0: Puggalaṃ na parāmasatīti yo upasampadāpekkhassa upajjhāyo, taṃ na parāmasati, tassa
atk-vin02a4:528_1: nāmaṃ na gaṇhāti. “Suṇātu me bhante saṅgho, ayaṃ dhammarakkhito āyasmato buddharakkhitassa
atk-vin02a4:528_2: upasampadāpekkho”ti vattabbe “suṇātu me, bhante saṅgho, ayaṃ dhammarakkhito upasampadāpekkho”ti
atk-vin02a4:529_0: Ñattiṃ na parāmasatīti sabbena sabbaṃ ñattiṃ na parāmasati. Ñattidutiyakamme ñattiṃ
atk-vin02a4:529_1: aṭṭhapetvā dvikkhattuṃ kammavācāya eva anussāvanakammaṃ karoti. Ñatticatutthakammepi
atk-vin02a4:529_2: ñattiṃ aṭṭhapetvā catukkhattuṃ kammavācāya eva anussāvanakammaṃ karoti; evaṃ ñattiṃ na parāmasati.
atk-vin02a4:530_0: Pacchā vā ñattiṃ ṭhapetīti paṭhamaṃ kammavācāya anussāvanakammaṃ katvā “esā ñattī”ti
atk-vin02a4:530_1: vatvā “khamati saṅghassa tasmā tuṇhī evametaṃ dhārayāmī”ti vadati; evaṃ pacchā ñattiṃ
atk-vin02a4:530_2: ṭhapeti. Iti imehi pañcahākārehi ñattito kammāni vipajjanti.
atk-vin02a4:531_0: 485. Anussāvanato vipattiyaṃ pana vatthuādīni vuttanayeneva veditabbāni. Evaṃ pana
atk-vin02a4:531_1: nesaṃ aparāmasanaṃ hoti – “suṇātu me bhante saṅgho”ti paṭhamānussāvane “dutiyampi
atk-vin02a4:531_2: etamatthaṃ vadāmi, tatiyampi etamatthaṃ vadāmi, suṇātu me bhante saṅgho”ti dutiyatatiyānussāvanāsu
atk-vin02a4:531_3: vā “ayaṃ dhammarakkhito āyasmato buddharakkhitassa upasampadāpekkho”ti vattabbe “suṇātu
atk-vin02a4:531_4: me bhante saṅgho, āyasmato buddharakkhitassā”ti vadanto vatthuṃ na parāmasati nāma.
atk-vin02a4:531_5: “Suṇātu me bhante saṅgho, ayaṃ dhammarakkhito”ti vattabbe “suṇātu me bhante, ayaṃ
atk-vin02a4:531_6: dhammarakkhito”ti vadanto saṅghaṃ na parāmasati nāma. “Suṇātu me bhante saṅgho, ayaṃ
atk-vin02a4:531_7: dhammarakkhito āyasmato buddharakkhitassā”ti vattabbe “suṇātu me bhante saṅgho, ayaṃ
atk-vin02a4:531_8: dhammarakkhito upasampadāpekkho”ti vadanto puggalaṃ na parāmasati nāma.
atk-vin02a4:532_0: Sāvanaṃ hāpetīti sabbena sabbaṃ kammavācāya anussāvanaṃ na karoti, ñattidutiyakamme
atk-vin02a4:532_1: dvikkhattuṃ ñattimeva ṭhapeti, ñatticatutthakamme catukkhattuṃ ñattimeva ṭhapeti;
atk-vin02a4:532_2: evaṃ anussāvanaṃ hāpeti. Yopi ñattidutiyakamme ekaṃ ñattiṃ ṭhapetvā ekaṃ kammavācaṃ
atk-vin02a4:532_3: anussāvento akkharaṃ vā chaḍḍeti, padaṃ vā duruttaṃ karoti, ayampi anussāvanaṃ hāpetiyeva.
atk-vin02a4:532_4: Ñatticatutthakamme pana ekaṃ ñattiṃ ṭhapetvā sakimeva vā dvikkhattuṃ vā kammavācāya
atk-vin02a4:532_5: anussāvanaṃ karontopi akkharaṃ vā padaṃ vā chaḍḍentopi duruttaṃ karontopi anussāvanaṃ
atk-vin02a4:533: Duruttaṃ karotīti ettha pana ayaṃ vinicchayo – yo hi aññasmiṃ akkhare vattabbe aññaṃ vadati, ayaṃ duruttaṃ karoti nāma. Tasmā kammavācaṃ karontena bhikkhunā yvāyaṃ –
atk-vin02a4:535: Sambandhaṃ vavatthitaṃ vimuttaṃ, dasadhā byañjanabuddhiyā pabhedo”ti.
atk-vin02a4:536_0: Vutto, ayaṃ suṭṭhu upalakkhetabbo. Ettha hi “sithilaṃ” nāma pañcasu vaggesu paṭhamatatiyaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:536_1: “Dhanitaṃ” nāma tesveva dutiyacatutthaṃ. “Dīgha”nti dīghena kālena vattabbaṃ ākārādi.
atk-vin02a4:536_2: “Rassa”nti tato upaḍḍhakālena vattabbaṃ akārādi. “Garuka”nti dīghameva. Yaṃ vā āyasmato
atk-vin02a4:536_3: buddharakkhitattherassa yassa nakkhamatīti evaṃ saṃyogaparaṃ katvā vuccati. “Lahuka”nti
atk-vin02a4:536_4: rassameva. Yaṃ vā āyasmato buddharakkhitatherassa yassa na khamatīti evaṃ asaṃyogaparaṃ
atk-vin02a4:536_5: katvā vuccati. “Niggahita”nti yaṃ karaṇāni niggahetvā avissajjetvā avivaṭena mukhena
atk-vin02a4:536_6: sānunāsikaṃ katvā vattabbaṃ. “Sambandha”nti yaṃ parapadena sambandhitvā “tuṇhissā”ti
atk-vin02a4:536_7: vā “tuṇhassā”ti vā vuccati. “Vavatthita”nti yaṃ parapadena asambandhaṃ katvā vicchinditvā
atk-vin02a4:536_8: “tuṇhī assā”ti vā “tuṇha assā”ti vā vuccati. “Vimutta”nti yaṃ karaṇāni aniggahetvā
atk-vin02a4:536_9: vissajjetvā vivaṭena mukhena anunāsikaṃ akatvā vuccati.
atk-vin02a4:537_0: Tattha “suṇātu me”ti vattabbe ta-kārassa tha-kāraṃ katvā “suṇāthu me”ti vacanaṃ sithilassa
atk-vin02a4:537_1: dhanitakaraṇaṃ nāma. Tathā “pattakallaṃ, esā ñattī”ti vattabbe “patthakallaṃ, esā
atk-vin02a4:537_2: ñatthī”tiādivacanañca. “Bhante saṅgho”ti vattabbe bha-kāra gha-kārānaṃ ba-kāra ga-kāre
atk-vin02a4:537_3: katvā “bante saṅgo”ti vacanaṃ dhanitassa sithilakaraṇaṃ nāma. “Suṇātu me”ti vivaṭena
atk-vin02a4:537_4: mukhena vattabbe pana “suṇaṃtu me”ti vā “esā ñattī”ti vattabbe “esaṃ ñattī”ti vā
atk-vin02a4:537_5: avivaṭena mukhena anunāsikaṃ katvā vacanaṃ vimuttassa niggahitavacanaṃ nāma. “Pattakalla”nti
atk-vin02a4:537_6: avivaṭena mukhena anunāsikaṃ katvā vattabbe “pattakallā”ti vivaṭena mukhena anunāsikaṃ
atk-vin02a4:538_0: Iti sithile kattabbe dhanitaṃ, dhanite kattabbe sithilaṃ, vimutte kattabbe niggahitaṃ,
atk-vin02a4:538_1: niggahite kattabbe vimuttanti imāni cattāri byañjanāni antokammavācāya kammaṃ dūsenti.
atk-vin02a4:538_2: Evaṃ vadanto hi aññasmiṃ akkhare vattabbe aññaṃ vadati, duruttaṃ karotīti vuccati.
atk-vin02a4:538_3: Itaresu pana dīgharassādīsu chasu byañjanesu dīghaṭṭhāne dīghameva, rassaṭṭhāne ca
atk-vin02a4:538_4: rassamevāti evaṃ yathāṭhāne taṃ tadeva akkharaṃ bhāsantena anukkamāgataṃ paveṇiṃ
atk-vin02a4:538_5: avināsentena kammavācā kātabbā. Sace pana evaṃ akatvā dīghe vattabbe rassaṃ, rasse
atk-vin02a4:538_6: vā vattabbe dīghaṃ vadati; tathā garuke vattabbe lahukaṃ, lahuke vā vattabbe garukaṃ
atk-vin02a4:538_7: vadati; sambandhe vā pana vattabbe vavatthitaṃ, vavatthite vā vattabbe sambandhaṃ
atk-vin02a4:538_8: vadati; evaṃ vuttepi kammavācā na kuppati. Imāni hi cha byañjanāni kammaṃ na kopenti.
atk-vin02a4:539_0: Yaṃ pana suttantikattherā “da-kāro ta-kāramāpajjati, ta-kāro da-kāramāpajjati, ca-kāro
atk-vin02a4:539_1: ja-kāramāpajjati, ja-kāro ca-kāramāpajjati, ya-kāro ka-kāramāpajjati, ka-kāro ya-kāramāpajjati;
atk-vin02a4:539_2: tasmā da-kārādīsu vattabbesu ta-kārādivacanaṃ na virujjhatī”ti vadanti, taṃ kammavācaṃ
atk-vin02a4:539_3: patvā na vaṭṭati. Tasmā vinayadharena neva da-kāro ta-kāro kātabbo…pe… na ka-kāro
atk-vin02a4:539_4: ya-kāro. Yathāpāḷiyā niruttiṃ sodhetvā dasavidhāya byañjananiruttiyā vuttadose pariharantena
atk-vin02a4:539_5: kammavācā kātabbā. Itarathā hi sāvanaṃ hāpeti nāma.
atk-vin02a4:540: Akāle vā sāvetīti sāvanāya akāle anokāse ñattiṃ aṭṭhapetvā paṭhamaṃyeva anussāvanakammaṃ katvā pacchā ñattiṃ ṭhapeti. Iti imehi pañcahākārehi anussāvanato kammāni vipajjanti.
atk-vin02a4:541_0: 486. Sīmato vipattiyaṃ pana atikhuddakasīmā nāma yā ekavīsati bhikkhū na gaṇhāti.
atk-vin02a4:541_1: Kurundiyaṃ pana “yattha ekavīsati bhikkhū nisīdituṃ na sakkontī”ti vuttaṃ. Tasmā
atk-vin02a4:541_2: yā evarūpā sīmā, ayaṃ sammatāpi asammatā, gāmakhettasadisāva hoti, tattha kataṃ kammaṃ
atk-vin02a4:541_3: kuppati. Esa nayo sesasīmāsupi. Ettha pana atimahatī nāma yā kesaggamattenāpi tiyojanaṃ
atk-vin02a4:541_4: atikkāmetvā sammatā hoti. Khaṇḍanimittā nāma aghaṭitanimittā vuccati. Puratthimāya
atk-vin02a4:541_5: disāya nimittaṃ kittetvā anukkameneva dakkhiṇāya pacchimāya uttarāya disāya kittetvā
atk-vin02a4:541_6: puna puratthimāya disāya pubbakittitaṃ nimittaṃ paṭikittetvāva ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭati;
atk-vin02a4:541_7: evaṃ akhaṇḍanimittā hoti. Sace pana anukkamena āharitvā uttarāya disāya nimittaṃ
atk-vin02a4:541_8: kittetvā tattheva ṭhapeti, khaṇḍanimittā hoti. Aparāpi khaṇḍanimittā nāma yā animittupagaṃ
atk-vin02a4:541_9: tacasārarukkhaṃ vā khāṇukaṃ vā paṃsupuñjavālikāpuñjānaṃ vā aññataraṃ antarā ekaṃ
atk-vin02a4:541_10: nimittaṃ katvā sammatā hoti. Chāyānimittā nāma yā pabbatacchāyādīnaṃ yaṃkiñci chāyaṃ
atk-vin02a4:541_11: nimittaṃ katvā sammatā hoti. Animittā nāma yā sabbena sabbaṃ nimittāni akittetvā sammatā hoti.
atk-vin02a4:542_0: Bahisīme ṭhito sīmaṃ sammannati nāma nimittāni kittetvā nimittānaṃ bahi ṭhito sammannati.
atk-vin02a4:542_1: Nadiyā samudde jātassare sīmaṃ sammannatīti etesu nadiādīsu yaṃ sammannati, sā evaṃ
atk-vin02a4:542_2: sammatāpi “sabbā, bhikkhave, nadī asīmā, sabbo samuddo asīmo, sabbo jātassaro asīmo”ti
atk-vin02a4:542_3: vacanato asammatāva hoti. Sīmāya sīmaṃ sambhindatīti attano sīmāya paresaṃ sīmaṃ
atk-vin02a4:542_4: sambhindati. Ajjhottharatīti attano sīmāya paresaṃ sīmaṃ ajjhottharati. Tattha yathā
atk-vin02a4:542_5: sambhedo ca ajjhottharaṇañca hoti, taṃ sabbaṃ uposathakkhandhake vuttameva. Iti imā
atk-vin02a4:542_6: ekādasapi sīmā asīmā gāmakhettasadisā eva, tāsu nisīditvā kataṃ kammaṃ kuppati. Tena
atk-vin02a4:542_7: vuttaṃ “imehi ekādasahi ākārehi sīmato kammāni vipajjantī”ti.
atk-vin02a4:543_0: 487-488. Parisato kammavipattiyaṃ pana kiñci anuttānaṃ nāma natthi. Yampi tattha
atk-vin02a4:543_1: kammappattachandārahalakkhaṇaṃ vattabbaṃ siyā, tampi parato “cattāro bhikkhū pakatattā
atk-vin02a4:543_2: kammappattā”tiādinā nayena vuttameva. Tattha pakatattā kammappattāti catuvaggakaraṇe
atk-vin02a4:543_3: kamme cattāro pakatattā anukkhittā anissāritā parisuddhasīlā cattāro bhikkhū kammappattā
atk-vin02a4:543_4: kammassa arahā anucchavikā sāmino. Na tehi vinā taṃ kammaṃ kayirati, na tesaṃ chando
atk-vin02a4:543_5: vā pārisuddhi vā eti. Avasesā pana sacepi sahassamattā honti, sace samānasaṃvāsakā,
atk-vin02a4:543_6: sabbe chandārahāva honti. Chandapārisuddhiṃ datvā āgacchantu vā mā vā, kammaṃ pana
atk-vin02a4:543_7: tiṭṭhati. Yassa pana saṅgho parivāsādikammaṃ karoti, so neva kammappatto, nāpi chandāraho.
atk-vin02a4:543_8: Apica yasmā taṃ puggalaṃ vatthuṃ katvā saṅgho kammaṃ karoti, tasmā “kammāraho”ti
atk-vin02a4:544: 489. Puna cattāri kammānītiādiko nayo paṇḍakādīnaṃ avatthubhāvadassanatthaṃ vutto. Sesamettha uttānameva.
atk-vin02a4:546_0: 495-496. Idāni tesaṃ kammānaṃ pabhedadassanatthaṃ “apalokanakammaṃ kati ṭhānāni gacchatī”tiādimāha.
atk-vin02a4:546_1: Tattha “apalokanakammaṃ pañca ṭhānāni gacchati – osāraṇaṃ, nissāraṇaṃ, bhaṇḍukammaṃ,
atk-vin02a4:546_2: brahmadaṇḍaṃ, kammalakkhaṇaññeva pañcama”nti ettha “osāraṇaṃ nissāraṇa”nti padasiliṭṭhatāyetaṃ
atk-vin02a4:546_3: vuttaṃ. Paṭhamaṃ pana nissāraṇā hoti, pacchā osāraṇā. Tattha yā kaṇṭakasāmaṇerassa
atk-vin02a4:546_4: daṇḍakammanāsanā, sā “nissāraṇā”ti veditabbā. Tasmā etarahi sacepi sāmaṇero buddhassa
atk-vin02a4:546_5: vā dhammassa vā saṅghassa vā avaṇṇaṃ bhaṇati, “akappiyaṃ kappiya”nti dīpeti, micchādiṭṭhiko
atk-vin02a4:546_6: hoti antaggāhikāya diṭṭhiyā samannāgato, so yāvatatiyaṃ nivāretvā taṃ laddhiṃ nissajjāpetabbo.
atk-vin02a4:546_7: No ce vissajjeti, saṅghaṃ sannipātetvā “vissajjehī”ti vattabbo. No ce vissajjeti,
atk-vin02a4:546_8: byattena bhikkhunā apalokanakammaṃ katvā nissāretabbo. Evañca pana kammaṃ kātabbaṃ –
atk-vin02a4:547_0: “Saṅghaṃ, bhante, pucchāmi – ‘ayaṃ itthannāmo sāmaṇero buddhassa dhammassa saṅghassa
atk-vin02a4:547_1: avaṇṇavādī micchādiṭṭhiko, yaṃ aññe sāmaṇerā labhanti, dirattatirattaṃ bhikkhūhi
atk-vin02a4:547_2: saddhiṃ sahaseyyaṃ, tassa alābhāya nissāraṇā ruccati saṅghassā’ti. Dutiyampi… tatiyampi,
atk-vin02a4:547_3: bhante, saṅghaṃ pucchāmi – ‘ayaṃ itthannāmo sāmaṇero buddhassa…pe… ruccati saṅghassā’ti
atk-vin02a4:548_0: So aparena samayena “ahaṃ, bhante, bālatāya aññāṇatāya alakkhikatāya evaṃ akāsiṃ,
atk-vin02a4:548_1: svāhaṃ saṅghaṃ khamāpemī”ti khamāpento yāvatatiyaṃ yācāpetvā apalokanakammeneva osāretabbo.
atk-vin02a4:548_2: Evaṃ pana osāretabbo, saṅghamajjhe byattena bhikkhunā saṅghassa anumatiyā sāvetabbaṃ –
atk-vin02a4:549_0: “Saṅghaṃ, bhante, pucchāmi – ayaṃ itthannāmo sāmaṇero buddhassa dhammassa saṅghassa
atk-vin02a4:549_1: avaṇṇavādī micchādiṭṭhiko, yaṃ aññe sāmaṇerā labhanti, bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ dirattatirattaṃ
atk-vin02a4:549_2: sahaseyyaṃ, tassa alābhāya nissārito, svāyaṃ idāni sorato nivātavutti lajjidhammaṃ
atk-vin02a4:549_3: okkanto hirottappe patiṭṭhito katadaṇḍakammo accayaṃ deseti, imassa sāmaṇerassa yathā
atk-vin02a4:550_0: Evaṃ tikkhattuṃ vattabbaṃ. Evaṃ apalokanakammaṃ osāraṇañca nissāraṇañca gacchati.
atk-vin02a4:550_2: vuttoyeva. Na kevalaṃ panesa channasseva paññatto, yo aññopi bhikkhu mukharo hoti,
atk-vin02a4:550_3: bhikkhū duruttavacanehi ghaṭṭento khuṃsento vambhento viharati, tassapi dātabbo.
atk-vin02a4:550_4: Evañca pana dātabbo, saṅghamajjhe byattena bhikkhunā saṅghassa anumatiyā sāvetabbaṃ –
atk-vin02a4:551_0: “Bhante, itthannāmo bhikkhu mukharo, bhikkhū duruttavacanehi ghaṭṭento viharati.
atk-vin02a4:551_1: So bhikkhu yaṃ iccheyya, taṃ vadeyya. Bhikkhūhi itthannāmo bhikkhu neva vattabbo,
atk-vin02a4:551_2: na ovaditabbo, na anusāsitabbo. Saṅghaṃ, bhante, pucchāmi – ‘itthannāmassa bhikkhuno
atk-vin02a4:551_3: brahmadaṇḍassa dānaṃ, ruccati saṅghassā’ti. Dutiyampi pucchāmi, tatiyampi pucchāmi
atk-vin02a4:551_4: – ‘itthannāmassa, bhante, bhikkhuno brahmadaṇḍassa dānaṃ, ruccati saṅghassā”’ti.
atk-vin02a4:552: Tassa aparena samayena sammā vattitvā khamāpentassa brahmadaṇḍo paṭippassambhetabbo. Evañca pana paṭippassambhetabbo, byattena bhikkhunā saṅghamajjhe sāvetabbaṃ –
atk-vin02a4:553_0: “Bhante, bhikkhusaṅgho asukassa bhikkhuno brahmadaṇḍaṃ adāsi, so bhikkhu sorato nivātavutti
atk-vin02a4:553_1: lajjidhammaṃ okkanto hirottappe patiṭṭhito, paṭisaṅkhā āyatiṃ saṃvare tiṭṭhati, saṅghaṃ,
atk-vin02a4:553_2: bhante, pucchāmi, tassa bhikkhuno brahmadaṇḍassa paṭippassaddhi, ruccati saṅghassā”ti.
atk-vin02a4:554: Evaṃ yāvatatiyaṃ vatvā apalokanakammeneva brahmadaṇḍo paṭippassambhetabboti.
atk-vin02a4:555_0: Kammalakkhaṇaññeva pañcamanti yaṃ taṃ bhagavatā bhikkhunikkhandhake “tena kho pana
atk-vin02a4:555_1: samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū bhikkhuniyo kaddamodakena osiñcanti, ‘appeva nāma amhesu
atk-vin02a4:555_2: sārajjeyyu’nti, kāyaṃ vivaritvā bhikkhunīnaṃ dassenti, ūruṃ vivaritvā bhikkhunīnaṃ
atk-vin02a4:555_3: dassenti, aṅgajātaṃ vivaritvā bhikkhunīnaṃ dassenti, bhikkhuniyo obhāsenti, bhikkhunīhi
atk-vin02a4:555_4: saddhiṃ sampayojenti, ‘appeva nāma amhesu sārajjeyyu’nti. Imesu vatthūsu tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-vin02a4:555_5: dukkaṭaṃ paññapetvā ‘anujānāmi bhikkhave tassa bhikkhuno daṇḍakammaṃ kātu’nti. Atha
atk-vin02a4:555_6: kho bhikkhunīnaṃ etadahosi – ‘kiṃ nu kho daṇḍakammaṃ kātabba’nti. Bhagavato etamatthaṃ
atk-vin02a4:555_7: ārocesuṃ – ‘avandiyo so bhikkhave bhikkhu bhikkhunisaṅghena kātabbo”’ti evaṃ avandiyakammaṃ
atk-vin02a4:555_8: anuññātaṃ, taṃ kammalakkhaṇaññeva pañcamaṃ imassa apalokanakammassa ṭhānaṃ hoti.
atk-vin02a4:555_9: Tassa hi kammaññeva lakkhaṇaṃ, na osāraṇādīni; tasmā “kammalakkhaṇa”nti vuccati.
atk-vin02a4:555_10: Tassa karaṇaṃ tattheva vuttaṃ. Apica naṃ paṭippassaddhiyā saddhiṃ vitthārato dassetuṃ
atk-vin02a4:555_11: idhāpi vadāma, bhikkhunupassaye sannipatitassa bhikkhunisaṅghassa anumatiyā byattāya
atk-vin02a4:556: “Ayye asuko nāma ayyo bhikkhunīnaṃ apāsādikaṃ dasseti, etassa ayyassa avandiyakaraṇaṃ ruccatīti bhikkhunisaṅghaṃ pucchāmi, dutiyampi… tatiyampi bhikkhunisaṅghaṃ pucchāmī”ti.
atk-vin02a4:557: Evaṃ tikkhattuṃ sāvetvā apalokanakammena avandiyakammaṃ kātabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:558_0: Tato paṭṭhāya so bhikkhu bhikkhunīhi na vanditabbo. Sace avandiyamāno hirottappaṃ
atk-vin02a4:558_1: paccupaṭṭhapetvā sammā vattati, tena bhikkhuniyo khamāpetabbā. Khamāpentena bhikkhunupassayaṃ
atk-vin02a4:558_2: agantvā vihāreyeva saṅghaṃ vā gaṇaṃ vā ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ vā upasaṅkamitvā ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā
atk-vin02a4:558_3: añjaliṃ paggahetvā “ahaṃ bhante paṭisaṅkhā āyatiṃ saṃvare tiṭṭhāmi, na puna apāsādikaṃ
atk-vin02a4:558_4: dassessāmi, bhikkhunisaṅgho mayhaṃ khamatū”ti khamāpetabbaṃ. Tena saṅghena vā gaṇena
atk-vin02a4:558_5: vā ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ pesetvā ekabhikkhunā vā sayameva gantvā bhikkhuniyo vattabbā – “ayaṃ
atk-vin02a4:558_6: bhikkhu paṭisaṅkhā āyatiṃ saṃvare ṭhito, iminā accayaṃ desetvā bhikkhunisaṅgho khamāpito,
atk-vin02a4:558_7: bhikkhunisaṅgho imaṃ vandiyaṃ karotū”ti. So vandiyo kātabbo. Evañca pana kātabbo,
atk-vin02a4:558_8: bhikkhunupassaye sannipatitassa bhikkhunisaṅghassa anumatiyā byattāya bhikkhuniyā sāvetabbaṃ –
atk-vin02a4:559_0: “Ayaṃ ayye asuko nāma ayyo bhikkhunīnaṃ apāsādikaṃ dassetīti bhikkhunisaṅghena avandiyo
atk-vin02a4:559_1: kato, so lajjidhammaṃ okkamitvā paṭisaṅkhā āyatiṃ saṃvare ṭhito accayaṃ desetvā bhikkhunisaṅghaṃ
atk-vin02a4:559_2: khamāpesi, tassa ayyassa vandiyakaraṇaṃ ruccatīti bhikkhunisaṅghaṃ pucchāmī”ti –
atk-vin02a4:560: Tikkhattuṃ vattabbaṃ evaṃ apalokanakammeneva vandiyo kātabbo.
atk-vin02a4:561_0: Ayaṃ panettha pāḷimuttakopi kammalakkhaṇavinicchayo. Idañhi kammalakkhaṇaṃ nāma bhikkhunisaṅghamūlakaṃ
atk-vin02a4:561_1: paññattaṃ, bhikkhusaṅghassāpi panetaṃ labbhatiyeva. Yañhi bhikkhusaṅgho salākaggayāgaggabhattaggauposathaggesu
atk-vin02a4:561_3: saṅghaṃ sannipātetvā byattena bhikkhunā yāvatatiyaṃ sāvetvā apalokanakammaṃ katvā
atk-vin02a4:561_4: cīvaraṃ dātuṃ vaṭṭati. Appamattakavissajjakena pana cīvaraṃ karontassa senāsanakkhandhakavaṇṇanāyaṃ
atk-vin02a4:561_5: vuttappabhedāni sūciādīni anapaloketvāpi dātabbāni. Tesaṃ dāne soyeva issaro, tato
atk-vin02a4:561_6: atirekaṃ dentena apaloketvā dātabbaṃ. Tato hi atirekadāne saṅgho sāmī. Gilānabhesajjampi
atk-vin02a4:561_7: tattha vuttappakāraṃ sayameva dātabbaṃ. Atirekaṃ icchantassa apaloketvā dātabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:561_8: Yopi ca dubbalo vā chinniriyāpatho vā pacchinnabhikkhācārapatho vā mahāgilāno, tassa
atk-vin02a4:561_9: mahāvāsesu tatruppādato devasikaṃ nāḷi vā upaḍḍhanāḷi vā ekadivasaṃyeva vā pañca
atk-vin02a4:561_10: vā dasa vā taṇḍulanāḷiyo dentena apalokanakammaṃ katvāva dātabbā. Pesalassa bhikkhuno
atk-vin02a4:561_11: tatruppādato iṇapalibodhampi bahussutassa saṅghabhāranitthārakassa bhikkhuno anuṭṭhāpanīyasenāsanampi
atk-vin02a4:561_12: saṅghakiccaṃ karontānaṃ kappiyakārakādīnaṃ bhattavetanampi apalokanakammena dātuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a4:562_0: Catupaccayavasena dinnatatruppādato saṅghikaṃ āvāsaṃ jaggāpetuṃ vaṭṭati. “Ayaṃ bhikkhu
atk-vin02a4:562_1: issaravatāya vicāretī”ti kathāpacchindanatthaṃ pana salākaggādīsu vā antarasannipāte
atk-vin02a4:562_2: vā saṅghaṃ pucchitvāva jaggāpetabbo. Cīvarapiṇḍapātatthāya odissadinnatatruppādatopi
atk-vin02a4:562_3: apaloketvā āvāso jaggāpetabbo. Anapaloketvāpi vaṭṭati. “Sūro vatāyaṃ bhikkhu cīvarapiṇḍapātatthāya
atk-vin02a4:562_4: dinnato āvāsaṃ jaggāpetī”ti evaṃ uppannakathāpacchedanatthaṃ pana apalokanakammameva katvā jaggāpetabbo.
atk-vin02a4:563_0: Cetiye chattaṃ vā vedikaṃ vā bodhigharaṃ vā āsanagharaṃ vā akataṃ vā karontena jiṇṇaṃ
atk-vin02a4:563_1: vā paṭisaṅkharontena sudhākammaṃ vā karontena manusse samādapetvā kātuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a4:563_2: Sace kārako natthi, cetiyassa upanikkhepato kāretabbaṃ. Upanikkhepepi asati apalokanakammaṃ
atk-vin02a4:563_3: katvā tatruppādato kāretabbaṃ, saṅghikenapi. Saṅghikena hi apaloketvā cetiyakiccaṃ
atk-vin02a4:563_4: kātuṃ vaṭṭati. Cetiyassa santakena apaloketvāpi saṅghikakiccaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a4:563_5: Tāvakālikaṃ pana gahetvā pākatikaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a4:564_0: Cetiye sudhākammādīni karontehi pana bhikkhācārato vā saṅghato vā yāpanamattaṃ alabhantehi
atk-vin02a4:564_1: cetiyasantakato yāpanamattaṃ gahetvā paribhuñjantehi vattaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati, “vattaṃ
atk-vin02a4:564_2: karomā”ti macchamaṃsādīhi saṅghabhattaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭati. Ye vihāre ropitā phalarukkhā
atk-vin02a4:564_3: saṅghena pariggahitā honti, jagganakammaṃ labhanti, yesaṃ phalāni ghaṇṭiṃ paharitvā
atk-vin02a4:564_4: bhājetvā paribhuñjanti, tesu apalokanakammaṃ na kātabbaṃ. Ye pana apariggahitā, tesu
atk-vin02a4:564_6: vaṭṭati, uposathagge pana vaṭṭatiyeva. Tattha hi anāgatānampi chandapārisuddhi āhariyati,
atk-vin02a4:565: Evañca pana kātabbaṃ, byattena bhikkhunā bhikkhusaṅghassa anumatiyā sāvetabbaṃ –
atk-vin02a4:566_0: “Bhante, yaṃ imasmiṃ vihāre antosīmāya saṅghasantakaṃ mūlatacapattaaṅkurapupphaphalakhādanīyādi
atk-vin02a4:566_1: atthi, taṃ sabbaṃ āgatāgatānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ yathāsukhaṃ paribhuñjituṃ ruccatīti saṅghaṃ
atk-vin02a4:567_0: Catūhi pañcahi bhikkhūhi kataṃ sukatameva. Yasmiṃ vihāre dve tayo janā vasanti, tehi
atk-vin02a4:567_1: nisīditvā katampi saṅghena katasadisameva. Yasmiṃ pana vihāre eko bhikkhu hoti, tena
atk-vin02a4:567_2: bhikkhunā uposathadivase pubbakaraṇapubbakiccaṃ katvā nisinnena katampi katikavattaṃ
atk-vin02a4:568_0: Karontena pana phalavārena kātumpi cattāro māse cha māse ekasaṃvaccharanti evaṃ paricchinditvāpi
atk-vin02a4:568_1: aparicchinditvāpi kātuṃ vaṭṭati. Paricchinne yathāparicchedaṃ paribhuñjitvā puna
atk-vin02a4:568_2: kātabbaṃ. Aparicchinne yāva rukkhā dharanti tāva vaṭṭatiyeva. Yepi tesaṃ rukkhānaṃ
atk-vin02a4:568_3: bījehi aññe rukkhā ropitā honti, tesampi sā eva katikā.
atk-vin02a4:569_0: Sace pana aññasmiṃ vihāre ropitā honti, tesaṃ yattha ropitā, tasmiṃyeva vihāre saṅgho
atk-vin02a4:569_1: sāmī. Yepi aññato bījāni āharitvā purimavihāre pacchā ropitā, tesu aññā katikā kātabbā.
atk-vin02a4:569_2: Katikāya katāya puggalikaṭṭhāne tiṭṭhanti, yathāsukhaṃ phalādīni paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a4:569_3: Sace panettha taṃ taṃ okāsaṃ parikkhipitvā pariveṇāni katvā jagganti, tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-vin02a4:569_4: puggalikaṭṭhāne tiṭṭhanti. Aññe paribhuñjituṃ na labhanti, tehi pana saṅghassa dasabhāgaṃ
atk-vin02a4:569_5: datvā paribhuñjitabbāni. Yopi majjhevihāre rukkhaṃ sākhāhi parivāretvā rakkhati, tassāpi eseva nayo.
atk-vin02a4:570_0: Porāṇavihāraṃ gatassa sambhāvanīyabhikkhuno “thero āgato”ti phalāphalaṃ āharanti,
atk-vin02a4:570_1: sace tattha mūle sabbapariyattidharo bahussutabhikkhu vihāsi, “addhā ettha dīghā
atk-vin02a4:570_2: katikā katā bhavissatī”ti nikkukkuccena paribhuñjitabbaṃ. Vihāre phalāphalaṃ piṇḍapātikānampi
atk-vin02a4:570_3: vaṭṭati, dhutaṅgaṃ na kopeti. Sāmaṇerā attano ācariyupajjhāyānaṃ bahūni phalāni denti,
atk-vin02a4:570_4: aññe bhikkhū alabhantā khiyyanti, khiyyanamattameva cetaṃ hoti.
atk-vin02a4:571_0: Sace pana dubbhikkhaṃ hoti, ekaṃ panasarukkhaṃ nissāya saṭṭhipi janā jīvanti, tādise
atk-vin02a4:571_1: kāle sabbesaṃ saṅgahakaraṇatthāya bhājetvā khāditabbaṃ, ayaṃ sāmīci. Yāva pana katikavattaṃ
atk-vin02a4:571_2: na paṭippassambhati, tāva tehi khāyitaṃ sukhāyitameva. Kadā pana katikavattaṃ paṭippassambhati?
atk-vin02a4:571_3: Yadā samaggo saṅgho sannipatitvā “ito paṭṭhāya bhājetvā khādantū”ti sāveti. Ekabhikkhuke
atk-vin02a4:571_4: pana vihāre ekena sāvitepi purimakatikā paṭippassambhatiyeva. Sace paṭippassaddhāya
atk-vin02a4:571_5: katikāya sāmaṇerā neva rukkhato pātenti, na bhūmito gahetvā bhikkhūnaṃ denti, patitaphalāni
atk-vin02a4:571_6: pādehi paharantā vicaranti, tesaṃ dasabhāgato paṭṭhāya yāva upaḍḍhaphalabhāgena phātikammaṃ
atk-vin02a4:571_7: kātabbaṃ. Addhā phātikammalobhena āharitvā dassanti. Puna subhikkhe jāte kappiyakārakesu
atk-vin02a4:571_8: āgantvā sākhāparivārādīni katvā rukkhe rakkhantesu sāmaṇerānaṃ phātikammaṃ na dātabbaṃ,
atk-vin02a4:572_0: “Vihāre phalāphalaṃ atthī”ti sāmantagāmehi manussā gilānānaṃ vā gabbhinīnaṃ vā atthāya
atk-vin02a4:572_1: āgantvā “ekaṃ nāḷikeraṃ detha, ambaṃ detha, labujaṃ dethā”ti yācanti, dātabbaṃ na
atk-vin02a4:572_2: dātabbanti? Dātabbaṃ. Adīyamāne hi te domanassikā honti, dentena pana saṅghaṃ sannipātetvā
atk-vin02a4:572_3: yāvatatiyaṃ sāvetvā apalokanakammaṃ katvāva dātabbaṃ, katikavattaṃ vā katvā ṭhapetabbaṃ,
atk-vin02a4:572_4: evañca pana kātabbaṃ, byattena bhikkhunā saṅghassa anumatiyā sāvetabbaṃ –
atk-vin02a4:573_0: “Sāmantagāmehi manussā āgantvā gilānādīnaṃ atthāya phalāphalaṃ yācanti, dve nāḷikerāni,
atk-vin02a4:573_1: dve tālaphalāni, dve panasāni, pañca ambāni, pañca kadaliphalāni gaṇhantānaṃ anivāraṇaṃ,
atk-vin02a4:573_2: asukarukkhato ca asukarukkhato ca phalaṃ gaṇhantānaṃ anivāraṇaṃ ruccati bhikkhusaṅghassā”ti
atk-vin02a4:574_0: Tato paṭṭhāya gilānādīnaṃ nāmaṃ gahetvā yācantā “gaṇhathā”ti na vattabbā, vattaṃ
atk-vin02a4:574_1: pana ācikkhitabbaṃ – “nāḷikerādīni iminā nāma paricchedena gaṇhantānaṃ asukarukkhato
atk-vin02a4:574_2: ca asukarukkhato ca phalaṃ gaṇhantānaṃ anivāraṇaṃ kata”nti. Anuvicaritvā pana “ayaṃ
atk-vin02a4:574_3: madhuraphalo ambo, ito gaṇhathā”tipi na vattabbā. Phalabhājanakāle pana āgatānaṃ
atk-vin02a4:574_4: sammatena upaḍḍhabhāgo dātabbo, asammatena apaloketvā dātabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:575_0: Khīṇaparibbayo vā maggagamiyasatthavāho vā añño vā issaro āgantvā yācati, apaloketvāva
atk-vin02a4:575_1: dātabbaṃ. Balakkārena gahetvā khādanto na vāretabbo. Kuddho hi so rukkhepi chindeyya,
atk-vin02a4:575_2: aññampi anatthaṃ kareyya. Puggalikapariveṇaṃ āgantvā gilānassa gāmena yācanto “amhehi
atk-vin02a4:575_3: chāyādīnaṃ atthāya ropitaṃ, sace atthi, tumhe jānāthā”ti vattabbo. Yadi pana phalabharitāva
atk-vin02a4:575_4: rukkhā honti, kaṇṭake bandhitvā phalavārena khādanti, apaccāsīsantena hutvā dātabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:575_5: Balakkārena gaṇhanto na vāretabbo, pubbe vuttamevettha kāraṇaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:576_0: Saṅghassa phalārāmo hoti, paṭijagganaṃ na labhati, sace taṃ koci vattasīsena jaggati,
atk-vin02a4:576_1: saṅghasseva hoti. Athāpi kassaci paṭibalassa bhikkhuno “imaṃ sappurisa jaggitvā dehī”ti
atk-vin02a4:576_2: saṅgho bhāraṃ karoti, so ce vattasīsena jaggati, evampi saṅghasseva hoti. Phātikammaṃ
atk-vin02a4:576_3: paccāsīsantassa pana tatiyabhāgena vā upaḍḍhabhāgena vā phātikammaṃ kātabbaṃ. “Bhāriyaṃ
atk-vin02a4:576_4: kamma”nti vatvā ettakena anicchanto pana sabbaṃ taveva santakaṃ katvā “mūlabhāgaṃ
atk-vin02a4:576_5: dasabhāgamattaṃ datvā jaggāhī”tipi vattabbo. Garubhaṇḍattā pana mūlacchejjavasena
atk-vin02a4:576_6: na dātabbaṃ. So mūlabhāgaṃ datvā khādanto akatāvāsaṃ vā katvā katāvāsaṃ vā jaggitvā
atk-vin02a4:576_7: nissitakānaṃ ārāmaṃ niyyādeti, tehipi mūlabhāgo dātabbova. Yadā pana bhikkhū sayaṃ
atk-vin02a4:576_8: jaggituṃ pahonti, atha tesaṃ jaggituñca na dātabbaṃ, jaggitakāle ca na vāretabbā,
atk-vin02a4:576_9: jagganakāleyeva vāretabbā. “Bahuṃ tumhehi khāyitaṃ, idāni mā jaggittha, bhikkhusaṅghoyeva
atk-vin02a4:577_0: Sace pana neva vattasīsena jagganto atthi, na phātikammena, na saṅgho jaggituṃ pahoti,
atk-vin02a4:577_1: eko anāpucchitvāva jaggitvā phātikammaṃ vaḍḍhetvā paccāsīsati, apalokanakammena phātikammaṃ
atk-vin02a4:577_2: vaḍḍhetvā dātabbaṃ. Iti imaṃ sabbampi kammalakkhaṇameva hoti. Apalokanakammaṃ imāni
atk-vin02a4:578_0: Ñattikammaṭṭhānabhede pana “suṇātu me bhante saṅgho, itthannāmo itthannāmassa āyasmato
atk-vin02a4:578_1: upasampadāpekkho, anusiṭṭho so mayā. Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, itthannāmo āgaccheyyāti,
atk-vin02a4:578_2: āgacchāhīti vattabbo”ti evaṃ upasampadāpekkhassa osāraṇā osāraṇā nāma.
atk-vin02a4:579_0: “Suṇantu me āyasmantā, ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu dhammakathiko imassa neva suttaṃ āgacchati,
atk-vin02a4:579_1: no suttavibhaṅgo, so atthaṃ asallakkhetvā byañjanacchāyāya atthaṃ paṭibāhati. Yadāyasmantānaṃ
atk-vin02a4:579_2: pattakallaṃ, itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuṃ vuṭṭhāpetvā avasesā imaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasameyyāmā”ti
atk-vin02a4:579_3: evaṃ ubbāhikāvinicchaye dhammakathikassa bhikkhuno nissāraṇā nissāraṇā nāma.
atk-vin02a4:580: “Suṇātu me bhante saṅgho, ajjuposatho pannaraso. Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, saṅgho uposathaṃ kareyyā”ti evaṃ uposathakammavasena ṭhapitā ñatti uposatho nāma.
atk-vin02a4:581: “Suṇātu me bhante saṅgho, ajja pavāraṇā pannarasī. Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, saṅgho pavāreyyā”ti evaṃ pavāraṇākammavasena ṭhapitā ñatti pavāraṇā nāma.
atk-vin02a4:582_0: “Suṇātu me bhante saṅgho, itthannāmo itthannāmassa āyasmato upasampadāpekkho. Yadi
atk-vin02a4:582_1: saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, ahaṃ itthannāmaṃ anusāseyya”nti. “Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ,
atk-vin02a4:582_2: itthannāmo itthannāmaṃ anusāseyyā”ti. “Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, ahaṃ itthannāmaṃ
atk-vin02a4:582_3: antarāyike dhamme puccheyya”nti. “Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, itthannāmo itthannāmaṃ
atk-vin02a4:582_4: antarāyike dhamme puccheyyā”ti. “Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, ahaṃ itthannāmaṃ vinayaṃ
atk-vin02a4:582_5: puccheyya”nti. “Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, itthannāmo itthannāmaṃ vinayaṃ puccheyyā”ti.
atk-vin02a4:582_6: “Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, ahaṃ itthannāmena vinayaṃ puṭṭho vissajjeyya”nti. “Yadi
atk-vin02a4:582_7: saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, itthannāmo itthannāmena vinayaṃ puṭṭho vissajjeyyā”ti evaṃ
atk-vin02a4:582_8: attānaṃ vā paraṃ vā sammannituṃ ṭhapitā ñatti sammuti nāma.
atk-vin02a4:583_0: “Suṇātu me bhante saṅgho, idaṃ cīvaraṃ itthannāmassa bhikkhuno nissaggiyaṃ saṅghassa
atk-vin02a4:583_1: nissaṭṭhaṃ. Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, saṅgho imaṃ cīvaraṃ itthannāmassa bhikkhuno
atk-vin02a4:583_2: dadeyyā”ti. “Yadāyasmantānaṃ pattakallaṃ, āyasmantā imaṃ cīvaraṃ itthannāmassa bhikkhuno
atk-vin02a4:583_3: dadeyyu”nti evaṃ nissaṭṭhacīvarapattādīnaṃ dānaṃ dānaṃ nāma.
atk-vin02a4:584_0: “Suṇātu me bhante saṅgho, ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu āpattiṃ sarati, vivarati, uttāniṃ
atk-vin02a4:584_1: karoti, deseti. Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, ahaṃ itthannāmassa bhikkhuno āpattiṃ
atk-vin02a4:584_2: paṭiggaṇheyyanti. Yadāyasmantānaṃ pattakallaṃ, ahaṃ itthannāmassa bhikkhuno āpattiṃ
atk-vin02a4:584_3: paṭiggaṇheyya”nti. Tena vattabbo “passasī”ti. “Āma passāmī”ti. Āyatiṃ saṃvareyyāsīti
atk-vin02a4:585_0: “Suṇantu me, āyasmantā āvāsikā. Yadāyasmantānaṃ pattakallaṃ, idāni uposathaṃ kareyyāma,
atk-vin02a4:585_1: pātimokkhaṃ uddiseyyāma, āgame kāḷe pavāreyyāmā”ti. Te ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhū bhaṇḍanakārakā
atk-vin02a4:585_2: kalahakārakā vivādakārakā bhassakārakā saṅghe adhikaraṇakārakā taṃ kāḷaṃ anuvaseyyuṃ,
atk-vin02a4:585_3: āvāsikena bhikkhunā byattena paṭibalena āvāsikā bhikkhū ñāpetabbā – “suṇantu me,
atk-vin02a4:585_4: āyasmantā āvāsikā. Yadāyasmantānaṃ pattakallaṃ, idāni uposathaṃ kareyyāma, pātimokkhaṃ
atk-vin02a4:585_5: uddiseyyāma, āgame juṇhe pavāreyyāmā”ti evaṃ katā pavāraṇāpaccukkaḍḍhanā paccukkaḍḍhanā nāma.
atk-vin02a4:586_0: Sabbeheva ekajjhaṃ sannipatitabbaṃ, sannipatitvā byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena saṅgho
atk-vin02a4:586_1: ñāpetabbo – “suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho amhākaṃ bhaṇḍanajātānaṃ kalahajātānaṃ vivādāpannānaṃ
atk-vin02a4:586_2: viharataṃ bahuṃ assāmaṇakaṃ ajjhāciṇṇaṃ bhāsitaparikkantaṃ. Sace mayaṃ imāhi āpattīhi
atk-vin02a4:586_3: aññamaññaṃ kāressāma, siyāpi taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ kakkhaḷattāya vāḷattāya bhedāya saṃvatteyya.
atk-vin02a4:586_4: Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, saṅgho imaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ tiṇavatthārakena vūpasameyya
atk-vin02a4:586_5: ṭhapetvā thullavajjaṃ, ṭhapetvā gihipaṭisayutta”nti evaṃ tiṇavatthārakasamathena
atk-vin02a4:587: Tathā tato parā ekekasmiṃ pakkhe ekekaṃ katvā dve ñattiyo iti yathāvuttappabhedaṃ osāraṇaṃ nissāraṇaṃ…pe… kammalakkhaṇaññeva navamanti ñattikammaṃ imāni nava ṭhānāni gacchati.
atk-vin02a4:588: Ñattidutiyakammaṭṭhānabhede pana vaḍḍhassa licchavino pattanikkujjanavasena khandhake vuttā nissāraṇā. Tasseva pattukkujjanavasena vuttā osāraṇā ca veditabbā.
atk-vin02a4:589_2: etāsaṃ sammutīnaṃ vasena sammuti veditabbā. Kathinacīvaradānamatakacīvaradānavasena dānaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:590_1: veditabbā. Yā pana tiṇavatthārakasamathe sabbasaṅgāhikañattiñca ekekasmiṃ pakkhe
atk-vin02a4:590_2: ekekaṃ ñattiñcāti tisso ñattiyo ṭhapetvā puna ekasmiṃ pakkhe ekā, ekasmiṃ pakkhe
atk-vin02a4:590_3: ekāti dve ñattidutiyakammavācā vuttā, tāsaṃ vasena kammalakkhaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ. Iti
atk-vin02a4:591_0: Ñatticatutthakammaṭṭhānabhede pana tajjanīyakammādīnaṃ sattannaṃ kammānaṃ vasena
atk-vin02a4:591_1: nissāraṇā, tesaṃyeva ca kammānaṃ paṭippassambhanavasena osāraṇā veditabbā. Bhikkhunovādakasammutivasena
atk-vin02a4:591_2: sammuti veditabbā. Parivāsadānamānattadānavasena dānaṃ veditabbaṃ. Mūlāyapaṭikassanakammavasena
atk-vin02a4:591_3: niggaho veditabbo. “Ukkhittānuvattikā aṭṭha, yāvatatiyakā ariṭṭho caṇḍakāḷī ca ime
atk-vin02a4:591_4: te yāvatatiyakā”ti imāsaṃ ekādasannaṃ samanubhāsanānaṃ vasena samanubhāsanā veditabbā.
atk-vin02a4:591_5: Upasampadākammaabbhānakammavasena pana kammalakkhaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ. Iti ñatticatutthakammaṃ
atk-vin02a4:592_0: 497. Iti kammāni ca kammavipattiñca vipattivirahitānaṃ kammānaṃ ṭhānapabhedagamanañca
atk-vin02a4:592_1: dassetvā idāni tesaṃ kammānaṃ kārakassa saṅghassa paricchedaṃ dassento puna “catuvaggakaraṇe
atk-vin02a4:592_2: kamme”tiādimāha. Tassattho parisato kammavipattivaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabboti.
atk-vin02a4:595_0: 498. Idāni yāni tāni tesaṃ kammānaṃ vatthubhūtāni sikkhāpadāni, tesaṃ paññattiyaṃ
atk-vin02a4:595_1: ānisaṃsaṃ dassetuṃ “dve atthavase paṭiccā”tiādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha diṭṭhadhammikānaṃ
atk-vin02a4:595_2: verānaṃ saṃvarāyāti pāṇātipātādīnaṃ pañcannaṃ diṭṭhadhammikaverānaṃ saṃvaratthāya
atk-vin02a4:595_3: pidahanatthāya. Samparāyikānaṃ verānaṃ paṭighātāyāti vipākadukkhasaṅkhātānaṃ samparāyikaverānaṃ
atk-vin02a4:595_5: saṃvarāyāti tesaṃyeva pañcannaṃ verānaṃ saṃvaratthāya. Samparāyikānaṃ vajjānanti
atk-vin02a4:595_6: tesaṃyeva vipākadukkhānaṃ. Vipākadukkhāneva hi idha vajjanīyabhāvato vajjānīti vuttāni.
atk-vin02a4:595_7: Diṭṭhadhammikānaṃ bhayānanti garahā upavādo tajjanīyādīni kammāni uposathapavāraṇānaṃ
atk-vin02a4:595_8: ṭhapanaṃ akittipakāsanīyakammanti etāni diṭṭhadhammikabhayāni nāma, etesaṃ saṃvaratthāya.
atk-vin02a4:595_9: Samparāyikabhayāni pana vipākadukkhāniyeva, tesaṃ paṭighātatthāya. Diṭṭhadhammikānaṃ
atk-vin02a4:595_11: Vipākadukkhāneva pana akkhamaṭṭhena samparāyikaakusalānīti vuccanti, tesaṃ paṭighātatthāya.
atk-vin02a4:595_12: Gihīnaṃ anukampāyāti agārikānaṃ saddhārakkhaṇavasena anukampanatthāya. Pāpicchānaṃ
atk-vin02a4:595_14: paññattaṃ. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānameva. Yañhettha vattabbaṃ siyā, taṃ sabbaṃ paṭhamapārājikavaṇṇanāyameva vuttanti.
atk-vin02a4:597_0: 499. Pātimokkhādīsu pātimokkhuddesoti bhikkhūnaṃ pañcavidho bhikkhunīnaṃ catubbidho.
atk-vin02a4:597_1: Parivāsadānādīsu osāraṇīyaṃ paññattanti aṭṭhārasasu vā tecattālīsāya vā vattesu vattamānassa
atk-vin02a4:597_2: osāraṇīyaṃ paññattaṃ. Yena kammena osārīyati, taṃ kammaṃ paññattanti attho. Nissāraṇīyaṃ
atk-vin02a4:597_3: paññattanti bhaṇḍanakārakādayo yena kammena nissārīyanti, taṃ kammaṃ paññattanti attho.
atk-vin02a4:598_0: 500. Apaññattetiādīsu apaññatte paññattanti sattāpattikkhandhā kakusandhañca sammāsambuddhaṃ
atk-vin02a4:598_1: koṇāgamanañca kassapañca sammāsambuddhaṃ ṭhapetvā antarā kenaci apaññatte sikkhāpade
atk-vin02a4:598_2: paññattaṃ nāma. Makkaṭivatthuādivinītakathā sikkhāpade paññatte anupaññattaṃ nāma.
atk-vin02a4:600_0: 501. Idāni sabbasikkhāpadānaṃ ekekena ākārena navadhā saṅgahaṃ dassetuṃ “nava saṅgahā”tiādimāha.
atk-vin02a4:600_1: Tattha vatthusaṅgahoti vatthunā saṅgaho. Evaṃ sesesupi padattho veditabbo. Ayaṃ panettha
atk-vin02a4:600_2: atthayojanā – yasmā hi ekasikkhāpadampi avatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ natthi, tasmā sabbāni
atk-vin02a4:600_3: vatthunā saṅgahitānīti evaṃ tāva vatthusaṅgaho veditabbo.
atk-vin02a4:601_0: Yasmā pana dve āpattikkhandhā sīlavipattiyā saṅgahitā, pañcāpattikkhandhā ācāravipattiyā,
atk-vin02a4:601_1: cha sikkhāpadāni ājīvavipattiyā saṅgahitāni, tasmā sabbānipi vipattiyā saṅgahitānīti
atk-vin02a4:602: Yasmā pana sattahāpattīhi muttaṃ ekasikkhāpadampi natthi, tasmā sabbāni āpattiyā saṅgahitānīti evaṃ āpattisaṅgaho veditabbo.
atk-vin02a4:603: Sabbāni ca sattasu nagaresu paññattānīti nidānena saṅgahitānīti evaṃ nidānasaṅgaho veditabbo.
atk-vin02a4:604: Yasmā pana ekasikkhāpadampi ajjhācārikapuggale asati paññattaṃ natthi, tasmā sabbāni puggalena saṅgahitānīti evaṃ puggalasaṅgaho veditabbo.
atk-vin02a4:605_0: Sabbāni pana pañcahi ceva sattahi ca āpattikkhandhehi saṅgahitāni, sabbāni na vinā
atk-vin02a4:605_1: chahi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhantīti samuṭṭhānena saṅgahitāni. Sabbāni ca catūsu adhikaraṇesu
atk-vin02a4:605_2: āpattādhikaraṇena saṅgahitāni. Sabbāni sattahi samathehi samathaṃ gacchantīti samathehi
atk-vin02a4:612: Vinayapiṭakaṃ vinento, veneyyaṃ yaṃ jino āha.
atk-vin02a4:620: Sampassataṃ na dissati, kiñci apāsādikaṃ yato ettha;
atk-vin02a4:652: Ciraṃ tiṭṭhatu saddhammo, kāle vassaṃ ciraṃ pajaṃ;
atk-vin02a4:653: Tappetu devo dhammena, rājā rakkhatu medininti.
atk-vin02a4:654_6: therena katā ayaṃ samantapāsādikā nāma vinayasaṃvaṇṇanā –
